dialogue_en: May the next time we meet be on the stage of the Honeybee Inn. Until then, my liberators of love.
dialogue_jp:
次は　私のステージにも遊びにきてくれ
可憐な愛のキューピッドたち

dialogue_en: Now then, let's give our pianist a warm round of applause!
dialogue_jp:
皆様　ピアニストに
いまいちど盛大な拍手を！

dialogue_en: Syncopation. A rather calming rendition!
dialogue_jp: 心に染み渡る　癒やしの音色でございました！

dialogue_en: That felt like being roused from reverie, thanks to the occasional slipu─ Oh, pardon me.
dialogue_jp:
午後のまどろみにふさわしい
たゆたう波のように不規則な……いえ

dialogue_en: Now then, let's give our pianist a warm round of applause!
dialogue_jp:
皆様　ピアニストに
いまいちど盛大な拍手を！

dialogue_en: Uh... What an avant-garde performance! A celebration of discord and atonality!
dialogue_jp:
不協和音を活かした斬新な曲調
アバンギャルドな演奏でございました！

dialogue_en: This concert has to succeed. We're counting on you.
dialogue_jp:
コンサートを成功させるため
どうか　お力添えください

dialogue_en: Sit down and play.
dialogue_jp: モタモタしてるヒマはないよ

dialogue_en: Don't let my massage go to waste now.
dialogue_jp: あたしの揉みが　効かないわけはないさ

dialogue_en: You can do this. I know you can.
dialogue_jp: キミならやれると　信じている

dialogue_en: You're our only hope, Tifa.
dialogue_jp: 頼れるのは　キミだけだ

dialogue_en: ...As a last-ditch effort, I could take the stage.
dialogue_jp: ティファがやらなければ　私が踊ろう

dialogue_en: A gift to get you in the mood.
dialogue_jp: こちらは　プレゼントです

dialogue_en: Go on.
dialogue_jp: カポノ

dialogue_en:
Greetings and welcome to Costa del Sol!
I'm Kapono, the mayor here.
dialogue_jp:
よ～うこそ　コスタ・デル・ソルへ！
わたくし　市長のカポノです

dialogue_en: Could shave ya.
dialogue_jp: 毛　そっちまえよ！

dialogue_en: I'm about to melt.
dialogue_jp: 暑くてたまらない

dialogue_en: Perhaps we could find some shade first?
dialogue_jp: どこかで　涼ませてくれないか

dialogue_en: Welcome to wonderland, my fair ladies!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　よ～うこそ

dialogue_en: So forget your dead-end nine-to-fives, 'cause here, the fun lasts all the way to sunrise!
dialogue_jp:
華のない日常はパア～っと忘れて
ど～ぞ　心ゆくまでお楽しみください

dialogue_en: A shimmering seaside paradise awaits you─with only the bluest skies, and earthly delights on all sides.
dialogue_jp:
ここは　輝く太陽の楽園
天からの恵み降り注ぐ　極上リゾート

dialogue_en: That color really brings out your eyes!
dialogue_jp: よ～く　お似合いですぞ

dialogue_en: After all, there's nothing like a good lei to kick-start your getaway!
dialogue_jp:
これがなくては
コスタのバカンスは始まりませんからな

dialogue_en: Hmph. How utterly craven.
dialogue_jp: ふん　意気地なしだねえ

dialogue_en: Barum, barum...
dialogue_jp: ポローン　ポロン……

dialogue_en: Hahaha. Barum, barum...
dialogue_jp: うふふふ　ポローンポローン

dialogue_en:
Now tickle the ivories.
Barum, barum...
dialogue_jp: ほ～ら　ポローンポローン

dialogue_en:
I don't wanna hear excuses!
I want to hear you playing the goddamn piano!
dialogue_jp:
贅沢言ってるヒマはないよ
さあ　つべこべ言わずに手を貸しな！

dialogue_en: Yeah. I mean, kind of... I did take some lessons when I was a kid, but that was ages ago.
dialogue_jp:
え～っと……はい
でも子供の頃に習っただけで　そのあとは全然

dialogue_en:
You've played the piano before.
That much is obvious.
dialogue_jp: あんた　ピアノ経験者だね

dialogue_en:
They have the strength of a warrior's, and yet...
are so very delicate.
dialogue_jp:
格闘家の強靱な
それでいて　繊細な指

dialogue_en: Oh my... These hands... These fingers...
dialogue_jp: あんた　この手……この指……

dialogue_en: Even between the two of us, it's not like we know everyone in every business.
dialogue_jp:
あたしらのツテも
さすがにここじゃあ　限界があるしねえ

dialogue_en: These fools called us down here because they thought we knew a replacement.
dialogue_jp:
代理のピアニストを紹介してくれって
呼び出されたものの

dialogue_en: The heart wants what it wants, and who are we to deny it? However, without a pianist, there can be no concert.
dialogue_jp:
人を愛する気持ちは　誰にも止められない
だが　このままではコンサートは中止だ

dialogue_en: What? "Elope"?
dialogue_jp: えっ　駆け落ち？

dialogue_en:
I'm terribly sorry,
but we're all booked up for the evening.
dialogue_jp:
申し訳ございません
本日　満室となっております

dialogue_en: but between you and me, you should steer clear of that place─and its new owner.
dialogue_jp:
ここだけの話　ヤバい方たちが絡んでいるので
オススメできません

dialogue_en: I could direct you to a recently opened establishment...
dialogue_jp:
最近オープンしたホテルを
ご紹介できなくもないのですが……

dialogue_en: They've filled up our most popular hotels.
dialogue_jp: 人気のホテルは　どこも埋まっております

dialogue_en: Many who were in Junon for the inauguration decided to extend their vacation here.
dialogue_jp:
本日は　ジュノンでパレードを見学された
お客様たちで賑わっておりまして

dialogue_en: I'm looking after one of the execs on some very important business, so please just stay out of our way.
dialogue_jp:
幹部のアテンドで出張に来ているんだ
くれぐれも邪魔しないでくれよ

dialogue_en: No, forget I asked. I don't need to know and I definitely don't want to know.
dialogue_jp:
いや　言わなくていい
君たちに関わると　ロクなことにならん

dialogue_en: What are you people doing here!?
dialogue_jp: なんで　こんなところに君たちが！

dialogue_en:
Hey... Hey, I saw that! Don't go thinkin' I didn't.
You two said it with your eyes!
dialogue_jp: 言ってるな　それ　言ってるよな？

dialogue_en: You better not be suggestin' we all hit the beach.
dialogue_jp: 泳ぐとか　言いださねえよな

dialogue_en:
Yeah, but let's find a hotel and shower first.
Then we can go.
dialogue_jp:
そのまえに　シャワー浴びたいな
ホテル　探そうよ

dialogue_en: Hey...ya see that?
dialogue_jp: ビーチ　あっちかな？

dialogue_en: Said he had decided to elope.
dialogue_jp: 恋人と　駆け落ちだとさ

dialogue_en:
The pianist decided to skip town.
At least he was kind enough to leave behind a letter.
dialogue_jp:
担当のピアニストが
置き手紙を残して消えちまったんだよ

dialogue_en: There's a concert scheduled today. Or was, at least. Something came up, you see.
dialogue_jp:
今日のコンサートなんだが
実は少々　困ったことになっていてね

dialogue_en: Hello, Tifa.
dialogue_jp: やあ　ティファ

dialogue_en: If you have a ticket, please proceed to the lobby.
dialogue_jp:
チケットをお持ちの方は
ロビーへ　お進みください

dialogue_en: Today's Royal Coast Concert will begin shortly.
dialogue_jp:
本日の『ロイヤルコンサート』
受付を開始しております

dialogue_en: Whaddya think? Have any of our photographs caught your eye?
dialogue_jp:
どうです　お気に入りの写真は
見つかりましたか？

dialogue_en: Welcome to our studio! We have a wide array of photographs available for you to peruse.
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃいませ～　当館自慢の
キラッキラの写真を見ていってくださいね！

dialogue_en: I hope your remaining days here are filled with fun and romance.
dialogue_jp:
コスタで　幸せな思い出を
作っていってくださいね

dialogue_en: You don't have the ticket required to participate in this event. Please come back when ya do.
dialogue_jp:
お客様のチケットだと
当店のイベントにはご参加いただけませんよ～

dialogue_en: I'm so sorry.
dialogue_jp: あら～　残念

dialogue_en: While we are planning something truly amazing, the event won't start for some time.
dialogue_jp:
キラッキラのイベントがもうすぐ始まるんですけど
まだ　準備中なんですよ～

dialogue_en: Oh, sorry...
dialogue_jp: すいませ～ん

dialogue_en: Don't work too hard.
dialogue_jp: おつかれさま

dialogue_en: Yes sir, is─ Ah, forgive me! I'm on my way!
dialogue_jp:
はい　あたしだが――ああ　すみません
すぐ向かいます！

dialogue_en: No way... Johnny!?
dialogue_jp: うそ　ジョニー？

dialogue_en: Tifa!
dialogue_jp: ティファ～！

dialogue_en: Tifa! Cloud, my bro!
dialogue_jp: ティファ　アニキ～！

dialogue_en: Whaddya say? In a hot spot like this, you'll make your money back in no time!
dialogue_jp:
なに　人気の観光地だ
すぐに元は取れるぜ

dialogue_en: Owner must be out of his mind tryin' to sell the place, but you know how rich folks are.
dialogue_jp:
理由は　ち～っと言えねえが
物件を売りたがってる御方がいてね

dialogue_en: I've got a hotel for ten percent the market price!
dialogue_jp: なんと　値段は相場の１０分の１！

dialogue_en: Well, today's your day!
dialogue_jp: ちょうど　いい話があるぜ

dialogue_en: Hey, pretty boy. Ever thought about owning a piece of real estate in paradise?
dialogue_jp:
お兄さん　憧れのコスタで
ホテルオーナーになってみない？

dialogue_en: Safe travels!
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: Please, make yourself at home.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ　どうぞごゆっくり

dialogue_en: We hope to see you again soon.
dialogue_jp: またのお越しをお待ちしております

dialogue_en: We're only accepting customers with prior reservations today.
dialogue_jp:
本日は　ご予約のお客様のみの
ご案内となっております

dialogue_en: Have a nice day.
dialogue_jp: いってらっしゃいませ

dialogue_en: Welcome. Need some rooms?
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃいませ　ご利用ですか？

dialogue_en:
No need to be shy. We go way back, right?
It's the least I can do.
dialogue_jp:
ヤだなあ　俺たちの仲じゃないですか
遠慮は無用ですって

dialogue_en: I don't know about this...
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫かよ

dialogue_en: That's what happens when you have no guests.
dialogue_jp: 実はオープン以来　お客ゼロで

dialogue_en:
Do I have rooms? I got rooms for days!
Enough rooms to make your head spin!
dialogue_jp:
うおお　願ってもない申し出
大　大　大っ歓迎です！

dialogue_en:
What a coincidence! We were just looking for
a place to stay. Do you have any rooms?
dialogue_jp:
ちょうど　休める場所　探してたの
行ってもいい？

dialogue_en: ...Though not exactly a luxury one.
dialogue_jp: つっても　ちっこいホテルだけどな

dialogue_en: Bein' the owner of a bona fide hotel!
dialogue_jp: ホテルのオーナーになったんだよ　俺！

dialogue_en: Livin' the dream─buildin' my legend!
dialogue_jp: 男ジョニー　一世一代の大勝負

dialogue_en: Same to you. So...what're you doing here?
dialogue_jp: ジョニーも　ここでなにしてるの？

dialogue_en: Whew! Hey, guys! Lookin' good!
dialogue_jp:
みなさん　お久しぶりです
お元気そうで！

dialogue_en: Hey, where ya goin', bro!?
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　どこ行くんすか！

dialogue_en: There's no kinder man in all the world.
dialogue_jp: 俺もう　感動しちゃって……

dialogue_en:
"How cheap," you ask? Half market price cheap!
The dude even loaned me the money for it!
dialogue_jp:
売値はなんと　相場の半分！
そのうえ　ドーンと融資までしてくれて

dialogue_en: Said I was destined to make somethin' of myself, so he sold me a hotel for cheap!
dialogue_jp:
仕事がないならって
特別に　格安物件を紹介してくれたんです！

dialogue_en:
I was a nobody with nothin'─walkin' garbage.
But Mayor Kapono believed in me.
dialogue_jp:
ゴミくずよろしく　路地裏に転がってたら
カポノ市長に声をかけられて

dialogue_en:
I was cursed with the unholy trinity.
No job, no money, and worst of all, no girl.
dialogue_jp:
意を決してミッドガルを出たものの
職ナシ　金ナシ　彼女ナシの八方塞がり

dialogue_en:
How I got my hands on it though─hoo-hoo,
now that's a story.
dialogue_jp: いや～　話すと長くなるんすけど……

dialogue_en: Just bought the place, so I'm still doin' repairs here 'n' there, but all things considered, it's lookin' pretty sweet.
dialogue_jp:
買ったばかりなんで　ちょっと散らかってますけど
なかなか　いいカンジなんですよ～

dialogue_en: This way!
dialogue_jp: こっちっす！

dialogue_en: Over here!
dialogue_jp: こっち　こっち！

dialogue_en:
Make sure you stick close!
Can't have my guests gettin' lost!
dialogue_jp:
迷子にならないように
ちゃんと　ついてきてくださいね

dialogue_en: Of course! C'mon!
dialogue_jp: ほら　早く早く！

dialogue_en: Now?
dialogue_jp: おい

dialogue_en: Alright, let's get you settled in.
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　さっそく向かいましょう

dialogue_en: Well? C'mon in!
dialogue_jp: さあ　どうぞ！

dialogue_en: Ah, how that fresh salt air tickles the nose.
dialogue_jp: きたきた　潮のかおり！

dialogue_en: It's not about the sights, but the smells.
dialogue_jp: 見るんじゃなくて　ほら

dialogue_en:
Maybe my eyes are failin' me,
but I don't see no "seaside."
dialogue_jp: シーサイドのわりには　シーが見えねえぞ

dialogue_en: I know! Right!?
dialogue_jp: だろ　だろ？

dialogue_en: Wow...it's, uh... I dunno. Great!
dialogue_jp: そっか……　うん　いいね……

dialogue_en: Behold my pride and joy: Johnny's Seaside Inn!
dialogue_jp: 俺の城　シーサイド・ジョニー！

dialogue_en: Hey, guys!
dialogue_jp: みなさ～ん！

dialogue_en:
I really needed this.
Can't lift my family's spirits if I can't lift my own!
dialogue_jp:
家族を元気にするためにも
まず　あたしが元気でいないとね

dialogue_en: They're yours.
dialogue_jp: もちろん

dialogue_en: Just a small way of letting them know they're always in my thoughts.
dialogue_jp: 妻と娘にも　ずいぶん苦労をかけていてね

dialogue_en: Say, if you don't mind parting with them, I'd love to send those cactuar photos to my wife and daughter.
dialogue_jp:
その　ハッピーテンダーの写真なんだが
あたしの家族にも送ってやっていいだろうか？

dialogue_en: I suppose I ought to thank you for helping bring some "amor" back into my life.
dialogue_jp:
君たちのおかげで　忘れかけていたアモールを
取り戻せた気がするよ

dialogue_en:
Yep! That's all of 'em.
We can close the book on the cactuar capers!
dialogue_jp:
はい　おめでと～！
ハッピーテンダー　コンプリートで～す

dialogue_en: One, two...
dialogue_jp: いち　にー……

dialogue_en: Hahaha! You can't fool me!
dialogue_jp: ははっ　だまされないぞ！

dialogue_en: I know an impostor when I see one.
dialogue_jp: ホンモノとは　違いますねえ

dialogue_en: Ah-ah-ah! You can't fool these eagle eyes.
dialogue_jp: いやいや　惑わされないぞ

dialogue_en: Oh, what am I to do!?
dialogue_jp: あたしは　どうすれば……

dialogue_en: And yet...I still hold fast to the Shinra creed. Loath though I am to part, I cannot shirk my duties forever!
dialogue_jp:
でも　この胸に燃える神羅魂は
簡単に捨てられはしない

dialogue_en: All those hours I wasted working that I could've been spending with you.
dialogue_jp:
あたしは仕事にかまけて
大切なものを見失っていたのか

dialogue_en: Soon enough. No need to stick to a schedule here.
dialogue_jp: まあ　こういうところですから　ゆるゆると

dialogue_en: How soon is "soon"?
dialogue_jp: のちほどって　いつだよ？

dialogue_en: See you guys soon.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　のちほど

dialogue_en: Yeah, I'd say so.
dialogue_jp: うん　そうだね

dialogue_en: Time for that shower?
dialogue_jp: シャワー　いく？

dialogue_en: Fate is so cruel, depriving me of Tifa in beachwear!
dialogue_jp:
くう～　ティファのリゾートウェア
この目で見たかったぜ！

dialogue_en:
And don't even think of bringin'
those weapons with ya!
dialogue_jp: その物騒なのも　持ち込み禁止ですから！

dialogue_en:
You guys better not head to
the beach lookin' like that!
dialogue_jp: ビーチへ行くなら　ちゃんと着替えてくださいね

dialogue_en: Oh!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en:
Make yourselves at home!
Not like there's anyone else here anyway.
dialogue_jp:
今日は　みなさんの貸し切りなんで
適当にくつろいどいてください

dialogue_en:
Ah, I gotta run.
The mayor requires my assistance at this time.
dialogue_jp:
っと　すいません
俺　カポノ市長に呼ばれてて

dialogue_en: I'd never even think of charging you! Besides─
dialogue_jp:
ティファのためなら　大サービス！
今日は――

dialogue_en: The price?
dialogue_jp: 料金は？

dialogue_en: As for the dudes... You can all bunk together in 103.
dialogue_jp: 野郎のみなさんは　まとめて１０３号室ってことで

dialogue_en:
Tifa, you'll be staying in Room 101.
Aerith, you're in 102.
dialogue_jp:
お部屋は　ティファが１０１
エアリスが１０２

dialogue_en: Okay! Let's get everyone checked in!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　シーサイド・ジョニーへ！

dialogue_en: Hang loose! Don't tell me you're alone.
dialogue_jp:
コスタ～！
お兄さん　おひとり？

dialogue_en: Takes a special kind of sucker to wind up in a mess like that, y'know?
dialogue_jp:
いまどき　こんな手に
だまされるヤツがいるなんてねえ

dialogue_en: Whole building's barely worth a hundred gil, and yet the owner's drowning in debt to keep it open.
dialogue_jp:
こんなボロ宿　１００ギルの価値もないってのに
借金まで負わされちゃって

dialogue_en: Place is a sty, right?
dialogue_jp: なか　見たでしょう？

dialogue_en: What's a stand-up guy like you stayin' at a dump like this for? I could show ya somewhere way better.
dialogue_jp:
お兄さ～ん　そんなボロ家より
もっといい宿　紹介するよ

dialogue_en: Hold down the fort till I get back.
dialogue_jp: 悪いな　留守番だ

dialogue_en: C'mon! Why you gotta do me like that, shower!?
dialogue_jp: うそ！　シャワー壊れちゃった……

dialogue_en: Uh... This looks like it'll collapse if I try to sit on it, much less sleep...
dialogue_jp:
これがベッド……だよね？
乗ったら　底が抜けそう

dialogue_en: Well ventilated, plenty of shade... A lovely hotel.
dialogue_jp:
風が心地よい
なかなか　いい宿だな

dialogue_en: Well! Back in a bit!
dialogue_jp: んじゃ　先に行ってるぜ

dialogue_en: Still lookin' good.
dialogue_jp: やっぱ　これだよな

dialogue_en:
Think I'll go take a walk.
Though...I should maybe get changed first.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　そのへん見てくるぜ……って
着替えねえと　ダメなんだったか

dialogue_en: You win...
dialogue_jp: 負けた　負けた

dialogue_en: Right.
dialogue_jp: エアリス

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en:
So if you could get them outta here,
we'd be so grateful!
dialogue_jp: どこかに連れ出してちょうだい　お願いね～

dialogue_en: I mean, look at their clothes─they kill the vibe.
dialogue_jp: ドレスコードも無視で雰囲気ぶちこわし

dialogue_en: Those robed people are a little different, right? And they've kinda been creeping the other guests out.
dialogue_jp:
黒マントさんたちって　すこし変でしょ？
ビーチに集まっちゃって　みんな怖がってるの

dialogue_en:
So they're friends of yours?
Then can you do us a solid?
dialogue_jp:
あらあら　おトモダチ？
じゃ　お兄さんから言ってくれない？

dialogue_en: Got plans with those guys. Later.
dialogue_jp: 俺はあいつに用がある　じゃあな

dialogue_en: I'll pass.
dialogue_jp: 興味ない

dialogue_en: So? Will you be joining us or what?
dialogue_jp: どう　お兄さんも参加してみない？

dialogue_en: Find love at Costa del Amor!
dialogue_jp: フラダンサー

dialogue_en: Find love at Costa del Amor!
dialogue_jp: 『コスタでアモール』開催中で～す！

dialogue_en: One we guarantee will spice up your social life!
dialogue_jp: 愛あふれるステキな思い出をアナタに

dialogue_en: We're bringing people together─solo suntanners like you─with a special event!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルでは　いま
お客さまの出会いを後押しするイベントを開催中

dialogue_en: But you don't have to be lonely any longer.
dialogue_jp: そんなアナタに魅力的なお知らせよ

dialogue_en:
The beach is for partying!
And one's not a party─it's a pity!
dialogue_jp:
せっかくビーチに来たのに
ひとりきりなんて　もったいないわ～！

dialogue_en: Best of luck finding that special someone!
dialogue_jp: 最高の出会いがありますように～！

dialogue_en: So start searching, and let the fun begin!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　コスタのバカンスを楽しんでね

dialogue_en: Right?
dialogue_jp: フラダンサー

dialogue_en:
And once you're dressed to impress,
you'll finally be ready to hit the beach!
dialogue_jp:
ドレスコードをクリアして
ステキな思い出を作っちゃおう！

dialogue_en: You can turn those in for beachwear.
dialogue_jp: カードは　リゾートウェアと交換できちゃうの

dialogue_en:
Work together, master the games,
and you'll earn companion cards!
dialogue_jp:
パートナーといっしょにゲームをクリアすれば
アモールカードをプレゼント！

dialogue_en:
Your number's the same as someone else's.
Find them, and you've got yourself a team!
dialogue_jp:
同じ番号を持ったパートナーが
会場で　アナタを待ってるはずよ

dialogue_en: With that, you can play Pirate's Rampage and Card Carnival─but not all by your lonesome.
dialogue_jp:
そのチケットで『パイレーツ・ランページ』と
『カード・カーニバル』のイベントに参加できるわ

dialogue_en: Take it.
dialogue_jp: フラダンサー

dialogue_en:
And to help you with that...
here's lucky ticket number seven!
dialogue_jp: ってことで　７番のチケットをあげる

dialogue_en:
This is Costa del Sol! You gotta loosen up─
let it all out!
dialogue_jp:
ここは　コスタ・デル・ソル
もっと自分を解放しなくちゃ！

dialogue_en: Speaking of clothes... They'll never let you on the beach looking like that.
dialogue_jp:
でも　お兄さんも
その格好じゃ　ビーチに入れないわよ？

dialogue_en: Just admit it. You're obviously captivated by my bodacious beach bod.
dialogue_jp:
ヒュ～ヒュ～！
水着姿がキュートだね～って？

dialogue_en:
Hey, Cloud. Want some ice cream to cool down?
Or are you lookin' for somethin' hot?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドもアイス食べる？
あっ　それともナンパ～？

dialogue_en: Duh duhn-duhn, duh-duhn, duhn duh-duhn duh duhn-duhn♪
dialogue_jp:
タラタ～ン　タタン～♪
タタランタラタン～♪

dialogue_en: No getting around the dress code, I guess.
dialogue_jp: とりあえず　服が必要だな

dialogue_en: If you want to head down to the beach, you'll need to change first!
dialogue_jp:
ビーチに行くなら
リゾートウェアに着替えてくださいね！

dialogue_en: No beachwear, no beach. Those are the rules.
dialogue_jp:
今日は　リゾートウェアじゃないと
ビーチには入れないんです

dialogue_en: Hold it.
dialogue_jp: すみません～

dialogue_en: Hang loose!
dialogue_jp: フラダンサー

dialogue_en: Hang loose!
dialogue_jp: コスタ～！

dialogue_en: My petite, prickly pal... I hate to think that these might be our last moments together.
dialogue_jp:
ハッピー　マイハニー……
なんだろうか　このさみしい想いは

dialogue_en: Just imagine how splendid it would be!
dialogue_jp: そんなふうに思えてきましたよ

dialogue_en:
At this point, I can't imagine life without you.
We should spend every day together!
dialogue_jp:
もはや　君なしの日々は考えられない
毎日でもいっしょにいたい！

dialogue_en: Aww, is someone shy? Hid yourself well, didn't you!
dialogue_jp:
やあ　ハッピーちゃん
なんか照れますねえ

dialogue_en: Let's go find another!
dialogue_jp: さあ　つぎつぎ！

dialogue_en: Each little guy we find is one more happy memory we make together!
dialogue_jp:
こうして　出会いを重ねて
お互いの想いを高めていくんですよ

dialogue_en: Hey, a cactuar!
dialogue_jp: おお　ハッピーテンダー！

dialogue_en:
...Is this what they call love at first sight?
'Cause I adore this cactuar!
dialogue_jp:
ははあ　これは
ひとめぼれというやつかな

dialogue_en: Oh, isn't it the cutest? I just love these little guys!
dialogue_jp:
ほほう　かわいらしい
ドキッとしますねえ

dialogue_en: Haha, nothing better than not working!
dialogue_jp: 仕事サボって遊ぶのは　最高だねえ！

dialogue_en: Haha! This is the kinda fun I've been missing!
dialogue_jp: 楽しいぞ～　これはいい！

dialogue_en: Come out, little cactuars!
dialogue_jp: ハッピーテンダー　どこだ～い？

dialogue_en: Maybe over there? Wait─what about over here?
dialogue_jp:
あれ　あっちかな～
いや　こっちかな～？

dialogue_en: There's gotta be something around here.
dialogue_jp: このへんが怪しそうだな～

dialogue_en: And so the caper continues!
dialogue_jp: がんばって　探してみてください！

dialogue_en: Oh no! It looks to me like you haven't found all the cactuars.
dialogue_jp:
残念　ハッピーテンダーは
まだそろってないみたいですね

dialogue_en: What's with them?
dialogue_jp: なんだ　あいつら

dialogue_en:
Think of the comic relief I'd bring to the team!
As well as some much-needed youthful energy.
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en:
Think of the comic relief I'd bring to the team!
As well as some much-needed youthful energy.
dialogue_jp:
アタシがいると　楽しいよ～？
チームもグッと若返るし

dialogue_en: But if I was part of the group, I'm sure we'd learn to communicate much better.
dialogue_jp:
仲間にしてくれたら
話し合いにも参加できるんだけどな～？

dialogue_en: Hmph. I have no idea what you're talking about.
dialogue_jp: それ　アタシにはわかんないし

dialogue_en: C'mon. Can't you take a hint?
dialogue_jp: もう　俺たちの邪魔をするな

dialogue_en: But if you were to hire yours truly as your Counselor of Cool, I could show you how it's done!
dialogue_jp:
仲間にしてくれたら
好奇心のツボ　押してあげるけど？

dialogue_en: "Nope," he says. "Not interested"! But that whole shtick doesn't make you cool!
dialogue_jp:
はあ～　いるよね　いるいる
どこにでもいる　興味ないニンゲン！

dialogue_en: Nope.
dialogue_jp: 興味ない

dialogue_en: But! Don't forget that I'm more than just a pretty face. Are you sure you don't want me on your team?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　アタシを仲間にする気ない？
なんなりと役に立っちゃうよ

dialogue_en:
Wait─you are?
I, uh, didn't expect you to have an eye for beauty.
dialogue_jp: なんだよ　意外と見る目あんじゃん？

dialogue_en: Yeah. Obviously.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そうだな

dialogue_en:
Uh... Well, the water won't turn off.
Johnny sure found himself a real fixer-upper.
dialogue_jp:
あれ　止まんない
あっちこっち　ボロボロ

dialogue_en: Take your time.
dialogue_jp: ぜ～んぜん！

dialogue_en: Thanks for keeping watch. I'll only be a sec.
dialogue_jp: ごめんね　見張りなんか頼んで

dialogue_en: Hey! You leave him alone!
dialogue_jp: ごらぁ　なにしてやがる！

dialogue_en: For real. Take a hike!
dialogue_jp: ほら　あっち行けよ！

dialogue_en: You're freaking everyone out.
dialogue_jp: 気味ワル～

dialogue_en:
Poor bastards ain't done nothin' to nobody...
but we treat 'em like monsters all the same.
dialogue_jp:
勝手に怖がったり気味悪がって
イヌコロみたいに　追い払おうとしやがる

dialogue_en: Just can't help but feel sorry for 'em, y'know?
dialogue_jp: なんかしたってワケでもねえのによ

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en: They're gettin' some sun too, huh?
dialogue_jp: 黒マントが集まってるらしいな

dialogue_en: Hey, what's up?
dialogue_jp: おう　来たか

dialogue_en: Talk about killing the vibe.
dialogue_jp: 雰囲気だいなし

dialogue_en:
Wandering around alone would be ill-advised.
I insist you take Tifa.
dialogue_jp:
単独行動はやめたほうがいい
出かけるなら　ティファを誘おう

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: だね……

dialogue_en:
Weren't you headed to the beach?
Some time with Tifa might lift your spirits.
dialogue_jp:
ビーチへ行くんだろう？
ティファを誘って　街へ出てみたらどうだ

dialogue_en: Yes. Extremely.
dialogue_jp: うん　とっても

dialogue_en: These memories were precious?
dialogue_jp: 大事なものだったのか

dialogue_en: The Whispers...they took all that from mine?
dialogue_jp: フィーラーに取られちゃった？

dialogue_en:
Materia is formed from the lifestream itself─
orbs infused with knowledge, memories...
dialogue_jp:
マテリアは凝固したライフストリーム
中身は記憶　知識……

dialogue_en: At least, it was back in Midgar...
dialogue_jp: 少なくとも　ミッドガルにいた頃は

dialogue_en: Thing is, it used to be white.
dialogue_jp: ずっと　白かったの

dialogue_en: None?
dialogue_jp: 透明だ

dialogue_en: Tell me: what color would you say this is?
dialogue_jp: これ　何色に見える？

dialogue_en: Aerith! Are you alright?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　なにか

dialogue_en: Aerith?
dialogue_jp: エアリス？

dialogue_en: Are you almost done?
dialogue_jp: もう　終わったの？

dialogue_en: Kinda reminds me of home.
dialogue_jp: 思い出すな　スラム

dialogue_en: And one for your doggy.
dialogue_jp: ワンちゃんのぶんも　オマケ

dialogue_en: Perfect! Then here's one ticket for the two of you.
dialogue_jp: でしょう？　じゃあこれ　ペアチケット

dialogue_en: Well, in that case, sign me up!
dialogue_jp: へえ～　楽しそう！

dialogue_en: And don't worry: your pet can join too!
dialogue_jp: ペットといっしょに遊べるゲームもあるのよ

dialogue_en:
A special event that'll make
your time here unforgettable!
dialogue_jp:
コスタでの思い出作りを後押しする
ゲームイベントなの

dialogue_en: What's that?
dialogue_jp: あもーる？

dialogue_en:
If you're in the market for some beach attire,
why not participate in Costa del Amor?
dialogue_jp:
リゾートウェアをお探しなら
『コスタでアモール』に参加してみない？

dialogue_en: Hang loose! You ladies look like you're on the way down to the water.
dialogue_jp:
コスタ～！
お姉さんたちは　これからビーチへ？

dialogue_en: Let's roll!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Let's roll!
dialogue_jp: しゅっぱ～つ！

dialogue_en: Yeah!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: And then we can finally hit the beach!
dialogue_jp: それから　ビーチ！

dialogue_en: Now let's find us some resort wear.
dialogue_jp: 街でステキな服　見つけなくちゃね

dialogue_en: Ready!
dialogue_jp: おまたせ

dialogue_en: Uh...yeah, in a sec.
dialogue_jp: うん　もうちょっと

dialogue_en:
Hey, Tifa, you ready to soak up the sun?
'Cause I sure am.
dialogue_jp: そと　いく？　準備どうかな？

dialogue_en: You wanna take the lead for a bit?
dialogue_jp: バトンタッチする？

dialogue_en: Sounds good to me!
dialogue_jp: はい　いきまーす

dialogue_en: You lead. I'll follow.
dialogue_jp: エアリス　お先にどうぞ

dialogue_en: Sure, why not.
dialogue_jp: うん　まかせて

dialogue_en: Hey─you wanna lead the way?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　先に行ってみる？

dialogue_en: Let's go!
dialogue_jp: 行ってみよう

dialogue_en: Yeah!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Ready to have some fun?
dialogue_jp: なんか　おもしろそう

dialogue_en: Hang loose!
dialogue_jp: コスタ～！

dialogue_en: Hang loose!
dialogue_jp: コスタ～！

dialogue_en: So go out there and be sure to have yourselves a ball!
dialogue_jp: ステキな思い出を作っていってね～！

dialogue_en:
Oh! There's also the photo contest,
and you can't miss the piano recital!
dialogue_jp:
『ハッピーテンダーチャレンジ』と
『ロイヤルコンサート』に参加できるわ

dialogue_en:
you can run wild on the pet playground,
ride around on wheelies, or...uh...
dialogue_jp:
『ラン・ワイルド』のレースと
『ウィリーでランデブー』　えっとあとは～

dialogue_en: With those tickets of yours...
dialogue_jp: いまなら　そのチケットで

dialogue_en: Word of advice: look for the cactuars that have other participants nearby.
dialogue_jp:
ハッピーテンダーの近くには
ほかの参加者も　集まってると思いますよ

dialogue_en: So you know, there are fake cactuars around town, too. So make sure you snap the right ones.
dialogue_jp:
街には『ハッピーテンダーもどき』も隠れてます
惑わされないよう　注意してくださいね！

dialogue_en: Alright! Let the capers commence!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　ハッピーテンダー！

dialogue_en: Uh... Okay then! Just take this camera and find the four cactuars hidden around town!
dialogue_jp:
このカメラで　街に隠れている
４匹のハッピーテンダーを撮影してくださいね

dialogue_en:
In that case, I'll go on ahead.
Those cactuars can't hide from me!
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　あたしは先に行って
ハッピーテンダーを探しておくよ！

dialogue_en: Oh, you're a lifesaver!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう～！

dialogue_en: I sure do!
dialogue_jp: いいと思います

dialogue_en: Oh! You mean it!?
dialogue_jp: いいのかい？

dialogue_en: That's...nice. You know, if you're looking for a partner, why don't we team up?
dialogue_jp:
そう……なんだ
よかったら　いっしょにまわります？

dialogue_en: Haha! My work is already done for the day, so, all that's left is to enjoy my stay. Ha...ha...
dialogue_jp:
本日の業務は　もう終わらせたからね
あとはプライベートな時間だよ

dialogue_en: So I thought it prudent to, uh, survey the area.
dialogue_jp: 観光という名の視察に励んでいたところだよ

dialogue_en:
This isn't─
Uh, m-my superior's arrival has been delayed.
dialogue_jp:
お偉方のお出迎えの仕事まで
時間があいてしまってね

dialogue_en: Huh! You...!
dialogue_jp: 君たち！

dialogue_en: Hi, how can I help you?
dialogue_jp: 次のお客様　どうぞ～！

dialogue_en: Uh...I-I don't think I'm allowed.
dialogue_jp: そうおっしゃいましても……

dialogue_en: We're expecting a very special Shinra client, so I came to offer an official welcome.
dialogue_jp:
神羅のお偉いさんが　いらっしゃるというから
出迎えにきたんですけどねえ

dialogue_en: Would it have killed them to tell me about all of these changes ahead of time?
dialogue_jp: 本社からの情報は　いつも適当すぎる！

dialogue_en: And then he expects me to drop everything because he arrived three hours early!
dialogue_jp:
到着は　２時間後と言っていたのに
３０分前には到着……

dialogue_en: He said he was coming by boat. So much for that!
dialogue_jp: 船で来ると言っていたのに　ヘリに変更

dialogue_en: Johnny!?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー？

dialogue_en: Come on, Johnny boy! You can still make it in time!
dialogue_jp: うおおお　間に合ってくれ～！

dialogue_en: Uh, Tifa?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　あれ……！

dialogue_en: Got it!
dialogue_jp: まかせなさい

dialogue_en: Your turn!
dialogue_jp: ティファ　おねがい！

dialogue_en: Come, my child.
dialogue_jp: じゃ　先に行くね

dialogue_en: Guide me, O Tifa.
dialogue_jp: ゆずりあい　ゆずりあい

dialogue_en: Follow me and you'll see.
dialogue_jp: うん　ついてきて

dialogue_en: Where to next, Tifa?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　よろしく！

dialogue_en: I know just the place.
dialogue_jp: へへ　まかせて！

dialogue_en: Where should we go next...?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　どこいこっか？

dialogue_en: I'd be delighted.
dialogue_jp: うん　ではでは

dialogue_en:
Don't look at me like that!
I'm not some...some sellout!
dialogue_jp: 俺はもう　ドブを這いずり回るネズミじゃない！

dialogue_en: After everything he's done for me, I gotta.
dialogue_jp: あの人は　俺の恩人だから

dialogue_en: Mayor's orders...
dialogue_jp: 市長の命令さ

dialogue_en: You're working for Shinra now? After all that talk about how much you hate them?
dialogue_jp:
ジョニー
あんなに神羅のこと　嫌ってたじゃない

dialogue_en: Seriously?
dialogue_jp: 神羅って……

dialogue_en: Luggage for a Shinra executive. Gotta make sure it gets to his hotel safe and sound...
dialogue_jp:
神羅の重役の荷物だよ
これから　ホテルまで運ぶところだ

dialogue_en: That's our question. And what's with the bag?
dialogue_jp: ジョニーこそ　それ　どうしたの？

dialogue_en: Tifa? Aerith? What're the two of you doin' here?
dialogue_jp:
ティファ　エアリス
なんで　こんなところに

dialogue_en: Then why are we here?
dialogue_jp: えっ　お出迎えは？

dialogue_en: Well...already checked into the hotel, apparently.
dialogue_jp: それが　もうホテルにいるんだって

dialogue_en: Ugh, where is this guy?
dialogue_jp: う～ん　まだかしら

dialogue_en: Close─he wears white!
dialogue_jp: 白衣がステキなんだって！

dialogue_en: Maybe he's a silver fox!
dialogue_jp: ダンディなオジサマなんでしょ？

dialogue_en: I wonder what kinda guy this "bigwig" is.
dialogue_jp: 神羅の重役って　どんな人かしら

dialogue_en: Perhaps I'll just head to the hotel and get the room ready.
dialogue_jp: お泊まりのホテルへ行って　おもてなしをせねば

dialogue_en: Human beauty is...hard for me to assess.
dialogue_jp: 人間の美醜は　私にはわかりかねる

dialogue_en: That your way of complimenting us?
dialogue_jp: ほめて……くれてるんだよね？

dialogue_en: And you, Aerith...are as luminous as a sea snail.
dialogue_jp: エアリスは　マキガイのようにまきまきだな

dialogue_en: And Aerith as...diaphanous as a jellyfish.
dialogue_jp: エアリスは　クラゲのように柔軟だな

dialogue_en: Tifa looks...as majestic as a breaching whale.
dialogue_jp: ティファは　クジラのようにおおらかで

dialogue_en: Tifa, you look...as sleek as a dolphin.
dialogue_jp: ティファは　イルカのようにしなやかで

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: Well, Red? How do we look?
dialogue_jp: レッド　どうかな？

dialogue_en: Do you even have to ask?
dialogue_jp: かっこよくね

dialogue_en: Ready to rock?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　いこ！

dialogue_en: Yeah. You're right.
dialogue_jp: そう……だね

dialogue_en: We should go.
dialogue_jp: 戻ろっか

dialogue_en: You might wanna go first.
dialogue_jp: クラウドも　真っ赤になりそう

dialogue_en: Sunscreen? Is that really all you have to say to us?
dialogue_jp: もっとなんか　ないの？

dialogue_en: Speaking of which, you guys should probably put on...s-sunscreen.
dialogue_jp: 気をつけろ　焼きすぎると痛い　あとでな

dialogue_en: It's just hot...in the sun.
dialogue_jp: ここは……その　日射しが強い

dialogue_en: Uh... No, nothing...
dialogue_jp: ああ　いや……

dialogue_en: Cloud? Something wrong?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　どうかした？

dialogue_en: Look at these two, not even tryin' to blend in. Honestly...
dialogue_jp: 緊張感ってモンがねえぜ　まったく

dialogue_en: Did you miss us?
dialogue_jp: おまたせ～！

dialogue_en: Rest assured, I'm not here for Aerith.
dialogue_jp: 今日の目的は　エアリスじゃない

dialogue_en: What a wonderful surprise it is to see you again.
dialogue_jp: なんだ　君たちも来ていたのかね

dialogue_en: Hojo...
dialogue_jp: 宝条……

dialogue_en: Back it up.
dialogue_jp: ほら　さがって

dialogue_en: Make way, people.
dialogue_jp: ほら　道あけろ

dialogue_en: Okay. Can you get my back then?
dialogue_jp: オイル　ぬりっこしちゃう？

dialogue_en: Think I'm pretty good as-is.
dialogue_jp: 日焼け対策は　万全かな

dialogue_en: That's some sage advice, Mr. Pasty.
dialogue_jp: ヒリヒリで　ひゅ～ひゅ～だね！

dialogue_en:
Oh! Or you─you could be my partner!
Would that be okay?
dialogue_jp:
ダメだというなら　君！
君が　パートナーになってくれないか

dialogue_en:
What is this arbitrary rule?
Can't you make an exception just this once!?
dialogue_jp:
そこをなんとか～
ひとりでも　参加させてもらえないだろうか

dialogue_en: Find all the cactuars hidden around town, and you'll be capering right along with them in this fun contest!
dialogue_jp:
ハッピーテンダーは幸せの証
コスタで小さな幸せを見つけましょう！

dialogue_en: Register here for the great Cactuar Caper!
dialogue_jp:
『ハッピーテンダーチャレンジ』の
受付は　こちらで～す！

dialogue_en: Anyway, what can Johnny's Seaside Inn do for you?
dialogue_jp:
今後とも　シーサイド・ジョニーを
よろしくお願いします！

dialogue_en: Oops, sorry if I seem like I'm on cloud nine. It's just so wonderful to work with the man of my dreams.
dialogue_jp:
あれ？　私　浮かれちゃってますね
あこがれの人のそばで働けるのが嬉しくって

dialogue_en: Hang loose! I'm the new girl, Jenny.
dialogue_jp: コスタ～！　新人のジェニーです

dialogue_en: Whatever, it's fine. Do what you want, but don't you even think about taking my job.
dialogue_jp:
まあいいけど
でもね　この仕事は絶対ゆずらないから

dialogue_en: Tifa? You here to see Johnny?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　ジョニー君に会いにきたの？

dialogue_en: But I'm having such a blast working that there isn't time for anything else. Maybe when things calm down.
dialogue_jp:
でもね　いまは仕事が楽しくて
恋は　ちょっと後まわしかな

dialogue_en: Thanks to you, Johnny and I got a little closer, and...well, one thing led to another.
dialogue_jp:
結局　こういうことになったの
あなたたちが背中を押してくれたおかげ
あっ！

dialogue_en: Hang loose! Try Johnny's Seaside Travel Service!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ～！　シーサイド・ジョニー
ファストトラベルです

dialogue_en: Think about it: you could help give birth to the world's next hero!
dialogue_jp: そう　新たなる英雄の創造だ

dialogue_en: And, as luck would have it, I'm in need of a few female assistants.
dialogue_jp:
いま考えている実験には
女の助手が必要でね

dialogue_en: Wow, that's quite an offer!
dialogue_jp: ええ～　どうしよう～？

dialogue_en: So, what say you? Care to join me in the lab? If you girls sign up with Shinra, you'll be set for life!
dialogue_jp:
どうだ　私の助手にならんかね？
生活は神羅カンパニーが生涯保障しよう

dialogue_en: One starring you, perhaps.
dialogue_jp: 君も参加するかね？

dialogue_en: a very "special" show is about to start.
dialogue_jp: これから　私の見世物が始まる

dialogue_en: Oh, I won't. At any rate...
dialogue_jp: それより……

dialogue_en: Don't hold your breath!
dialogue_jp: お断りします

dialogue_en:
Though, were she to offer her assistance,
I'd gladly accept.
dialogue_jp:
もちろん　協力してくれるというのなら
歓迎するがね

dialogue_en: Seeya!
dialogue_jp: じゃあね！

dialogue_en: Yeah!
dialogue_jp: ジェニー

dialogue_en: So I might as well shoot my shot then, huh?
dialogue_jp: それに　私の気持ちは変わらないもの

dialogue_en:
I'm glad we got all this straightened out.
Plus, now I know Johnny's a free man!
dialogue_jp:
ティファと話して　ジョニー君のことが
まえよりわかった気がするし

dialogue_en: Anyway, thanks for the card.
dialogue_jp: うん　アモールしてみるね

dialogue_en: Sorry, forget I said anything.
dialogue_jp: ああ　ごめん　気にしないで

dialogue_en: Nothing like that.
dialogue_jp: ちがうよ

dialogue_en: Oh, so you're foisting him on me─is that it?
dialogue_jp: あっ　私にジョニー君を押しつける気でしょ

dialogue_en: I would feel a lot better if he had someone to back him up─keep him out of trouble.
dialogue_jp:
だから　彼のことを見ていてくれる人がいれば
安心だなって思って

dialogue_en:
And of course, he also has
a habit of getting carried away.
dialogue_jp:
それでね　ジョニーって
なにかと危なっかしいでしょ

dialogue_en: True.
dialogue_jp: うんうん

dialogue_en: You know he likes to exaggerate.
dialogue_jp: 彼　そういうところあるよね

dialogue_en:
For real? But the way he talks about you,
I figured you were...
dialogue_jp: ほんと？　ジョニー君の話と違うな

dialogue_en: So you heeded the call too, did you?
dialogue_jp: 君も呼ばれて来たのだろう

dialogue_en: Care to savor some of the local delicacies, Professor? Here─open wide!
dialogue_jp:
博士　あま～いフルーツはいかが？
は～い　ア～ン！

dialogue_en: Say, Professor. How about I polish those glasses for you?
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　そのメガネ……
あたしに磨かせてくださらない？

dialogue_en: There's nothing sexier than a man in a white coat.
dialogue_jp: 博士の白衣　セクシーでステキ

dialogue_en: There you are, Professor! So glad you could make it. I trust my girls are making you feel welcome?
dialogue_jp:
よ～うこそいらっしゃいました　博士！
娘たちは　気に入っていただけましたか

dialogue_en: I'm afraid this area has been reserved.
dialogue_jp: ここから先は　貸切だ

dialogue_en: Too lofty for me, but it sounds amazing!
dialogue_jp: よくわかんないけど　すご～い！

dialogue_en: Do you follow? It's admittedly a lofty concept.
dialogue_jp: 君に理解できるかね？

dialogue_en: But he is not a "hero" by virtue of innate greatness. Only by inspiring others does he earn the title.
dialogue_jp:
英雄は　資質や功績だけではなく
印象に対して与えられる称号だからな

dialogue_en: Before a hero strikes down his foe, he must strike them with awe at his beauty.
dialogue_jp:
英雄には　万人がひれふす
美しさが必要なのだ

dialogue_en: That would be so cool!
dialogue_jp: さっすが　博士～！

dialogue_en:
That, my friends, is for me to know...
and for you to find out!
dialogue_jp: さあ　実験ショーの開幕だ！

dialogue_en: What the hell are you playin' at?
dialogue_jp: おい　なにする気だ？

dialogue_en: Yessir.
dialogue_jp: は～い！

dialogue_en: Uh... Line 'em up!
dialogue_jp: 並べろ！

dialogue_en: As you can see, your brothers down there are having a little get-together.
dialogue_jp: 見たまえ　君の兄弟たちも集まってきたぞ

dialogue_en: Not consciously, then.
dialogue_jp: 自覚がないのか？

dialogue_en: What're you talkin' about?
dialogue_jp: なんの話だ

dialogue_en:
I think you've got the wrong idea.
Johnny and I are just friends─nothing more.
dialogue_jp:
誤解してるみたいだけど
私とジョニーは　ただの友達だよ

dialogue_en:
This one's for you─and Johnny.
I bet you'll have "amor" fun together.
dialogue_jp:
ステキな服に着替えて
ジョニーとアモールしちゃう？

dialogue_en: Wha?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: Thanks, but that's way too generous.
dialogue_jp:
アモールカード
１枚は　あなたが使って

dialogue_en: Hold up!
dialogue_jp: 待って！

dialogue_en: There's two cards there, so... Have fun!
dialogue_jp: ２枚あるから使ってね　じゃあ

dialogue_en: My way of saying sorry. Take 'em.
dialogue_jp: 迷惑かけちゃったおわびに　これ

dialogue_en: Here.
dialogue_jp: ジェニー

dialogue_en: There's no way I could ever compete with you.
dialogue_jp: あなたがステキすぎて　かないっこないもの

dialogue_en: I've decided. I'm going to give up on Johnny.
dialogue_jp: 私　ジョニー君のことはあきらめる

dialogue_en: Jenny really owes ya one.
dialogue_jp: ジェニーに　なにかおごってもらいな

dialogue_en: Hey, great work. Thanks.
dialogue_jp:
おう　ご苦労さん
ありがとな

dialogue_en: That girl is such a headache.
dialogue_jp: ジェニーにも　困ったもんだ

dialogue_en: Yes, yes! Only a reunion could produce such results!
dialogue_jp: 見事だ　これぞリユニオンの力！

dialogue_en: Wha─! Not cool, man! Not cool!
dialogue_jp: なんだよ　コレ！

dialogue_en: Leave any wheelies you find in the parking lots.
dialogue_jp:
街中のウィリーを
駐車場に入れといてくれよ

dialogue_en: Stop being so nice! I can't take it!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　いい人すぎる
恥ずかしい！

dialogue_en:
Jenny! Over here!
We brought all the wheelies back for you.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　ジェニー！
ウィリーの回収　終わったよ

dialogue_en: I've been going about this all wrong, haven't I?
dialogue_jp: 私　誤解してたな

dialogue_en: Good god, it's just some dumb wheelies─why does she care? Ugh, of course Johnny would fall for a girl like her!
dialogue_jp:
真心を込めた丁寧な仕事っぷり
ああジョニー君　そりゃ好きになるよね

dialogue_en: If I'm impressed, what must Johnny think of her!?
dialogue_jp: そりゃ　ジョニー君も惚れるわけね

dialogue_en: Perfectly executed─again. And she even made it easy for the next person to grab one.
dialogue_jp:
ここもバッチリ　しかも
次の人が使いやすいようにって気遣いまで

dialogue_en:
Is that what Johnny wants in a woman?
An overachiever?
dialogue_jp:
ジョニー君は　ティファの
ああいうところに惹かれたのね

dialogue_en: She did a perfect job. But why?
dialogue_jp: 完璧な仕事　デキる女……

dialogue_en: And don't worry: you can leave it wherever you like when you're done. Our staff will collect it later.
dialogue_jp:
ウィリーは　乗り捨てちゃって大丈夫です
あとでスタッフが回収しておきますんで

dialogue_en:
We've got Wheelies-4-U!
Feel free to grab any of our rides.
dialogue_jp:
ウィリー・フォーユー！
どうぞ　ご自由にご利用ください

dialogue_en: Save your aching feet and ride a wheelie instead!
dialogue_jp:
歩き疲れるまえに
ウィリーはどうですか？

dialogue_en: Tour Costa del Sol in style with our wheelies!
dialogue_jp:
コスタをまわるなら
ウィリーが便利ですよ！

dialogue_en: Let's get those wheelies.
dialogue_jp: さっさと終わらせるね

dialogue_en: Like us.
dialogue_jp: 許さない！

dialogue_en: Someone has to stop them.
dialogue_jp: やつら　好き放題だな

dialogue_en: Fine!
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ！

dialogue_en: Now's not the time.
dialogue_jp: みんなを助けよう

dialogue_en: Barret!
dialogue_jp: バレット！

dialogue_en: Sick bastard... I'll kill you!
dialogue_jp: きっさまあああ！

dialogue_en: At long last, I have specimens worthy of my attention!
dialogue_jp: そうそう　この状態の検体が欲しかったのだよ

dialogue_en: We're so glad you changed your mind, Aerith.
dialogue_jp: あらためて歓迎するよ　エアリス

dialogue_en: How serendipitous! Our Ancient, returned to the fold.
dialogue_jp: これはいい　古代種まで捕獲できるとは！

dialogue_en: Try and stop us!
dialogue_jp: バレット

dialogue_en: We will!
dialogue_jp: わかってる！

dialogue_en: Gotta stop 'em here.
dialogue_jp: ここで食い止める

dialogue_en: Yeah.
dialogue_jp: おう！

dialogue_en: They're goin' down.
dialogue_jp: 倒すしかない

dialogue_en: Or maybe I just want peace of mind. I guess.
dialogue_jp: まあ　自己満足　気休め？

dialogue_en:
So I figure, maybe if I do this for Jenny,
I'll have given him back something.
dialogue_jp:
だから　ジェニーに良くすれば
すこしは罪滅ぼしになるかなって

dialogue_en: I know, but...I still feel like I owe it to Johnny.
dialogue_jp: ジョニーには　いろいろ責任感じちゃうの

dialogue_en: You don't have to please everyone you meet.
dialogue_jp: 人がいいにも　ほどがある

dialogue_en: Yeah, sure. We'll do it.
dialogue_jp: わかりました　やります

dialogue_en: Since she quit, would you mind picking up the rest of the wheelies for me?
dialogue_jp:
どうだろう　代わりに
ウィリーの回収を頼めないかな

dialogue_en: So, you're friends with her, right?
dialogue_jp: あんたら　ジェニーの友達だろ？

dialogue_en: Ugh... Shoulda known this would happen.
dialogue_jp: ああ　またこの流れか……

dialogue_en: Screw this! I quit!
dialogue_jp: 私　辞めます！

dialogue_en: I'm just giving you work.
dialogue_jp: 見下しちゃいないだろ

dialogue_en: Don't tell me what to do! Ugh! How come everyone here thinks they're better than me?
dialogue_jp:
怒鳴らないで！
もう　みんなして私を見下すんだから

dialogue_en:
Hey, Jenny! Don't just stand there!
Go get the unreturned wheelies.
dialogue_jp:
おい　ジェニー！
サボってないで　とっととウィリーを回収してこい

dialogue_en: That some kinda humblebrag!?
dialogue_jp: なにそれ　自慢？

dialogue_en:
Might you be interested in
bringing a new hero to life?
dialogue_jp: 君　英雄の創造に興味はないかね？

dialogue_en: Hmm, a promising specimen... Splendid!
dialogue_jp: ほう　新しい検体か……悪くない

dialogue_en: Dammit!
dialogue_jp: しまった！

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド！

dialogue_en: I, uh... I get this all the time.
dialogue_jp: こういうこと　よくあるから

dialogue_en: It's fine.
dialogue_jp: いいの　いいの

dialogue_en: Um, excuse me? Stow the 'tude.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ちょっと　失礼じゃない？

dialogue_en: I have no idea what he sees in you.
dialogue_jp: なんで　私がフラれちゃうのかな

dialogue_en:
Someone...metropolitan─and chic!
Who lights up every room she walks into.
dialogue_jp:
もっと　ミッドガルの　キラキラの
ステキな女を想像してたんだけど

dialogue_en: See, I was expecting someone very different.
dialogue_jp: ジョニー君から聞いてたのと　ずいぶん違う

dialogue_en: What a disappointment.
dialogue_jp: べつに　普通じゃないの

dialogue_en: You're not quoting Johnny, are you?
dialogue_jp: それって　ジョニー？

dialogue_en: "Oh, Tifa... My light, my love! Nay, my everything!"
dialogue_jp:
『ああティファ　キミこそオレの女神
　愛しのマイハニー！』

dialogue_en: Huh? Yes, I am...
dialogue_jp: えっ？　そうだけど……

dialogue_en: Not so fast!
dialogue_jp: そうはいかないよ！

dialogue_en: That's all of them. And thus I take my leave.
dialogue_jp: これで全員か　そろそろ引き上げるとしよう

dialogue_en:
Might you be interested in
bringing a new hero to life?
dialogue_jp: 君　英雄の創造に興味はないかね？

dialogue_en:
Hmmm...a promising specimen...
Splendid!
dialogue_jp: ほう　新しい検体か……悪くない

dialogue_en:
Oho! And then there was one.
Come along quietly now!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　あとはおまえだけだ
おとなしく捕まるがいい

dialogue_en: Perhaps you've forgotten the tricks I taught you? Reeducation may be in order then.
dialogue_jp:
教えた芸は覚えているか？
また　かわいがってやるぞ

dialogue_en: If it isn't Specimen 13! Still sprightly as ever, I see.
dialogue_jp: おまえは１３号　元気そうだな

dialogue_en: A pity you did not inherit more of your mother's physical characteristics. That woman was gorgeous right down to her genes!
dialogue_jp:
おまえも　母親ほど美しければな
イファルナは細胞まで凜としていたぞ

dialogue_en: And a living sample is preferable.
dialogue_jp: できれば　生きている状態がいい

dialogue_en: My interest in you, Aerith, is purely structural─cellular, to be precise.
dialogue_jp:
エアリス　欲しいのは
おまえの組織……細胞だ

dialogue_en: Unlike my colleagues, I've no desire to pursue fairy tales.
dialogue_jp: 私は　約束の地など興味がなくてね

dialogue_en: I ask your compliance, future specimens. For the sake of the scientific process.
dialogue_jp:
まとめて　実験に使ってやろう
無駄な抵抗はやめたまえ

dialogue_en: You aren't the specimen I was seeking, but I'm sure the data you'll provide will be fascinating nonetheless.
dialogue_jp:
クックック……想定外の状況ではあるが
なかなか　面白いデータが取れそうだ

dialogue_en: Let me...go!
dialogue_jp: 離して……！

dialogue_en: Who, me?
Over here!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Huh?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Hey, you! Mr. Mopey!
dialogue_jp: お～い　そこのお兄さん！

dialogue_en: I did this... This is all my fault...
dialogue_jp: 俺が　俺のせいで……

dialogue_en: But I've got an idea. Do me a favor─keep it busy!
dialogue_jp:
アタシに考えがあるから
時間かせぎ　ヨロシクね！

dialogue_en: That thing's not gonna go down easy.
dialogue_jp: このまま戦っても　キリがない

dialogue_en: Nah, you did good.
dialogue_jp: いや　助かった

dialogue_en: Spoil your comeback?
dialogue_jp: お呼びじゃなかった？

dialogue_en: "Tifa"? You're not from Sector 7, are you? In Midgar?
dialogue_jp:
ティファ？
もしかしてミッドガルの？　スラムの？

dialogue_en: You're kidding me! What should we do instead, Tifa?
dialogue_jp:
そんな～！
ティファ　どうしよう？

dialogue_en:
I'm so sorry.
We, like, just stopped our wheelie rentals for the day.
dialogue_jp:
すみません　今日の受付は
もう締め切っちゃったんですよ～

dialogue_en: Oh! You taking part in Wheelie Rendezvous?
dialogue_jp: 『ウィリーでランデブー』のお客さんですか？

dialogue_en: All of our Rendezvous wheelies are taken right now, folks!
dialogue_jp:
ランデブーのウィリーは
すべて　貸出中で～す

dialogue_en: Wheelie Rendezvous is now closed for the day! We'll see you tomorrow, folks!
dialogue_jp:
ウィリーでランデブー
本日の受付は終了しました～！

dialogue_en: I'm really sorry, but your ticket doesn't cover this attraction. Maybe another time?
dialogue_jp:
ごめんなさい　お兄さんのチケットじゃ
参加できないですね～

dialogue_en: Sorry, but we're still setting things up. Come back later!
dialogue_jp: 『ラン・ワイルド』は　ただいま準備中で～す

dialogue_en:
It was the finest meat I have ever tasted.
Thank you.
dialogue_jp: 私史上最高だ　ごちそうさま

dialogue_en: Was it just as good as you were hoping?
dialogue_jp: どう　おいしい？

dialogue_en:
And for your owner, a companion card!
Make sure to come back soon!
dialogue_jp:
飼い主さんには『アモールカード』のプレゼント
また来てね～！

dialogue_en: Good boy! That was amazing!
dialogue_jp: グッド・ボーイ　よかったね！

dialogue_en: And gotcha!
dialogue_jp: かかったな！

dialogue_en: What the─?
dialogue_jp: なんだあ？

dialogue_en: Johnny...? No─don't!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー　だめ　危ない！

dialogue_en: Let's wrap this up.
dialogue_jp: ふん　潮時だな

dialogue_en:
You wanna help 'em, don'tcha?
Then you'd better hold still!
dialogue_jp:
助けたいんでしょ
ちょ～っと　手伝え！

dialogue_en: Grr...
dialogue_jp: グウ……

dialogue_en: See ya later!
dialogue_jp: グッド・ボーイ！

dialogue_en: Come back soon!
dialogue_jp: また来てね～！

dialogue_en: It's time to unleash your inner beast! Don't hold back!
dialogue_jp: さあ　キミの野性を解放しよう！

dialogue_en: Now's your chance to run wild!
dialogue_jp: 元気いっぱい　走りまわっちゃおう！

dialogue_en: Come back once you're good and ready!
dialogue_jp: 準備ができたら　また来てね！

dialogue_en:
My, what beautiful red fur you have!
Ready to run wild? Then step right up!
dialogue_jp:
ようこそ　元気な赤毛さん
思いっきり　走りまわっちゃおう！

dialogue_en: Then I say go for it!
dialogue_jp: やるしかない　ね！

dialogue_en: You want some?
dialogue_jp: 食べたいの？

dialogue_en: No... I can't blame him for our actions. I know I should strive to maintain my composure around him, but...
dialogue_jp:
いや　我々のせいか
ヤツのことになると平静でいられなくなる

dialogue_en: It's because of Hojo this place is in ruins.
dialogue_jp: 宝条のせいで　滅茶苦茶だな

dialogue_en: Let him go. We've done enough.
dialogue_jp: これ以上は　やめよう

dialogue_en: Victory!
dialogue_jp: おそまつ！

dialogue_en: Behold! Justice is served!
dialogue_jp: 忍法　青天のヘキレキ！

dialogue_en: Grr...
dialogue_jp: ぐるるる……

dialogue_en: So, do we have any takers? Don't be shy now!
dialogue_jp: さあ　挑戦者はいるかな～？

dialogue_en:
Today's first-place prize is none other than...
Costa del Sol's famous tropical meat!
dialogue_jp:
本日の優勝賞品は　なんと～
コスタ特製スペシャルトロピカルミートで～す！

dialogue_en: Hn...hah? Hnf!
dialogue_jp: ハッ　ハァハァ……！

dialogue_en: Got a furry friend who needs to burn off some energy? Come to Run Wild!
dialogue_jp:
元気な動物さんたち
『ラン・ワイルド』へ集まれ～！

dialogue_en: Welcome to Run Wild, a paradise for animals big and small!
dialogue_jp:
動物さんたちの楽園
『ラン・ワイルド』へようこそ～！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh... Sorry, but this ticket is for a different game.
dialogue_jp:
あら　このチケットじゃ
うちのゲームは遊べないよ

dialogue_en: I hate to say this, but we're closed at the moment. Please come back later.
dialogue_jp:
ごめんなさい　いまは準備中なの
また来てちょうだいね

dialogue_en:
We also offer one-on-one matches though,
so don't worry about it.
dialogue_jp:
ひとりで対戦できるコースもあるから
気晴らしに遊んでって

dialogue_en: Oh my. Shot you down?
dialogue_jp: あら　フラれちゃったの？

dialogue_en: Anyway, I'm sure we'll see each other around sometime. Good luck!
dialogue_jp:
どこかでまた会えるのを
楽しみにしてるわ　じゃあね！

dialogue_en: Though I did run into you.
dialogue_jp: あなたは　そのひとり

dialogue_en:
Sadly, I don't meet many people
who can teach me much.
dialogue_jp:
わたしの予想を超えてくるバウターは
なかなかいない

dialogue_en: Would much rather spend that time upping my game.
dialogue_jp: また　新しいバウト場を探さなきゃ

dialogue_en:
Unlike me.
I couldn't do a damn thing for those poor bastards.
dialogue_jp: オレは　あいつらになんもしてやれなかった

dialogue_en:
Hate to say it, but that girl really
came through for us back there.
dialogue_jp: なんだかんだ　ユフィに助けられちまったな

dialogue_en: You should go check on the others.
dialogue_jp: みんなのところへ　行ってやれ

dialogue_en: I'd...like to be alone now.
dialogue_jp: しばらく　ひとりにしてくれ

dialogue_en:
Yeah, you should.
You could've handled things better back there.
dialogue_jp: そうだな　もっとうまくやれたかもしれない

dialogue_en: True. Not comforting, but true.
dialogue_jp: そうだな　そういうことにしておこう

dialogue_en:
We had no choice. Things would've turned out
worse if we hadn't stepped in.
dialogue_jp:
戦わなければ　もっと被害が出ていた
仕方ないさ

dialogue_en: Your fists and my fangs.
dialogue_jp: ああ　次は噛み切ってやる

dialogue_en:
Don't sweat it. Anyone would wanna
punch that smug asshole. I know I do.
dialogue_jp:
気にするな　目の前であんなことをされれば
誰だって同じだ

dialogue_en:
Feels like it's been ages since I mixed a drink─
since Seventh Heaven.
dialogue_jp:
セブンスヘブンでシェーカーを振ってたのが
すごく昔の事みたい

dialogue_en:
Used to make 'em back at the bar, and here I am─
drinking one in its namesake.
dialogue_jp:
お店でも　たまに作ってたんだ
いつか行けたらいいねって

dialogue_en: Costa del Sol.
dialogue_jp: 『コスタ・デル・ソル』

dialogue_en: Couldn't find the bartender, so I, uh, helped myself.
dialogue_jp: お店の人が見つからないから　勝手に作っちゃった

dialogue_en: Hope I get to bring Marlene here someday... I know she'd love it.
dialogue_jp: きれーな海　マリンにも見せてやりてえなあ

dialogue_en: You kiddin' me? That right there's an excuse─fatalistic bullshit folks use to make themselves feel better.
dialogue_jp:
いまさら　その言葉を持ち出すのかよ
言い訳にしたって　お粗末すぎるぜ

dialogue_en: Can't save everyone. Mighta just been their time.
dialogue_jp: そういう運命だったんだ　きっと

dialogue_en: Damn straight. That asshole's gotta pay for his sins─and it's up to us to make sure he does!
dialogue_jp:
あいつを　このままにしておくワケにはいかねえ
必ず後悔させてやる

dialogue_en: You shouldn't blame yourself. This is on Hojo.
dialogue_jp: なにもかも　悪いのは宝条だ

dialogue_en:
You trying to cheer me up?
Now I've seen everything.
dialogue_jp: てめえに言われるたあな　焼きが回ったぜ

dialogue_en: You tried. That's all you can do─and all that matters if you ask me.
dialogue_jp:
助けてやりたいと思った
その気持ちが　大事なんだろ？

dialogue_en: I appreciate the sentiment, but─I don't play matches I already know I'm gonna win.
dialogue_jp:
おあいにくさま
勝つってわかってる試合を続ける気はないの

dialogue_en: That's a funny way of asking for a favor.
dialogue_jp: それって　もしかして誘ってる？

dialogue_en: I could be persuaded to go again...
dialogue_jp: まだやるなら　つきあってもいい

dialogue_en:
Thanks for being my partner.
Haven't had that much fun in a while.
dialogue_jp: ありがと　なかなか面白い経験になったわ

dialogue_en: Come back whenever you like.
dialogue_jp: また　遊びにきてちょうだいね

dialogue_en:
Congratulations!
You two sure know how to win in style.
dialogue_jp:
おめでとう！
ふたりとも　すばらしいバウトだったわ

dialogue_en: I gotta say, that's pretty weak.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　カッコ悪いよ？

dialogue_en: You're not gonna just turn tail and run, are you?
dialogue_jp: まさか　逃げるんじゃないでしょうね

dialogue_en: Gonna pull it together for the next one?
dialogue_jp: 次こそ　勝てるわよね？

dialogue_en: ...And now my victory means nothing. Thanks.
dialogue_jp:
はあ　わたしの時間を
無駄にしないでほしいわ

dialogue_en: Do you even know the rules!?
dialogue_jp: ぜんぜん　わかってない！

dialogue_en: Why is he playing this out?
dialogue_jp: もう　時間の無駄

dialogue_en: And when exactly did you promise him that?
dialogue_jp: いつの間に　そんな約束したの？

dialogue_en: At least, that's what I promised Barret.
dialogue_jp: バレットとの約束なんだ

dialogue_en:
Next time I ask for a cocktail,
it'll be at the new Seventh Heaven.
dialogue_jp:
ティファのカクテルは
セブンスヘブンを再建してからだ

dialogue_en: Nah, I'm good.
dialogue_jp: いや　いい

dialogue_en: Hey, I can make one for you too, if you want.
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウドのぶんも作ろっか

dialogue_en: It was a figure of speech.
dialogue_jp: それは　わかってるけど……

dialogue_en: Hasn't been that long.
dialogue_jp: まだ　そんなに経ってない

dialogue_en: No telling what the future holds for us.
dialogue_jp: 気持ちは行ったり来たりしちゃうけどね

dialogue_en: But I also know I have to move on. At least for now.
dialogue_jp: でも　いまは進むしかないってわかってる

dialogue_en: Midgar? I mean, of course─someday.
dialogue_jp: お店？　それはもちろん

dialogue_en: Wanna go back?
dialogue_jp: 戻りたいか？

dialogue_en:
Yeah...
The deepest wounds never really heal.
dialogue_jp: うん　私も同じ

dialogue_en: It's a part of who we are. Whether we like it or not.
dialogue_jp: 忘れられない　つらかったことほど

dialogue_en: A lot─good and bad... Ever wish you could just snap your fingers and forget the worst stuff?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドは　忘れたいって思う？
つらいことや悲しいこと

dialogue_en: Yeah... Lot's happened since then.
dialogue_jp: そうだな　色々あったよな

dialogue_en: You're not.
dialogue_jp: 心配いらない

dialogue_en: They're just thoughts. Let 'em be dark 'n' ugly.
dialogue_jp: ただの想像だ　気の済むまでやればいい

dialogue_en:
I start thinking things so dark and ugly that...
it scares me.
dialogue_jp:
あんまりひどいこと考えて
自分が怖くなるくらい

dialogue_en:
Sometimes...I imagine the things I'd do to him
if I got the chance...
dialogue_jp: ときどき　復讐とか考えちゃうんだ

dialogue_en:
After all the pain and the horror he put us through...
I hate him.
dialogue_jp: だからわたし　あの人が憎い

dialogue_en:
He kidnapped us because she was a Cetra─
a "specimen" for his experiments. And after what he did to her...
dialogue_jp:
お母さん　セトラだからって
宝条に捕まって　ひどいことされて

dialogue_en: We were his prisoners. Me and my mom─Ifalna.
dialogue_jp: 本当のお母さん　イファルナっていうの

dialogue_en:
We've come so far...
but it still feels like Midgar's right behind us.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル……
この海の向こう　だよね

dialogue_en: Hope I can come back here someday. Stare at the ocean. Listen to the waves...
dialogue_jp:
いつか落ち着いたら
ただ海を見て　ぼーっとしたいね

dialogue_en: Alright, Mr. Secretive, you do you.
dialogue_jp: 内緒にする意味　わかりませんけど

dialogue_en: Sometime.
dialogue_jp: 内緒だ

dialogue_en: Good.
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: And when it does, I'll be counting on you.
dialogue_jp: その時は　よろしく

dialogue_en: Not until the moment arrives...
dialogue_jp: うん　そうだね

dialogue_en: No need to worry about the future till it comes.
dialogue_jp: その時の気持ちで決める

dialogue_en: Shall we?
dialogue_jp: 戻ろっか

dialogue_en: I appreciate it.
dialogue_jp: 頼もしい

dialogue_en: And whatever you decide, I'm with you.
dialogue_jp: 結論がどうだろうと　手伝う

dialogue_en: You'll know what to do.
dialogue_jp: その時の気持ちで

dialogue_en:
What I'm tryin' to say is...
worry about the future when it comes.
dialogue_jp: 先のことは　その時が来たら決めればいい

dialogue_en: Okay?
dialogue_jp: だって……

dialogue_en: Then don't think.
dialogue_jp: 考えすぎだ

dialogue_en: ...Is it? It doesn't feel normal.
dialogue_jp: わたしは　気にしちゃうな

dialogue_en: Everybody's got someone they hate. It's normal.
dialogue_jp:
他人を憎む気持ちは誰にだってある
気にするな

dialogue_en: You think so?
dialogue_jp: そうかな……

dialogue_en: Oh my god, Cloud... You are hopeless.
dialogue_jp: クラウド……ダメダメね

dialogue_en: Do us both a favor and just scoop.
dialogue_jp: やり直したほうが　はやそう

dialogue_en: Playing it pretty safe, I see.
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん……無難

dialogue_en: Still too early to tell.
dialogue_jp: まだ　わからないわね

dialogue_en: Huh... Interesting.
dialogue_jp: へえ　なるほど～

dialogue_en: Well, we'll see how that plays out.
dialogue_jp: まあ　ここは様子見ね

dialogue_en: Yikes, just...yikes.
dialogue_jp: う～ん　ダメね

dialogue_en: You play that on purpose?
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　なにやってるの？

dialogue_en: I'd never try that.
dialogue_jp: わたしなら　そうしない

dialogue_en: No, not that one.
dialogue_jp: ああ　そこ違う！

dialogue_en: Keep that up and you'll do fine.
dialogue_jp: いいよ　その調子

dialogue_en: Huh, didn't know you had it in you.
dialogue_jp: へえ　やるじゃない

dialogue_en: Coulda done worse, that's for sure.
dialogue_jp: まあ　悪くないかな

dialogue_en: You know, that's not bad.
dialogue_jp: その手　いいじゃない！

dialogue_en: Finish 'em off.
dialogue_jp: キメちゃってよ

dialogue_en: So, what's your next move?
dialogue_jp: どれにするのかな～？

dialogue_en: Well, guess this ends our fun in the sun.
dialogue_jp: バカンスの終わり　だね

dialogue_en: Fair enough. Gotta make the most of these moments.
dialogue_jp: たまの息抜きだ　みんなに声かけてやれ

dialogue_en: Hey, you ready to leave?
dialogue_jp: おう　もう行くのか？

dialogue_en: Screw...you...
dialogue_jp: 神羅の　ばかやろう……

dialogue_en: Screw you, Shinra! Screw you!
dialogue_jp: 神羅の　ばっかやろう～！

dialogue_en: Hey, Rufus! Take your mako and shove it up your ass!
dialogue_jp: 神羅の　ばっかやろう～～～！

dialogue_en: No...the company can't fire me if...if I fire myself first! Y'hear that!? I quit!
dialogue_jp:
あたしは決めたよ
もう……もう　会社なんて辞めてやる！

dialogue_en: Late to the party once again... Why do I even bother? I'm finished.
dialogue_jp:
また　出遅れてしまった……
あたしの神羅生命も　ここまでか

dialogue_en: It's moments like these we have to hold on to.
dialogue_jp: 忘れないよ　今日のこと

dialogue_en: Just you wait.
dialogue_jp: お見逃しなく

dialogue_en:
Can't say when you'll meet, but trust me,
you'll love her.
dialogue_jp: きっとすっごく　いい女だよ

dialogue_en: Not you. That was to her─my future self.
dialogue_jp: ううん　未来のわたしに頼んだ

dialogue_en: I am footloose and debt-free, baby!
dialogue_jp: 気づいたら　全部チャラ！

dialogue_en: And the crazy thing is, it worked. He caved.
dialogue_jp: って　女の子たちが市長に詰め寄って

dialogue_en: The girls told Kapono, "Keep leechin' off our hero and we'll smear your name so bad, Shinra'll kick you to the curb!"
dialogue_jp:
街を救ったヒーローを　これ以上カモにするなら
アンタの悪事　世界中に広めてやる～！

dialogue_en: So...
dialogue_jp: それが！

dialogue_en:
You borrowed a lot of money from him, right?
Will you be able to pay it back?
dialogue_jp:
お金　借りてるんだよね
返すあてはあるの？

dialogue_en: Ugh... I'm a moron... How could I be so blind?
dialogue_jp:
俺　だまされてたのに
なんも見えてなくて

dialogue_en: on the hotel and Mayor Kapono.
dialogue_jp: ホテルや　カポノ市長のこと

dialogue_en: I dunno... Ya see, a few kind girls who saw what happened on the beach gave me the lowdown...
dialogue_jp:
その……実は　俺の大活躍を見てた女の子たちが
教えてくれたんです

dialogue_en: You're the man of the hour.
dialogue_jp: おかげで助かった

dialogue_en: Never felt better.
dialogue_jp: このくらい　平気です！

dialogue_en: Johnny! Are you alright?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー　大丈夫なの？

dialogue_en: What's up, guys!
dialogue_jp: みなさ～ん！

dialogue_en: Johnny's famous Seasmell Inn...
dialogue_jp: 海から遠い　シーサイド・ジョニーな

dialogue_en: So back to the hotel?
dialogue_jp: ホテルに戻ろっか

dialogue_en: Yeah. Though "fun" ain't the word I'd use.
dialogue_jp: まあ　ち～っと騒ぎはあったけどな

dialogue_en: Well, good for you.
dialogue_jp: うん　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Uh... You okay there?
dialogue_jp: おいおい　大丈夫か

dialogue_en: Very funny, but I got plans─
dialogue_jp: せいいっぱい　おもてなしします

dialogue_en:
Ya know ya gotta get one star before
you can get the other six, right?
dialogue_jp: 今日のところは『星なしジョニー』だけどな

dialogue_en: Now that would be something.
dialogue_jp: うん　応援してる

dialogue_en: Proprietor of the Seaside Inn─soon-to-be seven-star resort hotel!
dialogue_jp:
必ずや　シーサイド・ジョニーを
７つ星のホテルにしてみせます！

dialogue_en: Johnny, the local hero...
dialogue_jp: コスタの英雄　ジョニー！

dialogue_en: That's great.
dialogue_jp: そりゃあ　いい！

dialogue_en:
Some know me as the world's greatest
materia hunter.
dialogue_jp: ある時は　凄腕マテリアハンター！

dialogue_en: And...action!
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Uh, hello? Aren't you all forgetting about someone?
dialogue_jp: みなさ～ん　アタシを忘れちゃいませんか？

dialogue_en: Always happy to help my one true bro!
dialogue_jp: アニキなら　いつでも歓迎します！

dialogue_en: But yeah, if you ever need to take a load off, just use whatever rooms're open.
dialogue_jp:
休むなら　ベッドとか部屋とか
自由に使っちゃってください

dialogue_en: As the phoenix rises from the ashes, so too shall my hotel rise from obscurity!
dialogue_jp:
シーサイド・ジョニー
こっから不死鳥のごとく蘇ってみせますよ！

dialogue_en: Be safe, you guys! Wouldn't want anything to happen to my inaugural guests. Bon voyage!
dialogue_jp:
お気をつけて行ってらっしゃいませ　お客様！
どうぞ良い旅を

dialogue_en: Corel it is.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちも行こう

dialogue_en: Corel, huh?
dialogue_jp: コレル山……

dialogue_en:
Tried to get the injured ones to stay
till they were healthy, but...
dialogue_jp:
ケガしてるヤツもいたんで
止めようとしたんですけど

dialogue_en:
Oh, those dudes shuffled off
toward Mt. Corel this morning.
dialogue_jp:
あいつらなら　今朝
コレル山のほうに行っちまいましたよ

dialogue_en: Gotta follow some robes.
dialogue_jp: 黒マントを追いかける

dialogue_en: Anyway...what's next for you guys?
dialogue_jp: アニキたちは　これからどうするんですか？

dialogue_en: Nah, I should be the one thanking you.
dialogue_jp: そんな　俺のほうこそ

dialogue_en: Thanks for everything.
dialogue_jp: 世話になった

dialogue_en: Now watch him fall up the stairs.
dialogue_jp: 先が思いやられるぜ

dialogue_en:
I mean, uh...we don't actually have to fight.
That is, unless you really want to?
dialogue_jp:
いや……べつに　戦わなくても
仲間になってあげないこともないんだけど

dialogue_en: Wait...seriously?
dialogue_jp: ほんとに　戦う気？

dialogue_en: Whaddya say?
dialogue_jp: どうだ！

dialogue_en: However─if you manage to somehow fluke your way to victory, this amazing ninja will agree to join you.
dialogue_jp:
そのかわり　万がいちあんたが勝ったら
このアタシが　仲間になってあげる

dialogue_en: If I win, you get the honor of serving yours truly!
dialogue_jp: アタシが勝ったら　アタシの手下になれ！

dialogue_en:
Where do ya think you're goin'!?
I challenge you to a duel!
dialogue_jp: そこのツンツン頭　アタシと勝負しろ！

dialogue_en: Hey! Hold it, you spiky-haired jerkface!
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　待て～い！

dialogue_en: Cool.
dialogue_jp: 行くぞ

dialogue_en: Wutai's white rose─the one and only Yuffie!
dialogue_jp: みんな大好き　ユフィちゃんだよ！

dialogue_en: But! Who am I truly?
dialogue_jp: はたして　その正体は――

dialogue_en: And the rest, a benevolent and beautiful ninja!
dialogue_jp: ある時は　おたすけ美少女忍者！

dialogue_en: Others, an unstoppable assassin.
dialogue_jp: ある時は　華麗なる暗殺者！

dialogue_en: Don't lose focus, y'hear me?
dialogue_jp: さあ　クラウドしっかり！

dialogue_en: C'mon, hit 'em where it hurts.
dialogue_jp: ほら　はやく攻めて

dialogue_en: We'll be waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: いつでも待ってるわ

dialogue_en: Come again.
dialogue_jp: またどうぞ

dialogue_en: You better not embarrass me, got it?
dialogue_jp: わたしに　恥をかかせないでね

dialogue_en: All we gotta do is win. It's that simple.
dialogue_jp: ただ勝てばいいの　簡単でしょ？

dialogue_en: I hope you have a great match.
dialogue_jp: 熱いバウトを　期待してるわ

dialogue_en: Welcome to Card Carnival!
dialogue_jp: 『カード・カーニバル』へようこそ！

dialogue_en: Lucky for you, I'm feeling generous. I'll stick around till we win.
dialogue_jp:
いいわ　勝つまでは
つきあってあげる

dialogue_en: Wait... You scared you're gonna lose?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　負けるのが怖い？

dialogue_en: C'mon, hurry it up already. You might have all the time in the world, but I don't.
dialogue_jp:
はやくしてね
わたし　あなたほどヒマじゃないの

dialogue_en: Whenever you change your mind, just let me know.
dialogue_jp: 準備ができたら　いつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: Wanna try your luck? Then step right on up.
dialogue_jp: さあ　次の挑戦者は誰かしら？

dialogue_en:
For I, the most beguiling of ninjas,
will be your new best friend!
dialogue_jp:
そんな　ビューティー忍者であるアタシが
仲間になってあげます！

dialogue_en: But! Have no fear, weaklings.
dialogue_jp: ここで　みなさんに朗報で～す！

dialogue_en: Of course you are. I mean, who wouldn't be intimidated by my awesome ninja skills?
dialogue_jp:
やっぱりそうか～！
まあ　アタシの実力を知ってれば当然か

dialogue_en: Abort! Abort! Tactical retreat!
dialogue_jp: 作戦失敗　ひとまず退散！

dialogue_en:
I mean, uh...we don't actually have to fight.
That is, unless you really want to?
dialogue_jp:
いや……べつに　戦わなくても
仲間になってあげないこともないんだけど

dialogue_en: Wait... Seriously?
dialogue_jp: ほんとに　戦う気？

dialogue_en:
What's the matter?
Afraid you're about to catch a beatdown?
dialogue_jp:
どうした　どうした？
アタシの強さに　ビビってんだろ！

dialogue_en: Sih, sih, hah!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュ！

dialogue_en:
Oh. It's like that, huh?
Where's your pride? Your fighting spirit!?
dialogue_jp:
逃げる気～？
勝負しろ　しろったらしろ！

dialogue_en: The hell is her deal?
dialogue_jp: なんなんだよ……

dialogue_en: Abort! Abort! Tactical retreat!
dialogue_jp: 作戦失敗　ひとまず退散！

dialogue_en: Think this through... Are you absolutely, one hundred percent certain you don't want me around to save your butts?
dialogue_jp:
ほんとに　ほんっとに
アタシを仲間に誘わなくていいの？

dialogue_en: H-hey! Where do you think you're going!?
dialogue_jp: やっぱり　ちょっと待った～！

dialogue_en:
Well, seeing as you're so desperate,
I guess I'll oblige ya.
dialogue_jp: しょうがないにゃ～　仲間になってやるか！

dialogue_en: I knew you'd say that!
dialogue_jp: そうこなくっちゃ！

dialogue_en: ...Sure.
dialogue_jp: そうだな

dialogue_en: Oh really? Fine then! It's your loss!
dialogue_jp: あっそ　フーンだ　勝手にしろ！

dialogue_en: Well? Bet you're thrilled, huh?
dialogue_jp: どう　うれしいでしょ？

dialogue_en: The other is having to carry people who suck. If you're gonna be on my team, I expect you to pull your own weight.
dialogue_jp:
パートナーに　足を引っ張られるなんてゴメンよ
今度こそやれるってとこ　見せてちょうだいね

dialogue_en:
That said, there are two things I can't stand.
One's losing...
dialogue_jp:
言うまでもなく
わたしが負けるわけはないけど

dialogue_en: With you on my team though, I doubt I'll have anything to worry about. Between the two of us, there's no one better at the game.
dialogue_jp:
あなたがパートナーならこの勝負　勝ったも同然ね
さっさと終わらせちゃいましょ

dialogue_en:
I'm sure this won't come as a shock,
but I didn't sign up to lose.
dialogue_jp:
言うまでもなく
わたしが負けるわけはないから

dialogue_en: Instead of the usual one-on-one format, we have to play in teams─which is why I'm glad you're here.
dialogue_jp:
ペアで　同時に勝ち抜かなきゃならなくて
わたしひとりじゃ参加できないってわけ

dialogue_en:
Just so you know,
the rules are different for this event.
dialogue_jp: このイベント　特別ルールのチーム戦なの

dialogue_en: And now you've found her.
dialogue_jp: パートナー成立

dialogue_en: I am.
dialogue_jp: まあな

dialogue_en:
Hey there. What's up?
Oh, lemme guess. Searching for an Amor partner?
dialogue_jp:
あら　奇遇ね
もしかして　あなたもパートナー探し中？

dialogue_en: So, you ready to draw some blood?
dialogue_jp: 熱いバウトを　楽しんでいかない？

dialogue_en: Want to play Card Carnival? It's Queen's Blood─with a twist!
dialogue_jp:
クイーンズ・ブラッドの殿堂
『カード・カーニバル』は　ここよ！

dialogue_en: Ah, no can do. I'm afraid you can't play this game with that type of ticket.
dialogue_jp:
悪いね　お客さんのチケットじゃ
うちのゲームは遊べないんだ

dialogue_en:
I'm very sorry, but we're still getting set up.
Please come back later.
dialogue_jp:
すみません　いまは準備中でして
またどうぞ！

dialogue_en:
Anyhow, I'm off to "enjoy" the beach.
Don't leave me hangin' too long, y'hear?
dialogue_jp:
んじゃ　オレは先にビーチへ行くぜ
着替えたら　とっととこいよ！

dialogue_en: ...Don't go.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと待て

dialogue_en: Really!? You won't!? Freakin' sweet!
dialogue_jp: ほんと？　やった～！

dialogue_en: If you really wanna, I won't stop you.
dialogue_jp: ついてきたいなら　勝手にしろ

dialogue_en:
I was joking! You gotta believe me!
Please let me be one of the gang!
dialogue_jp:
冗談　ジョーダンだって！
仲間にしてよお～

dialogue_en: Have fun.
dialogue_jp: ご自由に

dialogue_en: And you'll never, ever see me again!
dialogue_jp: ほんとの　ほんとだよ！

dialogue_en: Fine then! I know when to take a hint. You don't want me? I'll leave.
dialogue_jp:
いいもん　そういうことなら
ほんとに行っちゃうからね？

dialogue_en: Just let me in already!
dialogue_jp: なんでだ～！

dialogue_en:
Well, seeing as you're so desperate,
I guess I'll oblige ya.
dialogue_jp: しょうがないにゃ～　仲間になってやるか！

dialogue_en: I knew you'd say that!
dialogue_jp: そうこなくっちゃ！

dialogue_en: ...You can come with.
dialogue_jp: いっしょに来るか？

dialogue_en: Ah, you'll be fine. Fresh air, nice view...!
dialogue_jp:
よゆ～よゆ～！
景色を楽しめばいいんだよ

dialogue_en: So we've gotta walk?
dialogue_jp: 登れるかな

dialogue_en: Out of service...
dialogue_jp: 動いていないようだ

dialogue_en:
You won't regret this, or my name isn't
Yuffie Kisaragi!
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ・キサラギ
めいっぱい　がんばりま～す！

dialogue_en: But...I hear ya!
dialogue_jp: でも　りょ～かい！

dialogue_en: Yeesh!
dialogue_jp: こわっ！

dialogue_en: I'll shove you in the Sister Ray, point it at Wutai, and blast you back home.
dialogue_jp:
ジュノンの大砲に詰め込んで
ウータイめがけて　ぶっぱなしてやる

dialogue_en: You try anything funny─anything─
dialogue_jp: すこしでも　おかしなマネしたら

dialogue_en: Welcome to the team, Yuffie.
dialogue_jp: よろしくね　ユフィ

dialogue_en:
Well, seeing as you're so desperate,
I guess I'll oblige ya.
dialogue_jp: しょうがないにゃ～　仲間になってやるか！

dialogue_en: I knew you'd say that!
dialogue_jp: そうこなくっちゃ！

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: ああ？

dialogue_en: So that's the game... Fine. Permission to sing, sir?
dialogue_jp: あっそう　じゃあ　歌っていいですか？

dialogue_en: Yep.
dialogue_jp: そうだ

dialogue_en: What? So does that mean I gotta run everything by you first?
dialogue_jp: なんでも　許可が必要ってこと？

dialogue_en: You know, Yuffie, when you're part of a team, you can't just do whatever you feel like.
dialogue_jp:
ユフィ　オレたちはもう仲間だ
勝手なマネすんなよ

dialogue_en: Alright! Timeout's over, team! Let's go!
dialogue_jp: よっしゃ　はりきっていこー！

dialogue_en:
So...that means, wherever we find mako...
we'll find materia too!
dialogue_jp:
つまり　魔晄炉があるってことは
マテリアも……

dialogue_en: So?
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en:
Materia's, like...
super-condensed mako or something, right?
dialogue_jp: マテリアは魔晄が固まったものだって知ってる？

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud.
dialogue_jp: ユフィ

dialogue_en: Let's get a move on.
dialogue_jp: さあ　行こうぜ

dialogue_en: Right... You grew up around here, didn't you?
dialogue_jp: そっか　バレットはこのあたりに詳しいんだよね

dialogue_en: Not unless you enjoy starin' at ruined reactors.
dialogue_jp: あるのは　ぶっ壊れた魔晄炉だけだ

dialogue_en: The view ain't all that.
dialogue_jp: なんにもねえよ

dialogue_en:
Oh, come on, man...
Just drop the jaded act for a minute and take the compliment. I promise I won't tell.
dialogue_jp:
おまえなあ　素直に喜べよ
いまさらオレに気取るの　疲れんだろ

dialogue_en: It's his job to butter us up.
dialogue_jp: ふん　どうかな

dialogue_en: Ya hear that? "A sight to behold!"
dialogue_jp:
あははは！
オレとおまえが　ピカイチだとよ

dialogue_en:
The shooting─and the shouting─
was a sight to behold!
dialogue_jp:
今日の挑戦者の中でも
ピカイチのパートナーっぷりだ

dialogue_en: Well done, gentlemen! With play like that, you must've known each other for years.
dialogue_jp:
お見事～！
いやあ　射手と応援の息ピッタリ

dialogue_en:
Hot damn, give it up for us.
We make a great team!
dialogue_jp:
おいおい　やったな
すげえじゃねえか！

dialogue_en: Hey, that's nothin' to sneeze at.
dialogue_jp: まあ　上出来　じょーでき

dialogue_en:
Ain't the greatest, sure,
but we'll take what we can get.
dialogue_jp: かあ～　ギッリギリってとこか

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃちゃちゃちゃ～んちゃ～
ちゃ～ちゃっちゃちゃ～！

dialogue_en: I know you ain't the gamin' type, but ya gotta be a wet blanket too?
dialogue_jp:
お～い　そりゃねえぜ
クラウドさんよお

dialogue_en: You ain't quittin' on me, are ya? Let's go again!
dialogue_jp: お～い　このまま終わるつもりじゃねえよな？

dialogue_en: Duh nuh-nuh-nuh nuuuh, duh nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh-nuh nuh-nuuuh.♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃらちゃらちゃん
ちゃちゃ　ちゃらちゃらちゃ～ん……

dialogue_en: This is it─your moment! Show us what you're made of!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　フィナーレだ
決めてやれ！

dialogue_en: So, what, like a...fifty-five, forty-five split?
dialogue_jp: バツが４５で　マルが５５？

dialogue_en: Maybe a little more than that.
dialogue_jp: もうすこし　差があるかな

dialogue_en:
Yeah? By how much?
Like, 51% good guy to 49% jerkface?
dialogue_jp:
悪いところが４９で
良いところが５１みたいな？

dialogue_en: His good qualities outweigh the bad.
dialogue_jp: でも　いいところのほうが多いよ

dialogue_en:
Tifa, tell me your secret.
How d'you put up with this jerkface?
dialogue_jp: ティファ　よくこんな人と一緒に戦ってきたね

dialogue_en: That's an abuse of power! Tyrant! Tyrant!
dialogue_jp: 横暴　おーぼー！

dialogue_en: Sure! You can do it while you're warmin' the bench!
dialogue_jp: うるせえー！　全部　ダメだ！

dialogue_en: Well? Do I get permission or not?
dialogue_jp: ねえねえねえ　いいですか！

dialogue_en: Whoops! Didn't get permission to yawn yet!
dialogue_jp: ねえ　ねえいいですか！

dialogue_en: Oh, so tired...
dialogue_jp: あくびして　いいですか？

dialogue_en: Permission to blow my nose, sir?
dialogue_jp: 耳ほじって　いいですか？

dialogue_en: Permission to scratch my back, sir?
dialogue_jp: 背中かいて　いいですか？

dialogue_en: Thanks. Will do.
dialogue_jp: うん　ありがとう

dialogue_en: Take your time, okay? No need to rush.
dialogue_jp: 上で待ってるから　ゆっくり来てね

dialogue_en: I know.
dialogue_jp: 頼む

dialogue_en:
Think I'd better go keep an eye on them.
Barret's not himself right now, y'know?
dialogue_jp:
心配だから　私も行くね
バレット　なんだか様子が変だし

dialogue_en: "Catch up later," my ass.
dialogue_jp: あとで……じゃねえよ

dialogue_en: You guys can catch up later. Well, see ya!
dialogue_jp:
みんなはあとから来なよ
じゃあ　あとで！

dialogue_en:
Hey, I know what to do!
I'll go on ahead, and scout the area for us!
dialogue_jp: そうだ　アタシが先に行って偵察してきてあげる！

dialogue_en:
But if we stop now, the materia─
I mean the mystery men─might slip away!
dialogue_jp:
でも　急がないとマテリア……じゃなかった
黒マント　逃げちゃうよ

dialogue_en: Let's rest here.
dialogue_jp: すこし休もう

dialogue_en: Sorry... My legs're killin' me.
dialogue_jp: ごめん　足重くて

dialogue_en: Think Aerith might need a break.
dialogue_jp: エアリス　大丈夫かな

dialogue_en: Not you too, Tifa...
dialogue_jp: ティファよう……

dialogue_en: Close to.
dialogue_jp: ああ……

dialogue_en:
...Hikers these days never learn
to greet each other or somethin'?
dialogue_jp: ったく　登山のマナーがなっとらんよ

dialogue_en: Even tried calling out to a few sick-looking fellas all in black, and what'd I get? Silence.
dialogue_jp:
具合が悪そうな黒マントの男たちがいたから
声をかけたんだが　無視されたよ

dialogue_en: I don't get it. Tons of folks hikin' up the mountain today, and not a one of 'em so much as nodded my way.
dialogue_jp:
いやね　今日はいつになく登山客が多いんだが
誰もあいさつしてくれなくてね

dialogue_en: Well, I'll be. Finally, folks who've got some manners.
dialogue_jp: あんたたちは　ちゃんと話しかけてくれるんだな

dialogue_en: Ya greet each other. It's proper!
dialogue_jp: 山の基本は　あいさつだろう

dialogue_en: I tell ya, hikers these days ain't got no manners.
dialogue_jp: 最近の登山者は　マナーがなっとらん

dialogue_en: Ugh...
dialogue_jp: はあ……

dialogue_en: Let's go!
dialogue_jp: やっほ～！

dialogue_en: Relax. It happens to all new climbers. If she passes out, I'll carry her.
dialogue_jp:
初心者にありがちな現象だ
倒れたら　私が運ぼう

dialogue_en: The hell are you doin', Red?
dialogue_jp: レッド　適当なことを言うな

dialogue_en:
Really? I did?
Hey, thanks for having me!
dialogue_jp:
そっかあ！
やっほ～　よろしくね～！

dialogue_en: Say what?
dialogue_jp: そうなのか？

dialogue_en: You've become one with the mountain.
dialogue_jp: 山に歓迎されたようだな

dialogue_en: It's like...it's like someone's pulling me up!
dialogue_jp: だれか～！　背中　押してる？

dialogue_en: Yeah, feelin' great, actually! Could do this all day!
dialogue_jp: ふしぎ　からだ　軽いの！

dialogue_en: You still holdin' up okay?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　どうだ

dialogue_en: What? Oh...no.
dialogue_jp: はい？　ちがうちがう

dialogue_en: You here to pick a fight?
dialogue_jp: 俺たちを追ってきたのか

dialogue_en: Well! Look who it is!
dialogue_jp: あら　こんにちは

dialogue_en: Again?
dialogue_jp: タークス……

dialogue_en: C'mon, out ya go...
dialogue_jp: ほら　さっさとおりて

dialogue_en: We'll see.
dialogue_jp: 急ごう

dialogue_en: Uh-oh. Think the others are okay?
dialogue_jp: ユフィたち　だいじょうぶかな

dialogue_en: One of Shinra's.
dialogue_jp: 神羅のヘリだ

dialogue_en: Mountain ain't no place to be runnin' races, I'll tell ya that.
dialogue_jp: 山は助け合いが肝心なんだがなあ

dialogue_en: Must've been tryin' to stay ahead of that angry-lookin' fella with the pretty gal.
dialogue_jp:
女の子を追いかけて
大柄な男とお嬢さんも走っていったよ

dialogue_en: Couldn't even say "Hello."
dialogue_jp: 彼女にも　無視されたよ

dialogue_en:
Ran into a sprightly little lady too.
Now she was in a real hurry.
dialogue_jp:
そういや　元気な女の子が
猛スピードで駆けぬけていったな

dialogue_en: You're done!
dialogue_jp: トドメだ

dialogue_en: Ready!?
dialogue_jp: 来るぞ！

dialogue_en: Now play nice, shitbirds.
dialogue_jp: 次はリベンジだぞ　と

dialogue_en:
She'll be more than happy to
keep you company, though!
dialogue_jp: だから　今日はコイツで我慢してね

dialogue_en:
We'd love to stay and chat,
but Rude and I are busy people.
dialogue_jp:
わたしが相手してあげたいけど
あいにく忙しくて

dialogue_en: Well, since you're here...
dialogue_jp: わたしと先輩は　ね

dialogue_en: So...that's it?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　もう帰る？

dialogue_en: Eh, whatever. This is way above my pay grade.
dialogue_jp:
まいっか　考えるのは
わたしの仕事じゃないし

dialogue_en:
Dunno why.
One minute they were okay, and the next...
dialogue_jp: どうして突然騒ぎだしたのか　不思議だったけど

dialogue_en:
They were fine when we left Junon...
and then they weren't...so, here we are.
dialogue_jp:
回収して運んでたら　急に騒ぎだしてさ
だから　おろすことにしただけ

dialogue_en: Just dropping off some unruly passengers.
dialogue_jp: こいつら　ジュノンで迷子になってたんだよね

dialogue_en: Deep, steady breaths now! Deep. Calming!
dialogue_jp:
よ～し　深呼吸
大きく息を吸って～！

dialogue_en: I want you to finish it off with a bang, y'hear me? A bang!
dialogue_jp: ドッカーン　ド派手にかましてやれ！

dialogue_en: Oh, c'mon! What was that!?
dialogue_jp: ハッ　どーした？

dialogue_en: Hey, no biggie! Just shake it off.
dialogue_jp: お～い　がんばれよ

dialogue_en: Ooh, now that was a close one!
dialogue_jp: 惜っしい　もうちょっとだ！

dialogue_en: Very nice! Beautiful shot!
dialogue_jp: ナ～イス　そこだ！

dialogue_en: Hoo! Bull's-eye, baby!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　命中！

dialogue_en: Hell yeah! Now that's what I like to see!
dialogue_jp: おっしゃあ　よくやった！

dialogue_en: Hey. Hey! You need to focus now. Cloud? Are ya focusin'? No─don't look at me! Focus!
dialogue_jp:
集中しろ～
集中だ　集中　しゅーちゅー！

dialogue_en: Okay...breathe in, then out...hold it there...and fire!
dialogue_jp:
ほ～れ　クラウド
よ～く狙え　狙え狙えー！

dialogue_en: No hesitation, you hear me? Once you have 'em in your sights, fire away!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　クラウド
行くぜ　行くぜ　行くぜー！

dialogue_en: Hope our game hooked ya!
dialogue_jp: 気が向いたら　いつでもどうぞ

dialogue_en: See ya next time, matey!
dialogue_jp: 時間があったら　また来てよ

dialogue_en: Alright, man. Blast 'em into next week!
dialogue_jp: おう　ドカンと決めてやれ！

dialogue_en: You ready for a swashbucklin' good time?
dialogue_jp:
いらっしゃい
ド真ん中　狙ってってよ！

dialogue_en: This be Pirate's Rampage!
dialogue_jp: ようこそ　『パイレーツ・ランページ』へ！

dialogue_en:
More specifically,
an orb from which they themselves were born.
dialogue_jp: いや　巨大なマテリアが生体化したと言うべきか

dialogue_en: And each one carries an enormous orb of materia.
dialogue_jp: 体内に巨大なマテリアを内包する

dialogue_en: They supposedly appear when the planet is in danger.
dialogue_jp: 星に危険が訪れると出現する怪物だ

dialogue_en: Based on available information, it would seem so.
dialogue_jp: 古い記録に　その名を確認した

dialogue_en: Is that...a Weapon?
dialogue_jp: 我が愛しのウェポン

dialogue_en: we found the spikes stemmed from the arrival of visitors─unfathomably large life-forms.
dialogue_jp:
巨大な生命体が存在する可能性が
極めて高いという結論に達した

dialogue_en: After analyzing the data from each site...
dialogue_jp: 各データを詳細に分析したところ

dialogue_en: As you are aware, simultaneous energy spikes were detected in mako reactors across the world.
dialogue_jp:
各地の魔晄炉で　同時多発的に
異常なエネルギー反応が検知された

dialogue_en:
The next order of business is
the Magnus Materia Project.
dialogue_jp:
続いて『ヒュージマテリアプロジェクト』の
話をしよう

dialogue_en: Come on. We need to find the others.
dialogue_jp: 急ごう　バレットたちが待っている

dialogue_en: For real.
dialogue_jp: ねえ～

dialogue_en: Wish they'd all go on vacation.
dialogue_jp: 迷惑な働き者だ

dialogue_en: Guess the Turks're back on duty, huh?
dialogue_jp: タークス　やっぱり動いてる

dialogue_en: What a team!
dialogue_jp: やったね！

dialogue_en: Well, talk about burying the lede.
dialogue_jp: それを先に言ってくれなくちゃ

dialogue_en: Wutai is after them.
dialogue_jp: ウータイが狙っている

dialogue_en: Mr. President, please. What is this really about?
dialogue_jp: ねえ社長　本当のことを教えて

dialogue_en:
Put them in the bathroom for all I care.
Just leave me the carcasses─those I'll take.
dialogue_jp:
マテリアなんぞどうでもいいが
抜け殻のほうは　私が引き取るぞ

dialogue_en: Well, they would look good in the lobby!
dialogue_jp: ビルのロビーにでも飾りますかな？

dialogue_en:
But it would behoove us to obtain
naturally occurring specimens as well.
dialogue_jp:
このプロジェクトは　あくまでも
天然モノの回収が目的だ

dialogue_en: I am aware of your efforts.
dialogue_jp: もちろん　それは知っている

dialogue_en: Why waste time monster hunting when we're on the brink of creating the materia ourselves?
dialogue_jp:
ヒュージマテリアの人工生成技術は
あとすこしで　実用化できるのよ

dialogue_en: This is ridiculous.
dialogue_jp: 納得できないわ

dialogue_en: We'll all get what we want once that materia is ours.
dialogue_jp: ヒュージマテリアを　この手につかむのだからな

dialogue_en: Your wish, Professor, will soon be granted.
dialogue_jp: 今回のプロジェクトで　その夢も叶う

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: 宝条

dialogue_en:
Oh, what I wouldn't give to peel one's flesh back,
pull it apart...and see what makes it tick!
dialogue_jp:
この手で撫で　組織のヒダの奥まで調べつくしたい
この科学の目で！

dialogue_en: They are living enigmas─organisms dying to be understood, and finally my dream of capturing one is within reach!
dialogue_jp:
その存在を知って以来　恋こがれ探し求めた
まさに　星と生命の神秘

dialogue_en:
But while we're on the subject,
there's something I've been meaning to ask all of you regarding those decisions.
dialogue_jp:
いい機会だ　あの件に関しては
私も疑問に思っていたことがある

dialogue_en: And in his dotage, he became rash.
dialogue_jp: あの暴挙の理由は　それ以外にないだろう

dialogue_en: Great though he was, my father was old.
dialogue_jp: オヤジは歳をとった　そしてあせった

dialogue_en: However, the fact remains that we have yet to locate the "promised land" of legend, or even confirm if it actually exists.
dialogue_jp:
しかし　実際にはネオ・ミッドガル計画の根幹をなす
約束の地は見つかっておらず　正体さえ──

dialogue_en: Your father assured us these acts were in service to the Neo Midgar Project.
dialogue_jp:
ともにプレジデントは　ネオ・ミッドガル計画の
一部だとおっしゃっていました

dialogue_en: We used Avalanche's activities as a cover to sabotage our own reactors and destroy Sector 7.
dialogue_jp:
アバランチの活動に乗じた　魔晄炉の爆破
続く七番街プレートとスラムの破壊

dialogue_en: Perhaps you could speak on his behalf?
dialogue_jp: 同じ質問をしてもよろしいですか？

dialogue_en:
There's a question I never had the chance
to ask your father.
dialogue_jp:
プレジデントには
お答えいただけなかった質問があります

dialogue_en: Yes?
dialogue_jp: なんだ？

dialogue_en: Mister President!
dialogue_jp: ルーファウス社長

dialogue_en: My finest for the madam director.
dialogue_jp: 精鋭を用意してやろう
