dialogue_en: Figured I'd make the most of my financial solvency and give the inn a total makeover! Thing is...
dialogue_jp:
ここはババーンと　シーサイド・ジョニーを
リフォームしようと思ったんです……が

dialogue_en: As you know, your boy's debt-free.
dialogue_jp: おかげさまで　借金がチャラになったんで

dialogue_en: Hey, perfect timing, bro! I was actually hoping to ask you for a little favor.
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　ちょうどいいところに
アニキの腕を見込んで　お願いしたいことがあって

dialogue_en: Turns out a few of 'em managed to stick around somehow, and I think they might've even multiplied.
dialogue_jp:
何人か　消えずに残っちゃったみたいで
てか　増えてる？

dialogue_en: This wouldn't have anything to do with me using my ninja skills to create a bunch of clones...would it?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　アタシのせい？
アタシが　分身の術をかけたせい？

dialogue_en: No, he's not my twin!
dialogue_jp: って　そんなワケないでしょ！

dialogue_en: The creatures that stole him brought him up in the wild as one of their own, and─
dialogue_jp:
弟は　モンスターに育てられるという
波乱万丈な人生を……

dialogue_en: It's true. Poor Yanni and I were separated at birth when he was ripped from our mother's arms.
dialogue_jp:
はい　実はそうなんです
いまのは生き別れになった双子の弟　ジャニー

dialogue_en: Okay, that last part was just a joke, but...
dialogue_jp: って　そんな怖いヤツ雇いませんよ

dialogue_en: N-no, please! Stay back! Don't come any closer!
dialogue_jp:
うわわわ　くるな
こないでくれ　あああ～！

dialogue_en: Too familiar. You look exactly like me!
dialogue_jp:
って　俺？
そんなバカな　どうして

dialogue_en: Oh, that's─ Say, you look awfully familiar...
dialogue_jp: うん？　おまえ　どっかで見た顔だな

dialogue_en: Good day, sir! I saw your help wanted ad.
dialogue_jp: どーも　求人広告を見て来たんですが

dialogue_en: Think you're surprised? Imagine how I felt!
dialogue_jp:
あはは……
いくらなんでも　そっくりすぎるでしょう

dialogue_en: ...See what I have to deal with?
dialogue_jp: ……というワケなんです

dialogue_en: You're the one who dropped all the stuff we collected!
dialogue_jp:
おまえが　しっかり
持ってなかったせいだろ

dialogue_en: Man, if it weren't for those uglies, we woulda been done by now!
dialogue_jp:
あ～　せっかく集めたのに
モンスターの野郎！

dialogue_en: I suppose I should've known I couldn't be trusted...
dialogue_jp:
はあ……
みんな　考えナシに動きやがって

dialogue_en: You probably wanna start by having a look around the Costa Falls.
dialogue_jp:
俺の分身たちは
コスタフォールズにいると思います

dialogue_en: Might wanna start there!
dialogue_jp: よろしくお願いします！

dialogue_en: I sent them off to the Costa Falls to look for materials for the renovations.
dialogue_jp:
俺の分身は　材料を探しに
コスタフォールズへ向かったはずです

dialogue_en: Yes! I knew I could count on you, bro!
dialogue_jp: さすがはアニキ　話がはやい！

dialogue_en: ...Fine.
dialogue_jp: ……わかった

dialogue_en: Maybe we should lend him a hand?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　助けてやんない？

dialogue_en: A Johnny's a wild beast that can't be tamed─you know that! There's no telling what sorta havoc these bad boys might wreak!
dialogue_jp:
ほら俺　キケンな野獣の一面もあるじゃないですか
野放しは　危ないと思うんです

dialogue_en: I'm beggin' ya, bro! You gotta help me out here!
dialogue_jp: アニキ～　手伝ってもらえませんか

dialogue_en: Turns out I can't rely on myself─my other selfs.
dialogue_jp: 増えたところで　俺は俺ってことです

dialogue_en: Oh, but I am. I sent a crew to fetch materials and haven't heard a word from 'em since.
dialogue_jp:
みんな　リフォームの材料を探しに行ったっきり
ぜんっぜん帰ってきません

dialogue_en: But hey, look on the bright side─at least you aren't short-staffed!
dialogue_jp:
あっ　でもでも
おかげで人手は足りてるんでしょ？

dialogue_en: I mean, I never doubted my amazing abilities, but even I didn't realize I was capable of doing that.
dialogue_jp:
あはは　アタシってば才能ありすぎ～
ありすぎて　術が強すぎたみたい

dialogue_en:
The more pieces ya pick up,
the better off me and me'll be!
dialogue_jp: できるだけ　多く集めてもらえると助かります

dialogue_en: You'll help us get it all back, won'tcha, bro?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　お願いしてもいいですか？

dialogue_en: So unless they took our stuff for some weird reason, everything should still be right where we dropped it. We think.
dialogue_jp:
ジップラインを使って逃げてきたので
たぶん　そのあたりに落ちてると思うんです

dialogue_en: We had actually already gathered everything we needed, but then we ran into some fiends and had to zipline for our lives.
dialogue_jp:
実は　材料集め終わったんすけど
モンスターに襲われて　落としちまったんです

dialogue_en:
This whole "synchronized talking"
thing is kinda creepy.
dialogue_jp: うへ～　なんか気味ワルいなあ

dialogue_en:
Whoa, that was pretty smart of me!
No one knows me better than myself.
dialogue_jp:
おお　さすがは俺！
最強の助っ人ってワケだ

dialogue_en:
Johnny sent me to check on you guys.
Help you find materials.
dialogue_jp: ジョニーに　材料を探すよう依頼を受けた

dialogue_en: 'Sup, my bro!? What're you doin' here?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　どうしてここに？

dialogue_en: We're so screwed!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: We're so screwed!
dialogue_jp: はあ　どうすりゃいいんだ

dialogue_en: Whatever, bro! You probably woulda done the same thing if you were me─which you are!
dialogue_jp:
うるせえ　俺もおまえも
ジョニーなんだから仕方ねえだろ

dialogue_en: You're one to talk! Who was it that ran off squealing like a little girl?
dialogue_jp:
おまえこそ悲鳴あげて逃げたじゃねえか
うひゃ～ってよ　情けねえ

dialogue_en: Guy like us oughta have more of a backbone.
dialogue_jp:
ちょっと襲われたぐらいで
ビビりやがって

dialogue_en: Heh heh!
dialogue_jp: ウシシシシ！

dialogue_en: If it's not materia, I'm not interested!
dialogue_jp: マテリアはどこだ～？

dialogue_en: Nah, I think we'd have better luck over there.
dialogue_jp: い～や　あっちのほうが怪しいよ

dialogue_en: How 'bout we take a look over there?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　あっちに行ってみよ

dialogue_en: This looks like a job for the Yuffie Squad!
dialogue_jp: ユフィちゃんズに　おまかせあれ！

dialogue_en: More Yuffies, more fun!
dialogue_jp: ユフィちゃんがいっぱいだよ？

dialogue_en: More Yuffies, more fun!
dialogue_jp: ユフィちゃんがいっぱいだよ！

dialogue_en: More Yuffies, more fun!
dialogue_jp: ユフィちゃんがいっぱいだよ

dialogue_en: What'd I tell ya?
dialogue_jp: ほらほら～

dialogue_en: What'd I tell ya?
dialogue_jp: ほらほら～？

dialogue_en: Well?
dialogue_jp: ほら

dialogue_en: Hmm...
dialogue_jp: うん……？

dialogue_en: Uh, I think you meant to say "terrific" idea? C'mon, Cloud─just imagine how much fun it could be!
dialogue_jp:
ええ～　面白いと思うけどな～
ほら　想像してみてよ

dialogue_en: That is a terrible idea.
dialogue_jp: これ以上　かき乱すな

dialogue_en: This is gonna be tough with just us... Oh! Maybe I could make some clones of me and you to help out!
dialogue_jp:
けっこー大変そうだね
そうだ　アタシたちも分身しちゃう？

dialogue_en: So, you find anything, bro?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　見つかりましたか？

dialogue_en: We'd be so scared we'd run before the fight began.
dialogue_jp: そもそも　怖がって誰も戦おうとしねえよ

dialogue_en: Even better. Throw a hundred Johnnys in a fight and we'd still get our asses kicked.
dialogue_jp:
おうおう　実際
俺たち１００人で戦っても負けるよな

dialogue_en: Havin' our bro help out's like havin' a hundred of us.
dialogue_jp: アニキがきてくれて　これで百人力だ

dialogue_en: Boooooo!
dialogue_jp: ええ～？

dialogue_en: No. Not fun.
dialogue_jp: そうは思えない

dialogue_en: See? Like I said─fun!
dialogue_jp: ねっ　楽しそうでしょ！

dialogue_en: Are you even listening to us!?
dialogue_jp: クラウドってば！

dialogue_en: Uh, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: クラウド？

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウド～？

dialogue_en: Sih-sih-sih-sih, hah!
dialogue_jp: シュシュシュシュシュ！

dialogue_en: Yep─and I bet they could really use your help!
dialogue_jp: そっちを手伝ってもらえると　嬉しいです

dialogue_en: Wait─there's more of you?
dialogue_jp: えっ　ほかにもいんの？

dialogue_en: Well, since ya asked... A couple of the other Johnnys went lookin' for parts to fix the boiler.
dialogue_jp:
それが　実はほかのジョニーたちが
ボイラー修理に必要な部品を探しに行ってて

dialogue_en: Which means our work here is done. Right?
dialogue_jp: これで依頼は完了　いいな

dialogue_en: I guess we better get this haul back to our palace kinda sorta by the sea.
dialogue_jp:
じゃあ　俺たちは材料を持って
シーサイド・ジョニーに戻りますね

dialogue_en: You got that right! Our bro's a cut above.
dialogue_jp: やっぱアニキは　規格外の男だぜ

dialogue_en: Whoa! Honestly, we don't even remember collecting this much stuff. You're incredible!
dialogue_jp:
わお　よくこんだけ見つけてきましたね
これならバッチリです！

dialogue_en: And it's all thanks to the merc and his ninja pal!
dialogue_jp: さすがは　なんでも屋とシノビすっね

dialogue_en: Nice! With this much, we can renovate the hell outta the hotel.
dialogue_jp:
おお　これだけあれば
しっかりリフォームできます

dialogue_en: Would've liked all of it, but we're an ingenious guy─we'll make it work.
dialogue_jp:
これなら　ギリッギリですけど
なんとかなりそうです

dialogue_en: Yep, this is definitely some of our stuff!
dialogue_jp:
ああ　はい
たしかに受け取りました

dialogue_en: That's the last of 'em, right?
dialogue_jp: これで　最後だよね

dialogue_en: C'mon, don't leave us hangin'. We need your help!
dialogue_jp: アニキ　ちゃんと集めてくださいよ

dialogue_en: They oughta be all around the ziplines─right where we dropped 'em. You'd be doin' us a solid by trackin' 'em down!
dialogue_jp:
ジップラインのそばに落ちてるはずです
できるだけ　多く集めてもらえると嬉しいです

dialogue_en: C'mon, don't leave us hangin'. We need your help!
dialogue_jp: アニキ　ちゃんと集めてくださいよ

dialogue_en: Uh, are you pullin' our legs here, bro?
dialogue_jp:
あれ？
アニキ　持ってないっすよ

dialogue_en: What? No, I didn't. Wait─was it you?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: What? No, I didn't. Wait─was it you?
dialogue_jp:
ジョニーが？
もしかして　おまえか

dialogue_en: Hey, Johnny said that you needed my help.
dialogue_jp: ジョニーに頼まれて手伝いにきた

dialogue_en: Hey there, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Hey there, bro!
dialogue_jp: アニキじゃないっすか！

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ～！

dialogue_en: Treasure hunting'd be a lot easier if you were a chocobo...
dialogue_jp: はあ　おまえがチョコボだったらな

dialogue_en: We just gotta focus all our brainpower on that chip─feel the chip─and start digging!
dialogue_jp:
集中して気配を感じるんだ
ピンときたら　すかさず掘る！

dialogue_en: Bet we would've found it already if we had a few more of us to help search!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱ　俺たちだけで探すのは
無理なんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: Where the hell're we supposed to find a transmuter chip?
dialogue_jp: どこだ　クラフトチップは？

dialogue_en: Tell me about it. We really gotta fix that boiler!
dialogue_jp: だよな　はやくボイラーを修理しないと

dialogue_en: Can't call it a seven-star hotel if we can't even offer a hot shower.
dialogue_jp:
いいホテルに　温かいシャワーが
ないなんて　ありえないよな

dialogue_en: Bet we would've found it already if we had a few more of us to help search!
dialogue_jp:
やっぱ　俺たちだけで探すのは
無理なんじゃねえか

dialogue_en: We've been looking for hours. We're never gonna find this place!
dialogue_jp: どこだ　共和国時代の工場は？

dialogue_en: Think they were headed toward one of those old republic-era factories. Tell 'em Johnny says hi! It's a thing we do.
dialogue_jp:
あいつら　共和国時代に建てられた工場跡地に
向かったっぽいんで　よろしくお願いします

dialogue_en: Any luck?
dialogue_jp: 成果は？

dialogue_en: So to do that, we're hunting for a transmuter chip!
dialogue_jp: クラフトチップ探しに切り替えたところです

dialogue_en: Then we thought, "why don't we just make it ourself?"
dialogue_jp: だったら　いちから作ってやろうと思って

dialogue_en: But it turns out nobody makes it anymore.
dialogue_jp: いまは作られてないっぽくて

dialogue_en:
Well, we were lookin' for a part to
help us repair the boiler.
dialogue_jp:
俺たち　ボイラー修理に
必要な部品を探してたんですが
状況は？

dialogue_en:
Have you thought about starting a two-man show?
I bet it'd be a smash hit! Right?
dialogue_jp:
そのまま　ジョニー劇団とかやってみれば？
きっと流行るよ　ねっ！

dialogue_en: You two are a riot!
dialogue_jp: あはは　ウケる～！

dialogue_en: Hey! You talkin' shit about me?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Hey! You talkin' shit about me?
dialogue_jp: ああ？　なんだとコラ

dialogue_en: No way. You're too stubborn to ask for help.
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: No way. You're too stubborn to ask for help.
dialogue_jp: いや　おまえがそんなに気が利くはずない

dialogue_en: So you're saying it was me?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: So you're saying it was me?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　俺か？

dialogue_en: Not me!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Not me!
dialogue_jp: 俺じゃない

dialogue_en: We're looking for instructions on how to craft a boiler valve.
dialogue_jp:
俺たちが探してるのは
ボイラーバルブのレシピです

dialogue_en: Suh-weet!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Suh-weet!
dialogue_jp: やった～！

dialogue_en: Okay. I'll take it from here...
dialogue_jp: あとはまかせろ

dialogue_en: Sure wish we had a chocobo right about now...
dialogue_jp: こういう時に　チョコボがいれば

dialogue_en: The transmuter chip we're after should be somewhere inside. We're sure of it!
dialogue_jp:
そこに　俺たちが求めるクラフトチップが
眠ってるはずなんです

dialogue_en: Speaking of which─found that "vintage" factory yet?
dialogue_jp: 共和国時代の工場　見つかりましたか？

dialogue_en: Some folks might say our hotel's boiler is old, but we prefer to think of it as vintage.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代のボイラーを使ってるホテルなんて
たぶん　ウチぐらいですよ

dialogue_en: The knowledge they contain will reveal the location of transmuter chips.
dialogue_jp:
クラフトチップが眠る場所や
ほかにも　色々とわかるはずです

dialogue_en: If you wish to learn more about the Republic of Junon, I recommend visiting lifesprings.
dialogue_jp:
共和国時代の情報でしたら
ライフスポットを解析してみてください

dialogue_en: I heard about your plight.
dialogue_jp: お話はうかがっていました

dialogue_en: Suh-weet!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Suh-weet!
dialogue_jp: やった～！

dialogue_en: Okay, I'll take it from here...
dialogue_jp: あとはまかせろ

dialogue_en: You're way better at findin' stuff than us. Mind bein' our bloodhound, bro?
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　俺たちの代わりに
探してもらえませんか？

dialogue_en: None, unfortunately. There's supposed to be a republic-era factory around here somewhere...
dialogue_jp:
このあたりに　共和国時代のバルブ工場が
あったはずなんですけど　見つからなくて

dialogue_en: Just think: you could start a mercenary franchise! And I could even help you set up a branch in Wutai!
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋もチェーン展開できるじゃん
ウータイ支店　作っちゃおうよ

dialogue_en: No.
dialogue_jp: やめろ

dialogue_en: All I'm saying is we'd find everything much faster if we cloned ourselves too.
dialogue_jp:
どうする　アタシたちも分身して
手分けして探す？

dialogue_en: You two are the best!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: You two are the best!
dialogue_jp: よろしくお願いします！

dialogue_en: Are you trying to give us even more work?
dialogue_jp: しれっと仕事を増やしてない？

dialogue_en: And if you find one of those chips, feel free to just transmute a valve yourself!
dialogue_jp:
チップを見つけたら
そのまま　クラフトもやっちゃってください

dialogue_en: We're looking for instructions on how to craft a boiler valve.
dialogue_jp:
俺たちが探してるのは
ボイラーバルブのレシピです

dialogue_en: Now all we need is for you to use a chocobo to sniff out that transmuter chip for us!
dialogue_jp:
あとは　チョコボを使って
クラフトチップを掘り出すだけです

dialogue_en: So─this is the place, huh? Definitely couldn't have found it without you!
dialogue_jp: おお　ここが共和国時代の工場か～

dialogue_en: Hey, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Hey, bro!
dialogue_jp: アニキ～！

dialogue_en: You two are the best!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: You two are the best!
dialogue_jp: よろしくお願いします！

dialogue_en: Are you trying to give us even more work?
dialogue_jp: しれっと仕事を増やしてない？

dialogue_en: And if you find one of those chips, feel free to just transmute a valve yourself!
dialogue_jp:
チップを見つけたら
そのまま　クラフトもやっちゃってください

dialogue_en: Kweh'mon─trust me!
dialogue_jp: 俺を信じろクエ

dialogue_en: Wait, didn't we try digging there before?
dialogue_jp: そこ　さっきも掘ってなかったか？

dialogue_en: Here! X warks the spot!
dialogue_jp: クエッ　ここ掘れクエ！

dialogue_en: Right? Now giddyup, Johnny!
dialogue_jp: さあ行け　ジョニーチョコボ！

dialogue_en: Hey, that's kweh-ver!
dialogue_jp: そのとおりだクエ！

dialogue_en: We don't need a chocobo─'cause we can be our own chocobo!
dialogue_jp:
チョコボがいないなら　俺たちが
チョコボになっちまえばいいんだ

dialogue_en: The one and only.
dialogue_jp: 俺もそう思う

dialogue_en: Yeah... Yeah, I think I'm good with just one Cloud.
dialogue_jp: やっぱ　クラウドは増えなくていいかな

dialogue_en: I know you aren't much of a talker, but I figured at least one of you would say something. Not really diggin' this vibe.
dialogue_jp:
うう　無言のクラウドがいっぱい
なんか　息が詰まる

dialogue_en: Three Clouds...four Clouds...
dialogue_jp: クラウドが３人　クラウドが４人

dialogue_en: One Cloud...two Clouds...
dialogue_jp: クラウドがひとり　クラウドがふたり

dialogue_en: Oh, c'mon─just imagine!
dialogue_jp: ほら　想像してみようよ

dialogue_en: Yeah, right.
dialogue_jp: どうだろう

dialogue_en: Plus, Shinra wouldn't stand a chance against a Cloud army. You and your buster-sword-wielding buddies'd hack 'em to bits!
dialogue_jp:
それに　クラウドがいっぱいれば
神羅との戦争にも勝てるんじゃない？

dialogue_en: Thank you.
dialogue_jp: ありがとよ

dialogue_en: Bye.
dialogue_jp: どうも

dialogue_en: Welcome.
dialogue_jp: いらっしゃい

dialogue_en: I trust you ain't just window-shoppin'.
dialogue_jp: 見るからには　買うんだろうな

dialogue_en: You good now?
dialogue_jp: 満足かい？

dialogue_en: That valve isn't gonna transmute itself, y'know─though that'd be sweet.
dialogue_jp:
あとは　レシピどおりに
ボイラーバルブをクラフトするだけですよ

dialogue_en: Hey bro. You're not...slackin' off, are you?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　もしかして手間取ってます？

dialogue_en: Once you've got all the necessary materials, you can transmute us a brand-new boiler valve!
dialogue_jp:
あとは　レシピどおりに素材を集めて
クラフトするだけです　がんばってください

dialogue_en: Whoa, you actually found the chip? Way to go, bro!
dialogue_jp:
チップを見つけてくれたんですね
ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: All you and your bird gotta do is start sniffin' and dig that sucker up!
dialogue_jp:
アニキとチョコボの力で
バシッと見つけちゃってください

dialogue_en: That transmuter chip's here─I can feel it!
dialogue_jp:
このあたりに
クラフトチップが埋まってるはずです

dialogue_en: You can rent a chocobo from that shop in Costa del Sol. Members only, but still.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボなら　コスタのレンタルショップで
会員になれば手に入りますよ

dialogue_en: I just wish we had a chocobo...
dialogue_jp: はあ　本物のチョコボさえいればな～

dialogue_en: Sure wish I had a chocobo's sense of smell right about now...
dialogue_jp: チョコボの嗅覚さえあれば　いっぱつなんですけど

dialogue_en: Wait. What does a chip smell like?
dialogue_jp: チップって　どんなニオイがすんだ？

dialogue_en: Time to put my sniffer to wark!
dialogue_jp: 俺の嗅覚を信じろクエ

dialogue_en: Hey─see that? A glint of light─maybe metal!?
dialogue_jp: おっ　いまなにか光らなかったか？

dialogue_en: Kweh-re's that chip!?
dialogue_jp: チップはどこだクエ！

dialogue_en: Our other life is in your hands, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニーのこと　よろしく頼んます

dialogue_en: Welp, we got a boiler to fix, so we're gonna head back.
dialogue_jp:
それじゃあ　俺たちは

dialogue_en: You're the best!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: You're the best!
dialogue_jp: 恩に着ます！

dialogue_en: Not at all.
dialogue_jp: わかった

dialogue_en: You wouldn't mind going to check on him for us, would ya, bro?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　様子を見てきてもらっていいですか

dialogue_en: Hope he's not dying of thirst or knife wounds.
dialogue_jp: あいつ　干からびてないといいけど

dialogue_en: Last we heard, he was desert-bound.
dialogue_jp: 砂漠のほうへ　狩りに行ったヤツが

dialogue_en: Said he wanted to give the hotel royal flair by putting the Tonberry King's crown on display.
dialogue_jp:
シーサイド・ジョニーに　伝説のモンスター
トンベリキングの王冠を飾るんだって

dialogue_en: Where is he!?
dialogue_jp: えっ　まだいんの？

dialogue_en: There's one more.
dialogue_jp: あと　ひとり

dialogue_en: Uh, actually...
dialogue_jp: ああ　いや……それが

dialogue_en: Well, we should probably report back to Johnny now that we've bailed out all the others.
dialogue_jp:
んじゃ　ジョニーもぜんぶ見つけたし
報告に戻る？

dialogue_en: Hot, steamy showers in every room!
dialogue_jp: 熱々のシャワーを提供できます

dialogue_en: Oh, baby, this is it! That boiler is as good as fixed.
dialogue_jp:
おお　これです！
これでボイラーを修理できます

dialogue_en: Thanks.
dialogue_jp: まいど

dialogue_en: You better buy something.
dialogue_jp: 面倒だねえ

dialogue_en: Hurry it up, wouldja?
dialogue_jp: さっさとしてくれよ

dialogue_en:
Your kindness is bringing me to tears, bro!
I eagerly await your safe and fruitful return.
dialogue_jp:
くう～　男前がすぎるよアニキ！
ちゃちゃっと王冠　盗んできちゃってください

dialogue_en:
Actually, we already dethroned that royal reject.
Didn't we?
dialogue_jp: トンベリキングならもう倒しちゃったよ……ね？

dialogue_en:
We already know where to find the king.
Just gotta pay him a visit.
dialogue_jp: トンベリキングの居場所なら　もうわかってるよね

dialogue_en: Fine. Just sit tight.
dialogue_jp: あとは　俺たちにまかせろ

dialogue_en:
Say, I bet one of those towers
could point us in the king's direction.
dialogue_jp: 珍しいモンスターなら　通信塔で探し出せるよね

dialogue_en: I hope you know a way into the desert, Cloud, 'cause I sure don't. Over the mountains? Or something?
dialogue_jp:
まずは　砂漠に入る方法を探さなきゃ
でも　すぐには無理っぽいね

dialogue_en: Fine. Just sit tight.
dialogue_jp: あとは　俺たちにまかせろ

dialogue_en: you'd really be doing me a solid if you brought me back that crown─preferably in the most pristine condition possible.
dialogue_jp:
トンベリキングの王冠を　なるべく傷つけないように
盗んできてもらってもいいですか

dialogue_en: Listen, bro: I dunno if you were planning to check out the dunes, but if you are...
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　もし砂漠へ行くことがあったら
俺の代わりに

dialogue_en: But there's no way your boy Johnny can get through the desert on foot.
dialogue_jp: でも　ここから歩きじゃ無理なんすよ

dialogue_en:
Rumor has it the Tonberry King
lives somewhere nearby.
dialogue_jp:
この先で　トンベリキングを見たって
情報があるんです

dialogue_en: But it's, uh, somewhere over there.
dialogue_jp: ここから先　進めなくて

dialogue_en: And I thought a Tonberry King's crown would give the place that palatial feel.
dialogue_jp:
トンベリキングの王冠を
バシッと飾ろうと思ったんですけど

dialogue_en:
Well, I'm glad you are.
Y'see, we're renovating the hotel.
dialogue_jp:
実は　リフォームの目玉として
伝説のモンスター

dialogue_en: Me neither.
dialogue_jp: おまえこそ

dialogue_en: Is that a mirage? I can't believe you're here, bro!
dialogue_jp:
わっ　アニキ
なにしてるんですか！

dialogue_en: Oh, forgive me for interrupting your fantasies. I'll let you get back to being a perv.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　ごめんごめん
黙るから　好きなだけ想像して

dialogue_en: I thought ninjas were supposed to be silent.
dialogue_jp: ユフィ　黙ってくれ

dialogue_en: Busted!
Shut up.
dialogue_jp: 想像しなかった

dialogue_en: Thinking naughty thoughts?
dialogue_jp: どんな想像した？

dialogue_en: Okay, what about...Tifa?
dialogue_jp: え～　じゃあ　ティファは？

dialogue_en: And catch us in the cross fire.
dialogue_jp: 相撃ちになるのがオチだ

dialogue_en: What if we cloned a bunch of Barrets? They'd blast those baddies into oblivion!
dialogue_jp:
ほら　バレットを増やして
銃弾の雨あられ作戦とか

dialogue_en: Which means we'll be outnumbered. Unless...
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　アタシらも
分身して対抗したほうがよくない？

dialogue_en: This king guy's probably got a horde of tonberries at his command...
dialogue_jp: トンベリを束ねる　伝説の王様が相手か～

dialogue_en: Let's not keep your entrepreneurial friend waiting, lest he wither in the heat.
dialogue_jp:
彼が干からびてしまう前に
王冠を盗んで　届けてあげましょう

dialogue_en: Johnny wasn't that far off.
dialogue_jp: ジョニーさんが　お待ちかねです

dialogue_en: Good news. I believe I've ascertained the whereabouts of your royal quarry: the Tonberry King.
dialogue_jp:
トンベリの頂点に君臨する王様　トンベリキングの
居場所らしき情報が見つかりました

dialogue_en: Cloud!
dialogue_jp: クラウドさん

dialogue_en: Just don't keep me waiting too long. We Johnnys are delicate flowers that wilt in the desert heat.
dialogue_jp:
俺　いつまでも待ってますから
忘れちゃうと　干からびちゃいますから

dialogue_en: I bet you'll just yoink the crown right off the king's head. Can't wait to see it in person!
dialogue_jp:
トンベリキングの王冠は盗めるらしいんすよ
上物　期待してます

dialogue_en: So where's the king's crown? You got it, right?
dialogue_jp: トンベリキングの王冠　手に入りました？

dialogue_en: So where's the crown?
dialogue_jp: それで　王冠は？

dialogue_en:
You took down the Tonberry King─for us!?
Thanks, bro! On behalf of all Johnnys!
dialogue_jp:
おお　トンベリキングを倒してくれたんですか？
さっすが俺たちのアニキだ

dialogue_en: Another crown snatched by the incomparable Yuffie! Let's hurry up and get this to Johnny!
dialogue_jp:
トンベリキングの王冠　ゲ～ット！
さっそくジョニーに届けてあげよ

dialogue_en: Whaddya think? Should we give it to Johnny anyway─see if he even notices? Or should we try for a nicer one instead?
dialogue_jp:
どうする　これ　ジョニーに届ける？
もう１回戦って盗んでみる？

dialogue_en: Ouch... Looks like the crown got a little scuffed in the scuffle.
dialogue_jp: ああ～　王冠傷つけちゃったね

dialogue_en: I'm sure you've got a lot of things on your to-do list, but I hope snagging that crown is still one of 'em!
dialogue_jp:
大変お忙しいかと思いますが
トンベリキング探しのほうも頼んます

dialogue_en: Hey, bro! You take a look around the desert yet?
dialogue_jp: アニキ～　砂漠へ行けましたか？

dialogue_en: Just don't keep me waiting too long. We Johnnys are delicate flowers that wilt in the desert heat.
dialogue_jp:
俺　いつまでも待ってますから
忘れちゃうと　干からびちゃいますから

dialogue_en: I bet you'll just yoink the crown right off the king's head. Can't wait to see it in person!
dialogue_jp:
トンベリキングの王冠は盗めるらしいんすよ
上物　期待してます

dialogue_en: Now I'm super pumped to see the real crown, in all its shiny and unscuffed glory!
dialogue_jp:
伝説の名にふさわしい　キレイな王冠を
トンベリキングから盗んできてください

dialogue_en: Whew! For real, I was this close to having a heart attack. The whole deadpan delivery really had me goin'!
dialogue_jp:
ですよね　その王冠はなにかの間違いですよね
もう　びっくりさせないでくださいよ

dialogue_en: Be sure to swing by when you have the chance! I'm sure one of me'll have somethin' real nice waiting for ya.
dialogue_jp:
時間がある時に　ウチに寄ってください
俺が報酬を用意してると思うんで

dialogue_en: I'm gonna take this baby back to the hotel.
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　俺は先に戻りますね

dialogue_en: Thanks again, bro. I owe you one!
dialogue_jp: アニキ　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: But y'know, the worse-for-wear look does imbue it with a certain old-school charm─perfect for a rustic centerpiece!
dialogue_jp:
まあよく見たら　このオンボロ感が逆に文学的で
インテリアにはちょうどいい気がしてきました

dialogue_en: Huh... Well, uh, if you say so, bro. Guess some legends just don't live up to the hype.
dialogue_jp:
そうですか　アニキがそこまで言うなら
これが伝説の王冠なんですね

dialogue_en: There's no way this hunk a' junk is the crown I was lookin' for...right?
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　本当に
このキズだらけの王冠であってます？

dialogue_en: There's no way this hunk a' junk is the crown I was lookin' for...right?
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　本当に
このキズだらけの王冠であってます？

dialogue_en: I mean, the Tonberry King's crown is supposed to be regal and resplendent!
dialogue_jp:
伝説の王冠は
もっとキレイでゴージャスなはずです

dialogue_en: Huh? This is...not exactly what I was... Oh, good one, bro! You almost had me thinking you were serious.
dialogue_jp:
うん？　えっと～これは……
もうアニキったら　またまたご冗談を

dialogue_en: But hey, if you wanna hang on to it a little longer, that's cool.
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　おあずけっすね
了解です！

dialogue_en: Ohoho! Looks like someone's playing hard to get.
dialogue_jp:
くう～！
アニキ　じらしますねえ

dialogue_en: See ya...
dialogue_jp: じゃあな

dialogue_en: Hmph...
dialogue_jp: ふん……

dialogue_en: No window-shoppin', y'hear?

dialogue_en: Huh. A customer.

dialogue_en: Haven't whacked my finger in a minute now!
dialogue_jp: もう　指を叩くのはゴメンだ

dialogue_en: Think I'm gettin' the hang of it!
dialogue_jp: コツをつかんできたぞ

dialogue_en: Try painting the walls, not me!
dialogue_jp: おい　ペンキが飛んでんぞ！

dialogue_en: Why don't you just let me do it?
dialogue_jp: そろそろ代われよ

dialogue_en: You gotta spread it evenly.
dialogue_jp: そこ　ムラになってんぞ

dialogue_en: Careful up there.
dialogue_jp: 気をつけろよ

dialogue_en: Go all out, go all out, go all out li'l Stamp♪
dialogue_jp:
走れ～
走れ～スタンプ～っと

dialogue_en: Careful, Johnny, careful...
dialogue_jp: 丁寧に　丁寧に

dialogue_en: Hotel renovation!♪
dialogue_jp: リフォーム　リフォーム！

dialogue_en: Be sure to swing by when you have the chance! I'm sure one of me'll have somethin' real nice waitin' for ya.
dialogue_jp:
時間がある時に　ウチに寄ってください
俺が報酬を用意してると思うんで

dialogue_en: I'm gonna take this baby back to the hotel.
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　俺は先に戻りますね

dialogue_en:
Man, I can't wait to see the look on my face
when I see this!
dialogue_jp:
こうしちゃいられない
はやく帰って　俺に知らせないと

dialogue_en:
Don't worry!

dialogue_jp:
そりゃもう！
シーサイド・ジョニーのシンボルにします

dialogue_en: And we went through "positively legendary" trouble to get it for you.
dialogue_jp: そこそこ大変だったんだから　感謝してよね

Whoa! Get a load of the shine on that baby!

dialogue_jp:
うおお　これが伝説の王冠！
なんて神々しいんだ

dialogue_en: They're already hard at work on the renovations. It's gonna look awesome!
dialogue_jp:
リフォームは順調ですよ
楽しみにしていてください！

dialogue_en: A couple of me made it back to the hotel, safe and sound.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちが戻ってきました　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Whoops! Almost drooled in the soup.
dialogue_jp: おっと　ヨダレが落ちるところだった

dialogue_en: Mmm, the smell alone's got my mouth watering!
dialogue_jp:
う～ん　このかおり
たまらん！

dialogue_en: Whipped up a nice pot of Johnny's special soup!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー特製　スタミナスープですよ～

dialogue_en: Can't renovate on an empty stomach!

dialogue_en: Man, I could go for a hot shower...
dialogue_jp: 熱～いシャワーが浴びてえな

dialogue_en: Floorboards are set; now for some rafters.

dialogue_en: Not bad if I do saw so!

dialogue_en: Chop, chop!
dialogue_jp: ギコギコと

dialogue_en: Better take another look at that stupid boiler...
dialogue_jp:
くそ～　もう１回

dialogue_en: I think it's getting hotter...kinda...sorta.
dialogue_jp: すこしずつ熱くなってる気が　する？

dialogue_en: Got a good stream.
dialogue_jp: 勢いはよし

dialogue_en: Show me the hot water!
dialogue_jp: お湯よ　出ろ！

dialogue_en: After this, it's time for some roof repairs.

dialogue_en: These nails won't know what hit 'em!
dialogue_jp: コツコツとやっていきますよ～

dialogue_en: But once we're finished, it's gonna be the finest hotel in the whole world─just you wait!
dialogue_jp:
いや　世界一のホテルに
リフォームしちゃいますんで　しばしお待ちを！

dialogue_en: So yeah, me and mes are set on seein' this through to the end.
dialogue_jp:
というワケで　ババーンと
コスタでいちばんの

dialogue_en: Yeah, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Yeah, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Yeah, bro!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Yeah, bro!

シーサイド・ジョニーは

dialogue_en: We're in the middle of renovating, and I'm gonna need all my hands on deck to finish.
dialogue_jp:
リフォームはこれからが本番なんで
もうちょっと　働いてもらいます

dialogue_en: What? No, not yet!

dialogue_en: No biggie. So...what now? Want me to poof 'em?
dialogue_jp:
で　どうする

dialogue_en: And it sounds like I really put you through the wringer. Sorry 'bout that.
dialogue_jp:
いろいろと助けてもらったみたいで
ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Good news, bro! All of me made it back in one piece!
dialogue_jp: アニキ　俺たちが全員帰ってきました！

dialogue_en: Take care of the rest of me in the meantime, okay bro?
dialogue_jp: 残りのジョニーのことも　どうかお願いします

dialogue_en: You said it! We all want what's best for this place─it's our home.
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: You said it! We all want what's best for this place─it's our home.
dialogue_jp: シーサイド・ジョニーは俺たち全員の家だ　当然さ

dialogue_en: Oh, don't go gettin' all sentimental. We were just doin' what you woulda done!
dialogue_jp: 水くせえな　俺たちの仲だろ　なあ？

dialogue_en: Couldn't've done it without the J-Squad either.
dialogue_jp: おまえたちも　ありがとな

dialogue_en: You're absolutely right! You couldn't have done any of this without my incredible ninjutsu.
dialogue_jp:
そうそう　アタシの忍術のおかげなんだから
感謝してよね

dialogue_en: Without you guys, none of this would've been possible.
dialogue_jp: アニキたちに　助けてもらったおかげです

dialogue_en: I'm impressed.
dialogue_jp: 見違えた

dialogue_en: So? Whaddya think, bro?
dialogue_jp: アニキ　どうっすか

dialogue_en: Wow!
dialogue_jp: わ～お！

dialogue_en: Welcome to Johnny's Seaside Inn: Remake!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Welcome to Johnny's Seaside Inn: Remake!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Welcome to Johnny's Seaside Inn: Remake!
dialogue_jp: ニュー・シーサイドジョニーへ　ようこそ！

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: じゃあな　ジョニー

dialogue_en: Johnny...
dialogue_jp: ジョニー……

dialogue_en: You don't need us anymore, Johnny. You've got you.
dialogue_jp: ジョニー　おまえならひとりでも大丈夫さ

dialogue_en: Johnny?
dialogue_jp: ジョニー……

dialogue_en: Don't worry. You got this, Johnny.
dialogue_jp: ジョニー　あとはまかせた

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: I think it's time that we...peace out.
dialogue_jp: 俺たち　そろそろ消えるわ

dialogue_en: Now that all the renovations are complete...
dialogue_jp: ニュー・シーサイドジョニーも完成したし

dialogue_en: Uh, yeah, about that...
dialogue_jp: いや　それなんだけど

dialogue_en: Well, I'm just happy to know that, whatever trials await, we'll face them together.
dialogue_jp:
へへ　これからもジョニー軍団
力を合わせて　がんばっていこうな

dialogue_en: Truly, you are the realest bro, bro.
dialogue_jp: 俺たちは　おまえが誇らしいよ

dialogue_en: And none of us would be standing here today if it weren't for you─Johnny Prime!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: And none of us would be standing here today if it weren't for you─Johnny Prime!
dialogue_jp:
おまえこそ
こんな俺たちをまとめてくれて　ありがとな

dialogue_en: That means a lot coming from you, bro.
dialogue_jp: へへ　ありがとうございます

dialogue_en: Think one of you's more than enough.
dialogue_jp: おまえは　ひとりでじゅうぶんだ

dialogue_en: Oh, yeah! I'm gonna be seven Johnnys in one!
dialogue_jp: うおおお　燃えてきたぜ～！

dialogue_en: I remodeled this place with my own fourteen hands. I owe it to me and my selfs to see that our hard work doesn't go to waste!
dialogue_jp:
みんなで作った　このニュー・シーサイドジョニー
あいつらのぶんまで　俺が盛りあげていかないと

dialogue_en: That's true...
dialogue_jp: ですよね

dialogue_en: You've got a hotel to run.
dialogue_jp: 勝負は　これからだ

dialogue_en: Hmm?
dialogue_jp: アニキ……

dialogue_en: You gonna let that stop you?
dialogue_jp: 文学的になってる場合か

dialogue_en: I lost a part of myself today...
dialogue_jp: くそ　胸にポッカリ穴が開いちまったみたいだ

dialogue_en: And now I already miss the sound of our melodious voice...
dialogue_jp:
いつしか　あいつらの声に
勇気づけられている俺がいて

dialogue_en: Y'know...I couldn't stand listening to them bicker...
dialogue_jp:
最初は口々にわめいて
うるさいだけだったのに

dialogue_en: Johnnys...
dialogue_jp: ジョニー……

dialogue_en: Johnnys!
dialogue_jp: ジョニーーー！

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Johnny: out!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Three, four!
dialogue_jp: さんはい！

dialogue_en: Our guests can't stop raving about all the artifacts you've donated!
dialogue_jp: アニキのコレクション　お客さんにも評判ですよ

dialogue_en: We'll display your donations with pride in our exclusive collection.

預かったコレクションは

dialogue_en: If you come across any cool curios, you know where to bring 'em.
dialogue_jp: 珍しいモノが手に入ったら　持ってきてくださいね

dialogue_en: How's the collect-a-thon coming, bro?
dialogue_jp: コレクションのほうは　どんな調子ですか

dialogue_en: Got anything rare and exotic for me?
dialogue_jp: 珍品名品　見つかりました？

dialogue_en: Oh! Already got somethin' you wanna show off?
dialogue_jp: さっそく　なにか飾られますか？

dialogue_en: But you'll always have a room with your name on it, my bro, 'cause when you're here, you're Johnny!
dialogue_jp:
コスタにお越しの際は
ぜひ　シーサイド・ジョニーをご利用ください！

dialogue_en: We'll attract guests from far and wide with luxurious lodgings and unbeatable hospitality!
dialogue_jp:
いついかなる時でも　極上のおもてなしで
お客様のお帰りをお待ちしています

dialogue_en: I've got my heart set on becoming the best in the business, so look out, hotel industry!
dialogue_jp:
シーサイド・ジョニーは　これから

dialogue_en: And rest assured you'll be handsomely rewarded for 'em.
dialogue_jp: 飾らせてもらうかわりに　報酬もはずみますんで

dialogue_en: I'd love to showcase any rare or interesting artifacts you happen to come across.

もし　世界の珍品名品が手に入ったら

dialogue_en: Oh! Almost forgot. I set up a little space to show off your collection.

あっ　そうだ

dialogue_en: And I'll always remember that you're the guy who helped me turn that dream into a reality.

いや　俺の胸の中では

dialogue_en: It's only a matter of time till we're certified as a seven-star hotel.

これで　シーサイド・ジョニーは
７つ星のホテルになれたのかもしれません

dialogue_en: Thanks to all your hard work, bro, I'm proud to announce our collection is finally complete.
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　すべてのコレクション
たしかに預からせていただきました

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Duh-duh-duh duuun duuun duuun dun duh-duuun!♪
dialogue_jp:
ちゃちゃちゃちゃ～ちゃ～
ちゃ～ちゃっちゃちゃ～！

dialogue_en: Where ya headed, bro?
dialogue_jp: どちらにご案内しましょう

dialogue_en: Your boy Johnny'll get you wherever you wanna go!
dialogue_jp: ジョニーが　コスタをご案内しますよ～！

dialogue_en: Get around town in a flash with Johnny's fast travel service! So─where to?
dialogue_jp:
ジョニーがすばやく　楽しくご案内！
さあ　どちらへ向かわれますか

dialogue_en: Hey, bro! Guess what? We just started offering guided tours at the hotel.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　アニキ！
シーサイド・ジョニーで街のガイドを始めたんすよ

dialogue_en: We'll display your donations with pride in our exclusive collection.
dialogue_jp:
預かったコレクションは
大切に保管させていただきます

dialogue_en: I've got guests coming from all over to see the stuff you've donated. We're all booked up!
dialogue_jp:
アニキのコレクションのおかげで
お客さんの予約が　ひっきりなしですよ

dialogue_en: Hey, bro! Here to admire the collection? It's become a real tourist attraction.
dialogue_jp:
アニキ　遊びにきてくれたんですね
ゆっくりしていってください

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう～　アッニキ～……

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ジョニー

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう～　アッニキ～！

dialogue_en: Thank you so much, bro, for everything!
dialogue_jp: ありがとう～　アッニキ～！

dialogue_en: And we would like to hire you for a job. Interested?
dialogue_jp:
さっそくなんだけど
あなた　仕事をしてみない？

dialogue_en: Name's Yorda.
dialogue_jp: ボクは　ヨルダ

dialogue_en: And I'm Naomi.
dialogue_jp: あたし　ノエミ

dialogue_en: I'm Fran.
dialogue_jp: 私は　フレン

dialogue_en: Oh, wow─it is you!
dialogue_jp: わわ　ホントだ！

dialogue_en: You're the one who got into it with that Shinra scientist.
dialogue_jp: あなた　神羅の博士と戦ってた人でしょ

dialogue_en: And with that, my work is done. Enjoy your stay, and don't be a stranger!
dialogue_jp:
到着しました～！
またのご利用　お待ちしてま～す

dialogue_en: Here we are. I hope you have an awesome time in Costa del Sol!
dialogue_jp:
到着で～す！
では　バケーションをお楽しみください

dialogue_en: I'll be right here if you change your mind!
dialogue_jp: ご利用の際は　お声がけください

dialogue_en: Come back anytime.
dialogue_jp: また　いつでもどうぞ～！

dialogue_en: Hi! Where are you heading today?
dialogue_jp: どちらへご案内いたしましょう

dialogue_en: Welcome to Johnny's Seaside Travel Service!
dialogue_jp: シーサイド・ジョニーが　コスタをご案内します

dialogue_en: And we made it! Thank you for using Johnny's fast travel service!
dialogue_jp:
着きました～！
またのご利用をお待ちしておりま～す

dialogue_en: Well, here we are! Now go on and enjoy some good old-fashioned fun in the sun!
dialogue_jp:
とうちゃ～く！
それでは　コスタを存分に楽しんでくださいね

dialogue_en: Johnny's here to serve all your fast travel needs.
dialogue_jp: コスタのガイドは　ジョニーにおまかせください

dialogue_en: Feel free to hit me up whenever, bro.
dialogue_jp: いつでも　声をかけてくださいね

dialogue_en: 'Cause we can tell you like your women assertive.
dialogue_jp: あなた　ズバリ押しに弱いでしょ

dialogue_en: Well? Sound like a good gig?
dialogue_jp: どう　引き受けてくれない？

dialogue_en: That's where you come in. We wanna see a real couple on a date─for inspiration.
dialogue_jp:
実際にデートをしているカップルを観察して
参考にしようと思ったんだ

dialogue_en: It's do or die, and we don't wanna kill our careers. So!
dialogue_jp:
危機的状況ってわけ
そこで　ここはひとつ

dialogue_en: And the showcase is basically now.
dialogue_jp: もうすぐ　発表会なのに！

dialogue_en:
But creatively speaking, it's been a struggle.
We've been racking our brains forever!
dialogue_jp:
肝心の新作水着のデザインが
ぜ～んぜん　思い浮かばないの！

dialogue_en: we're thinking something sexy─perfect for the beach, the bar, or in the boudoir.
dialogue_jp:
デートで着ていきたくなる水着をコンセプトに
勝負をかけようと思ってるんだけど

dialogue_en: For our next line...
dialogue_jp: それで　来シーズンは

dialogue_en: The three of us are designers for Costa del Sol's premier fashion boutique.
dialogue_jp:
私たち　コスタで水着を中心とした
アパレルショップを経営しているの

dialogue_en: A date?
dialogue_jp: わたし？

dialogue_en:
It's simple. Girl and boy go on a date.
Easy-peasy, right?
dialogue_jp:
えっとね　彼女さんとふたりで
デートしてほしいの！

dialogue_en: That depends.
dialogue_jp: 内容による

dialogue_en: This is one of the stranger jobs you've accepted.
dialogue_jp: なんか　不思議な依頼だね

dialogue_en: They'll be waiting for you at Run Wild and Pirate's Rampage. Have fun!
dialogue_jp:
フレンはパイレーツ・ランページ
ノエミはラン・ワイルドで待ってるよ

dialogue_en:
First, find Naomi and Fran.
They'll kick-start your date.
dialogue_jp:
まずは　ノエミとフレンが用意した
デートを楽しんで

dialogue_en: You're going to absolutely love what we've cooked up for you.
dialogue_jp:
ボクも　とっておきのデートプランを
用意しておくよ

dialogue_en:
This is going to be your best date yet!
We'll make sure of it!
dialogue_jp:
ふたりは　コスタの景色を楽しみながら
ゆっくり来てね

dialogue_en: Be ready to swashbuckle at Pirate's Rampage!
dialogue_jp: 私は　パイレーツ・ランページの準備をしてくるわ

dialogue_en: Get rowdy at Run Wild!
dialogue_jp: あたしは　ラン・ワイルド！

dialogue_en:
We've already planned the perfect date
for lovebirds like you.
dialogue_jp: デートコースは　あたしたちにまっかせなさい！

dialogue_en: We knew you would! And so...
dialogue_jp: ありがとう　それじゃあ

dialogue_en: We got a business to run.
dialogue_jp: 見込み違いだったな

dialogue_en: And if we're being honest, we figured it couldn't hurt to butter up a company bigwig.
dialogue_jp:
神羅にコネができれば
ミッドガルに出店できるかと思ったけど

dialogue_en: We were just doing the mayor a favor. That's all.
dialogue_jp: 私たちは　市長に頼まれて接待しただけ

dialogue_en: "Hojo" as in...that Shinra guy?
dialogue_jp: 宝条って　あの神羅の博士さん？

dialogue_en: Maybe? I mean, uh...I'd like to think so.
dialogue_jp: それは……う～ん　どうかな

dialogue_en: One look at you, and we knew "That woman's not afraid to take what she wants."
dialogue_jp:
そんでもって　あなたは
ぐいぐいと引っ張っていくタイプでしょ？

dialogue_en: And since we're all about strong, confident ladies, we thought "ka-ching!"
dialogue_jp:
女の子が　デートをぐいぐいと引っ張る
っていうのがコンセプトなんだ

dialogue_en: Just let me know when you wanna give it a shot.
dialogue_jp: ハンティングの準備が整ったら　声をかけて

dialogue_en: Locked and loaded?
dialogue_jp: ふふ　恋のハンティングね

dialogue_en: Do well and you might just land a bull's-eye on her heart.
dialogue_jp:
マトといっしょに
彼女のハートも撃ち抜いちゃいなさい

dialogue_en: Look who it is. So, are you ready to aim and fire?
dialogue_jp:
ふふ　来たわね
それじゃあ　恋のハンティングといきましょうか

dialogue_en: Ah, memories.
dialogue_jp: 楽しかったね　あれ

dialogue_en: Sure...
dialogue_jp: ああ

dialogue_en: Across...rooftops, perhaps?
dialogue_jp: ああ　屋根の上とか？

dialogue_en: Like a walk...?
dialogue_jp: いっしょに歩く

dialogue_en: And what's a "simple date" in your world?
dialogue_jp: クラウドの普通って　どんなの？

dialogue_en: We could just keep it simple.
dialogue_jp: いや　普通でいい

dialogue_en: Hey, I can help. I'll make this date our best yet!
dialogue_jp: そう？　じゃあ　はりきっちゃおうかな

dialogue_en: Still a job. I'll take the lead.
dialogue_jp: ああ　今回はまかせる

dialogue_en: Are we doin' good or are we doin' good?
dialogue_jp: ど～よ　イイ感じ？

dialogue_en: There we go.
dialogue_jp: 効いてるみたい！

dialogue_en:
Hahaha!
Didn't see that one comin', didja!?
dialogue_jp: うおお　ざまあみやがれ！

dialogue_en: Give it a rest already!
dialogue_jp: もう　しつこいな～！

dialogue_en: Oh, now that's just cheating!
dialogue_jp: マジか～……

dialogue_en: Not this again...
dialogue_jp: キリがないね

dialogue_en: Oh, come on!
dialogue_jp: また？

dialogue_en: Don't you know any other tricks!?
dialogue_jp: しつけえ野郎だ！

dialogue_en: What were you aiming at?
dialogue_jp: どこ狙ってるの？

dialogue_en: Great job!
dialogue_jp: いいねいいね～！

dialogue_en: Oho! Someone's confident.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　じょうず！

dialogue_en: Awesome!
dialogue_jp: よ～し　バッチリ！

dialogue_en: You did it!
dialogue_jp: やったね！

dialogue_en: Sweet!
dialogue_jp: やった！

dialogue_en: Nice one!
dialogue_jp: さっすが～！

dialogue_en: Wow!
dialogue_jp: すごい！

dialogue_en: Perfect!
dialogue_jp: バッチリ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, keep it up!
dialogue_jp: その調子！

dialogue_en: Go, go!
dialogue_jp: ゴーゴー！

dialogue_en: You got this!
dialogue_jp: はりきっていこ！

dialogue_en: Have fun!
dialogue_jp: 楽しんでね

dialogue_en: Knock 'em dead, handsome!
dialogue_jp: さあ　腕の見せどころ

dialogue_en: You know...in a weird way, that was actually kinda cute─seeing a guy like you fail that hard.
dialogue_jp:
なんだろ　ちょっとキュンとしちゃった
ダメなクラウドも　それはそれでアリかも

dialogue_en: I'm better with a sword.
dialogue_jp: 剣なら　もっとやれた

dialogue_en: Now here's a woman who knows how to hunt for a man! I like.
dialogue_jp:
彼女さんが　彼氏さんを撃ち抜いちゃう？
それもアリね

dialogue_en: Alright, not bad. Though I'm pretty sure I've got better aim.
dialogue_jp:
まあまあかな～？
わたしのほうが　うまいかも

dialogue_en:
You know...
the secret is to aim for the head, not the heart.
dialogue_jp: 胸ではなく　頭を狙ったほうが確実だ

dialogue_en: Oh! Got me right through the heart...the cad!
dialogue_jp: うう　撃ち抜かれちゃった……かも？

dialogue_en: Wow, look at that score! Those are some pro numbers. But...what'd the lady think?
dialogue_jp:
へえ　あなた　ただモノじゃないわね
彼女さんはどうだった？

dialogue_en: Hmm...
dialogue_jp: う～ん……

dialogue_en: Uh...
dialogue_jp: だいじょうぶ？

dialogue_en: Aw, man...
dialogue_jp: そんな～

dialogue_en: Wowza...
dialogue_jp: あれ～？

dialogue_en: Oh, so close...
dialogue_jp: クラウドさ～ん？

dialogue_en: So close!
dialogue_jp: ダメか～

dialogue_en: Aw...
Not a good look.
dialogue_jp: だらしないわね

dialogue_en: Believe me, I know.
dialogue_jp: 知ってるよ　すぐわかった

dialogue_en: 'Cause I'm no romantic.
dialogue_jp: デ・エ・ト……

dialogue_en: Why?
dialogue_jp: なにが？

dialogue_en: I wish you wouldn't...
dialogue_jp: 得意じゃないんだ

dialogue_en: You're no fun at all today. Well, for the record, I am treating this as a date!
dialogue_jp:
もう　じゃあそう思ってて
わたしは　デートだって考える

dialogue_en: Tryin' to get paid.
dialogue_jp: 仕事だけどな

dialogue_en: Oh, lighten up. We're trying to enjoy ourselves!
dialogue_jp:
クラウド　考えすぎ
楽しもう！

dialogue_en: More cheap date ideas?
dialogue_jp: デートの安売りだな

dialogue_en: I wonder what the girls have next on the agenda for us.
dialogue_jp: さ～て　次はどんなデートかな～？

dialogue_en: You two find Yorda. She should be over by the chocobo stables, just outside of town.
dialogue_jp:
ヨルダが　最後のデートを用意してるみたい
チョコボのレンタルショップまで行ってみて

dialogue_en:
You two, however, still have a date to finish.
Go find Naomi at Run Wild.
dialogue_jp:
ふたりはデートを続けてね
ノエミが　ラン・ワイルドで待ってると思うから

dialogue_en: Thanks, cuties. That was just what I needed. I'll head back, now that the creative juices are flowing again.
dialogue_jp:
ありがとう　いいものを見せてもらったわ
私は水着を仕立てに　店へ戻るわね

dialogue_en: The score didn't matter.
dialogue_jp: 結果は　重要じゃないのね

dialogue_en:
She never once took her eyes off her man.
And the way she stared at him...
dialogue_jp:
男の子ががんばる姿
それを眺める　彼女の眼差し

dialogue_en: It's been a while since I used a gun, okay?
dialogue_jp: 銃は　久しぶりだったからな

dialogue_en: Interesting... So there is a market for total losers. The more you know.
dialogue_jp:
なるほど　ダメな男も需要はあるってわけね
勉強になるわ

dialogue_en: People are technically animals too. Right? So it's cool!
dialogue_jp:
人間だって動物
ねっ　問題ないよね

dialogue_en: You do know this is for animals, right? Not people?
dialogue_jp:
聞いていなかったのか
これは　動物のレースだ

dialogue_en: Alright...wish me luck, okay?
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　わたし　行ってくる

dialogue_en: Gimme a shout when you wanna get wild.
dialogue_jp: 準備ができたら　声をかけてね

dialogue_en: Are you ready to go?
dialogue_jp: 準備はオッケー？

dialogue_en: Not hard to guess why, seeing all those cutie-wooties... I mean, it's the perfect spot for a date!
dialogue_jp:
動物に癒やされつつ　白熱するレース！
ねっ　デートにはぴったりでしょ？

dialogue_en:
Run Wild, of course! Tell me you've heard of it.
It's only the hottest sport in town!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ名物　ラン・ワイルドだよ
ボールを転がして競争するの

dialogue_en: What game?
dialogue_jp: レースって？

dialogue_en:
Someone took their sweet time, I see.
Better hurry or the game'll start without you!
dialogue_jp:
きたきた　おそ～い！
早くしないとレースが始まっちゃうよ

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: くっ……

dialogue_en: Again with this?
dialogue_jp: またかよ！

dialogue_en: I'm not goin' anywhere near that!
dialogue_jp: あんなの　避けらんないよ！

dialogue_en: Dammit!
dialogue_jp: ウソでしょ？

dialogue_en: What kind of bullshit─
dialogue_jp: やっべーぞ　やっべーぞ！

dialogue_en:
Jumbo fried chicken's
on the menu tonight, baby!
dialogue_jp: おっひょ～　イイじゃんイイじゃん！

dialogue_en: Got it on the back foot now!
dialogue_jp: よし　いい感じ！

dialogue_en: Haha! Ya see that? Now we're cookin'!
dialogue_jp: おお　いけるぞこりゃ！

dialogue_en: Ugly's workin' on something!
dialogue_jp: げっ　狙い撃ち？

dialogue_en: Careful!
dialogue_jp: なにかくる！

dialogue_en: What's this thing up to now?
dialogue_jp: おう　気をつけろ！

dialogue_en: C'mere, ya big bully!
dialogue_jp: 先手ひっしょ～！

dialogue_en: C'mon!
dialogue_jp: チャンスだよ！

dialogue_en:
That's right─
brought you down to our level!
dialogue_jp: けっ　狙い撃ちだぜ！

dialogue_en: Time to bring it down.
dialogue_jp: 好機を逃すな

dialogue_en: Now's our chance!
dialogue_jp: 一気に決めるぞ

dialogue_en: Take 'em out!
dialogue_jp: 決めちゃおう！

dialogue_en: The three of us should go a round sometime! Wouldn't that be fun?
dialogue_jp: 今度は　わたしたち３人で競争する？

dialogue_en: Haha! That's me.
dialogue_jp: へへ　まあね～

dialogue_en: I am quick on my feet.
dialogue_jp: 強い者が勝つ

dialogue_en: You were like a red bolt shooting across that field!
dialogue_jp: すごいじゃん　まるで赤いイナズマ！

dialogue_en: Gimme an R, gimme an E, gimme a D!
dialogue_jp: チーム・レッド　レディ・ゴー！

dialogue_en: Well...I guess we'll just have to be the cheer squad!
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　わたしたち　応援団だね

dialogue_en: Nanaki's got this.
dialogue_jp: ナナキにまかせよう

dialogue_en: Red's got this.
dialogue_jp: レッドにまかせよう

dialogue_en: My time to shine!
dialogue_jp: オイラ　駆けっこしたい！

dialogue_en:
Though I take umbrage with that nomenclature...
I'm happy to offer my assistance.
dialogue_jp:
断じて　ペットではないが……
私の出番のようだな

dialogue_en: No, but your pet can.
dialogue_jp: ペットとか飼ってないの？

dialogue_en: What? I really can't compete?
dialogue_jp: ええ～　そんなあ

dialogue_en: Wrong. Not cool.
dialogue_jp: ブッブー　無理で～す

dialogue_en: I need to get back to the shop, like, yesterday!
dialogue_jp:
こうしちゃいらんない
あたし　お店に戻るね！

dialogue_en: That's it─I'm such a genius! I've got to get this idea down on paper!
dialogue_jp:
ピコーン　あたし閃いちゃった
あふれだすイマジネーション！

dialogue_en: And watching their little guy give it his all out there only served to strengthen their bond...
dialogue_jp:
それは　ワンちゃんが動きまわることによって
より強く　かたくなっていく

dialogue_en: Hm... Their dog is the glue that binds their relationship...
dialogue_jp: ふんふん　ペットが繋いだふたりの絆

dialogue_en: Not anymore it won't─not if I train harder!
dialogue_jp: こんな日はいらない　オイラ練習する！

dialogue_en: I don't need your pity. What I need is to train.
dialogue_jp: 気休めは不要　いまから走りこんでくる

dialogue_en: Yeah, it happens.
dialogue_jp: そういう日もある

dialogue_en: Don't beat yourself up. You had an off day, that's all.
dialogue_jp: ちょっと　調子悪かったのかな

dialogue_en: Ugh... I totally screwed that up.
dialogue_jp: オイラ　のろまのナナキだ

dialogue_en: What a disaster.
dialogue_jp: こんなはずでは……

dialogue_en: Next time.
dialogue_jp: あはは　ドンマイ

dialogue_en: Could've finished stronger...
dialogue_jp: 最後　ちょっとバテちゃった

dialogue_en: Not good enough. I was sloppy.
dialogue_jp: スパートをかけるのが　すこし遅かったか

dialogue_en: You did real good.
dialogue_jp: おしい～！

dialogue_en: Yeah, that does sound fun!
dialogue_jp: いいね　やろやろ！

dialogue_en: If you enjoy losing.
dialogue_jp: 受けて立とう

dialogue_en: So the idea is to ride Kyma here and enjoy a romantic stroll along the beach.
dialogue_jp:
ふたりには　この子に乗って
クラムシェルビーチを遊覧してもらいます

dialogue_en: That's Kyma. Take good care of her.
dialogue_jp: 名前はキュマちゃん　よろしくね

dialogue_en: It'll let you rent a chocobo whenever.
dialogue_jp: これで　チョコボを自由に使えるよ

dialogue_en: Here, take this.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　まずはこれを

dialogue_en: Before that, though, I need to add your information to the system.
dialogue_jp:
キミたち　まだチョコボレンタルの
会員になってないよね？

dialogue_en: There you are! Okay, I've got a great activity for you.
dialogue_jp:
来たね
とっておきのデートコースを用意したよ

dialogue_en: Okey dokey, then...
dialogue_jp: あはははは　なるほどね～

dialogue_en: Maybe made with non-absorbent materials that allow for full range of motion─in case you need to fight underwater.
dialogue_jp:
撥水性が高く　水の抵抗を受け流し
水中での戦闘を想定した水着がいいな

dialogue_en: Well, I prefer function over form, so durable...
dialogue_jp: そうだな　機能性が高いものがいい

dialogue_en: Yes you. I'm curious!
dialogue_jp: 参考にしようと思って

dialogue_en: Me?
dialogue_jp: なぜだ？

dialogue_en: Hey─what kinda swimsuit would you wanna see?
dialogue_jp: クラウド　どんな水着　好き？

dialogue_en: Wonder what sorta design the girls are gonna come up with.
dialogue_jp: 新作水着　楽しみだね

dialogue_en:
So what're you waiting for?
Get those tushies on a chocobo!
dialogue_jp:
おふたりさんは
チョコボのレンタルショップへ　ゴー！

dialogue_en: Yorda's at the stables for the final part of your date.
dialogue_jp: ヨルダが　最後のデートを用意して待ってるから

dialogue_en: Fran's over at Pirate's Rampage, by the way. She'll make sure the next part of your date is a blast!
dialogue_jp:
パイレーツ・ランページでフレンが待ってるから
おふたりさんは引き続き　デートを楽しんでね～！

dialogue_en: Right...
dialogue_jp: はぐらかした

dialogue_en: Oh... You meant the shells, right?
dialogue_jp: たしかに　貝殻を探すのは初めてだな

dialogue_en: I'm not talking about the chocobos.
dialogue_jp: それとこれは　べつ

dialogue_en: You've ridden them before.
dialogue_jp: 何度か乗っただろ

dialogue_en: I dunno about you, but this is definitely a first for me.
dialogue_jp:
チョコボデートなんて
わたし　はじめて！

dialogue_en: Just bring back the biggest one you can find.
dialogue_jp: できるだけ　大きなやつを期待してるよ

dialogue_en: Have you been down to that beach yet? Ride Kyma over there, and see if you can find some shells.
dialogue_jp:
クラムシェルビーチには行った？
チョコボに乗って　貝殻をとってきてね

dialogue_en: Don't forget to have fun, okay?
dialogue_jp: 海岸デートを楽しんできて

dialogue_en: What're you still doing here? Get down to the beach and see what kinda shells you can find.
dialogue_jp:
クラムシェルビーチに行ってみて
ステキな貝殻を　楽しみにしているよ

dialogue_en: So you two run along and have yourselves one "shell" of a time!
dialogue_jp:
ふたりで　ステキな思い出を作って
貝殻といっしょに届けてね

dialogue_en: I'll be chillin' back here.
dialogue_jp: ボクは　ここで待っているから

dialogue_en: How about you bring me the largest one you can find? Sound good?
dialogue_jp:
せっかくだし
できるだけ　大きいものがいいな

dialogue_en: But that on its own sounds like a huge yawnfest, so try hunting for shells while you're at it.
dialogue_jp:
ただ目的もなく散歩するのもなんだから
貝殻をとってきてもらおうかな

dialogue_en: Aw!
dialogue_jp: かわいい～！

dialogue_en: Kweh!
dialogue_jp: クエ！

dialogue_en: It's so teeny-tiny!
dialogue_jp: ちいさくて　可愛らしいね

dialogue_en: Next time, for sure!
dialogue_jp: ありゃ　ハズレ？

dialogue_en: That's another "Nope."
dialogue_jp: う～ん　失敗

dialogue_en: Okay! Let's get back to it, shall we?
dialogue_jp: さて　貝殻探しといきますか

dialogue_en: No, it ain't!
dialogue_jp: そのようだ

dialogue_en: Well, that's not what we wanted!
dialogue_jp: ありゃ　罰ゲーム？

dialogue_en: Let's saddle up first, then search.
dialogue_jp: まずは　チョコボに乗らないとな

dialogue_en: You ready to dig around for those seashells, Cloud?
dialogue_jp: さて　貝殻探しといきますか

dialogue_en: Sounds good. Back on the birds we go!
dialogue_jp: ステキな思い出　作らないとね

dialogue_en: Let's saddle up first, then search.
dialogue_jp: まずは　チョコボに乗らないとな

dialogue_en: Alright, seashells. Ready or not, here we come!
dialogue_jp: さて　貝殻探しといきますか

dialogue_en: But first, we clean up the trash.
dialogue_jp: そのまえに　掃除が必要だ

dialogue_en: We should be able to find some good shells around here.
dialogue_jp: 貝殻があるのって　このあたりかな

dialogue_en: The merc's nervous!
dialogue_jp: 緊張してる～！

dialogue_en: About what? Easiest job I've ever had.
dialogue_jp: まさか　楽な仕事だ

dialogue_en: Wait a second... Are you nervous?
dialogue_jp: もしかして　緊張してる？

dialogue_en: Wonder how they taste.
dialogue_jp: 味は　どうだろうな

dialogue_en: Hmm, if these things are all this size, I bet the suckers who live in 'em would make for good eatin'.
dialogue_jp:
貝殻が大きいから　中身もたっぷりだね
食べごたえありそう

dialogue_en: Keep it down, birdie.
dialogue_jp: 静かにしてくれ

dialogue_en: Pwsh, bwoo... Caw caw!
dialogue_jp: ざざ～　ざざ～　ざぶ～ん

dialogue_en: Here.
dialogue_jp: はい！

dialogue_en: I'm good.
dialogue_jp: 俺は　べつに

dialogue_en: Oh, just try it, you spoilsport.
dialogue_jp: クラウドも聞いてみる？　はい！

dialogue_en: That's a myth.
dialogue_jp: 反響音だ

dialogue_en: Y'know, you can hear the ocean if you put this seashell right up against your ear.
dialogue_jp:
ねえ　この貝
耳にあてると　波の音がする

dialogue_en: Oh... That took a turn.
dialogue_jp: ええ～　そんな話？

dialogue_en: And an omen of death for the trooper if anyone else sees either one, some people say...
dialogue_jp:
その貝殻をだれかに見せると
それは　死の予兆に変わる

dialogue_en: I know where this is going! It's meant to be a keepsake for their partner, right? A symbol of their undying love!
dialogue_jp:
家族や恋人と持ち合いっこするんだよね
ロマンチックだよね～

dialogue_en: You know, a lotta troopers take half a shell with 'em when they head out on missions.
dialogue_jp:
二枚貝の片割れを持っている兵士が
戦場には　大勢いたんだ

dialogue_en: Whoa, I don't think I've ever seen a shell this big before!
dialogue_jp: うわ　おっきい　いいねいいね～！

dialogue_en: Nice, a conch! Decent size one too.
dialogue_jp: 面白いかたち　大きさもまずまず

dialogue_en:
Welcome back, you two.
So! Happen to find any neat shells out there?
dialogue_jp:
おかえり
さて　どんな貝殻を集めてきたのかな？

dialogue_en: Sorry.
dialogue_jp: ごめん……

dialogue_en: I'm not trying to be mean, I...
dialogue_jp: そういうわけじゃないけど

dialogue_en: Okay, now you're just bein' mean.
dialogue_jp: 俺を　困らせようとしているのか

dialogue_en: This date's DOA otherwise.
dialogue_jp: それが　つぎに繋がるの

dialogue_en: This is the part where you're supposed to blurt out "I don't wanna go back! I wanna stay here with you!"
dialogue_jp:
嘘でもいいから
『まだ　もっと一緒にいたい』って答えなくちゃ

dialogue_en: Really─leaving the decision to me? What about you, Cloud? Are you sure?
dialogue_jp:
その言い方　なんかズルい
クラウドこそ　満足した？

dialogue_en: Are you sure?
dialogue_jp: 満足したか？

dialogue_en: Whew! I think that should just about do it. Okay, ready to go?
dialogue_jp:
ふう　かなり集まったね
そろそろ　戻ろっか

dialogue_en: I guess we'll see, won't we?
dialogue_jp: もう　慣れて！

dialogue_en: You're...screwing with me, right?
dialogue_jp: エアリス　これはなんの話だ

dialogue_en: Don't you know what happens to people who say they don't care what their food tastes like? They spontaneously combust.
dialogue_jp:
あっ　聞いたことある
そういう人　ある日とつぜん爆発するって

dialogue_en: Uh-oh...
dialogue_jp: ふ～ん

dialogue_en: I don't. Food's food.
dialogue_jp: まずくても　文句を言わないだけだ

dialogue_en: We could ask a local, but you don't strike me as the type to care all that much.
dialogue_jp:
そうだね
でもクラウド　味　気にしなさそう

dialogue_en: Dang. That thing belongs in a museum or something!
dialogue_jp: 博物館とかに飾ったほうがよさそう

dialogue_en: Huge, right?
dialogue_jp: すごいでしょ

dialogue_en: Whoa...
dialogue_jp: こっ　これは……

dialogue_en: Oh no! I forgot!
dialogue_jp: あっ　忘れてた

dialogue_en: You try holding it up to your ear to hear the ocean waves?
dialogue_jp: 耳を寄せあって　波の音　聞いてみた？

dialogue_en: Oh! I like the spiral on that.
dialogue_jp: きれいに巻きあげられた螺旋か

dialogue_en: Two halves of a whole─like all good couples!
dialogue_jp: 恋人同士が持つのに　ぴったり！

dialogue_en: Aw! That's a cute little clam shell.
dialogue_jp: へえ　可愛らしい二枚貝だね

dialogue_en: Don't want your date to end, huh?
dialogue_jp: ふふ　まだデートしたりないかい？

dialogue_en: But...you don't have a shell like that.
dialogue_jp: うん？　そんな貝殻ないけど

dialogue_en: How was the beach? Romantic?
dialogue_jp: チョコボデートは楽しかった？

dialogue_en:
Wanna land a big catch?
With this look, it'll be hook, line, and sinker!
dialogue_jp:
オシャレして　ステキな思い出
拾いに行ってみませんか？

dialogue_en: Love might be a game, but you'll never lose in this winning ensemble!
dialogue_jp: 情熱的な水着で　恋のレースを駆け抜けてみよっか

dialogue_en:
Wanna shoot your shot?
This swimsuit's got perfect aim.
dialogue_jp: 狙った相手を撃ち抜くなら　この水着で決まり

dialogue_en: Oh, fine. If you've got to be the man up front...
dialogue_jp: いいよ　じゃあ　おじゃましま～す

dialogue_en: I'm still steering.
dialogue_jp: 前はゆずれない

dialogue_en: Which would make it that much easier to take in all the scenery.
dialogue_jp: ゆっくり景色見るのも　いいと思うけどな～

dialogue_en: And slow down the bird?
dialogue_jp: スピードが落ちる

dialogue_en: Next time we need a chocobo, I say we ride double.
dialogue_jp: 今度は　ふたり乗りしてみる？　チョコボ

dialogue_en: See ya there!
dialogue_jp: それじゃあ　また

dialogue_en:
But! Before I go─swing by the fashion showcase.
We want you front row center!
dialogue_jp:
あとで　ビーチのイベント会場まで来てよ
水着の発表会を開くから

dialogue_en: I know what to make!
dialogue_jp: ボクは　店に戻るね

dialogue_en: Aha, I've got it! Inspiration has finally struck!
dialogue_jp: うん　おかげで新作水着のモチーフが決まったよ

dialogue_en: I can't help but wonder what is making her smile from ear to ear like that. Is it the shells, or...?
dialogue_jp:
女性を笑顔にするのは　貝殻か思い出か
あるいは　その両方か……

dialogue_en: Let's go to work!
dialogue_jp: このまま決めよう

dialogue_en: Let's finish this!
dialogue_jp: 一気に叩き込む！

dialogue_en: Go for it, guys!
dialogue_jp: いまがチャンスだ

dialogue_en: Not for long, it isn't.
dialogue_jp: 大丈夫だ　振りほどく

dialogue_en: It's aiming at you!
dialogue_jp: 狙われてるよ！

dialogue_en: You go, girls!
dialogue_jp: ははっ　やるじゃん！

dialogue_en:
And it's signed, "the First and Third Guardian Angels of the Slums, radiant saviors of the sunkissed"!
No way!
dialogue_jp:
『ビーチに舞い降りた　美しき怪盗コンビ
　スラムエンジェル１世＆３世』……だって

dialogue_en: "We hereby bequeath your ill-gotten gains to the more deserving masses."
dialogue_jp: 『不正に溜め込んだ金銀財宝　いただきます』

dialogue_en: You'd better head back!
dialogue_jp: 急いで　お戻りください

dialogue_en: What!?
dialogue_jp: なんだと！

dialogue_en: They even found the secret safe. It's empty.
dialogue_jp: 隠し金庫がやられました　からっぽです

dialogue_en: See for yourself...
dialogue_jp: これを……

dialogue_en: Sir! We've got trouble!
dialogue_jp: 市長　大変です！

dialogue_en: Enjoy our town to its fullest, and leave with a smile!
dialogue_jp: シャイニングな砂浜を　思う存分楽しんでね

dialogue_en: Bask in the sun...
dialogue_jp: イターナルな空と！

dialogue_en: So next time you swing by, promise to frolic in the waters...
dialogue_jp:
だから　これからも
コスタのマリンブルーな海と

dialogue_en: And making sure they do is what we do best.
dialogue_jp: その思い出を彩るのが　私たちの役目

dialogue_en: Exactly! This place is more than just a vacay spot─it's a paradise where people come to create lifelong memories!
dialogue_jp:
コスタ・デル・ソルは太陽の楽園
みんな　ステキな思い出を作って帰っていく

dialogue_en: That's what we wanted! Happy couples get us inspired and fired up!
dialogue_jp:
コスタを楽しんでる人を見ると
インスピレーションがわくんだよ！

dialogue_en: I absolutely loved it! But the two of us didn't do anything "inspo"-worthy. We just had fun.
dialogue_jp:
とってもステキ！
でも　わたしたち楽しんだ……だけだよね

dialogue_en:
So? What'd you think of the show?
You were the inspo, after all!
dialogue_jp:
どうだい？
キミたちのデートが生み出した新作水着は

dialogue_en: I'm so glad you came!
dialogue_jp: 見にきてくれたんだね！

dialogue_en: So come join our gym, and muscle maximize!
dialogue_jp:
さあ　ごいっしょに
マッスル・ハーモニー！

dialogue_en: You wanna get ripped? You want a hot bod!? Then you better train with the best of the best!
dialogue_jp:
そんなあなたは
ミッドガルのジム『ダンダンダン』へ！

dialogue_en: My friends! Who among you doesn't ache for that perfect swimsuit physique!?
dialogue_jp:
諸君　水着が似合う
美しい肉体が欲しくないか！

dialogue_en: I hope you haven't lost your touch.
dialogue_jp: 射的の腕　なまってない？

dialogue_en: Well, well. Back on another date?
dialogue_jp: あら　またデートに来たの？

dialogue_en: I just hope we can make enough to meet the demand!
dialogue_jp: あとは量産体制を整えないと

dialogue_en: People are going crazy for the new designs.
dialogue_jp: おかげさまで　評判は上々だよ

dialogue_en: Do you think your furry friend would mind modeling for me?
dialogue_jp: あの赤いワンちゃんにモデルをお願いできる？

dialogue_en: I wonder if there's a market for doggy swimsuits.
dialogue_jp: 次は動物用の水着も作ってみようかな

dialogue_en: I'm expecting lots of lovebirds next season.
dialogue_jp: 来シーズンは　カップルが増えるわよ

dialogue_en: We should call our new design the Romantico!
dialogue_jp: 新作水着は　キューピットって名前にするわ

dialogue_en: Okay...
dialogue_jp: 考えておく

dialogue_en: Oh, right─that reminds me... Stop by the training facility when you have a moment. We're in need of your particular skills.
dialogue_jp:
そうだ　ねえ　あとで合宿場に顔を出してくれよ
なんでも屋に頼みたいことがあるんだ

dialogue_en: And commissioning this year's new singlets from these talented young women.
dialogue_jp:
毎年ここで　新しいコスチュームを
作ってもらってるんだよ

dialogue_en: Relaxing, really. We're on our yearly beach retreat.
dialogue_jp: ジムのみんなと　マッスル合宿に来ていてね

dialogue_en: What're you doin' here?
dialogue_jp: どうしてここに？

dialogue_en: Oh, hey! You trade the city for the beach too?
dialogue_jp: あっ　ウォール・マーケットのジムのひと！

dialogue_en: Do my eyes deceive me? Is that Cloud?
dialogue_jp: そこにいるのは　クラウドくんじゃないか？

dialogue_en: Whaddya say? Care to sweat with us?
dialogue_jp: どうだい　ウズウズするかい？

dialogue_en: Once a year, we take a retreat to enjoy the sun and sea breeze. Nothing like getting some gains in the great outdoors.
dialogue_jp:
こうやって年にいちど　潮風と太陽を浴びて
筋肉に磨きをかける合宿をしてるんだ

dialogue_en:
Ah, there you are.
Glad you could make it, Cloud, Tifa.
dialogue_jp:
おお　よく来たね
クラウドくん　ティファくん

dialogue_en: How do you like our new singlets? They're perfectly tailored to our dimensions.
dialogue_jp:
新コスチュームは　どうだい？
とても動きやすいんだよ

dialogue_en: I'll see you at the training facility.
dialogue_jp: 合宿場で待っているよ

dialogue_en: Hard to enjoy a vacation with the threat of war looming over you... Hard to enjoy much of anything, really.
dialogue_jp:
平和じゃないとバケーションも楽しめないからね
戦争なんてカンベンしてほしいよ

dialogue_en: Things've felt pretty doom-and-gloomy around here ever since that broadcast out of Wutai.
dialogue_jp:
ウータイの放送があってから
空気がすこし　重くなった気がするよ

dialogue_en: What about a ninja-kini? That could be cute, right?
dialogue_jp: シノビをイメージした水着も作ってみたいな

dialogue_en: Wonder what kinda swimsuits they wear in Wutai.
dialogue_jp: ウータイの水着って　どんな感じなんだろ

dialogue_en: No matter what's going on in the world, we're still committed to our craft.
dialogue_jp:
どんな状況になっても
私たちは　水着を作り続けるわよ

dialogue_en: But maybe now's not the time...
dialogue_jp: それどころじゃないかもね

dialogue_en: I was hoping to make some connections at Shinra─help get our foot in the door.
dialogue_jp:
ミッドガル進出のために
神羅にコネを作りたかったけど

dialogue_en: I'll stitch the perfect suit just for you!
dialogue_jp: キミにピッタリな水着を作ってみせるよ

dialogue_en: We'd love to have you as a model in our next fashion show.
dialogue_jp: 次の水着イベントは　モデルで出てみないか

dialogue_en: Red fur could make for a fun swimsuit trim...
dialogue_jp: 真っ赤な毛がはえた水着って　新しくない？

dialogue_en: Your pet must feel like he's in an oven with all that fur.
dialogue_jp: 赤いワンちゃん　毛だらけで暑くないの？

dialogue_en: Now let's get down to business, shall we?
dialogue_jp: それじゃ　本題に入ろうか

dialogue_en: But I'm not too concerned about that. As you know, our passion for getting pumped up is second to none.
dialogue_jp:
でも　そこは心配していないよ
ボクたちの筋トレにかける情熱は本物さ

dialogue_en: Hah. Fair enough. The heart is the strongest muscle.
dialogue_jp:
あはは　そうだね
何事も気持ちが大事だよね

dialogue_en: Treat your muscles to a nice post-workout meal, and they'll reward you with even bigger gains.
dialogue_jp:
筋トレでいじめ抜いた後に良い食事をとることで
より良い筋肉ができるんだ

dialogue_en: Exactly. Can't expect to bulk up without the building blocks.
dialogue_jp:
そのとおり
大事なのはスクラップ＆ビルド！

dialogue_en: And as luck would have it, we've got a full assortment right here.
dialogue_jp: ただ　おかげさまで器具はそろってるんだ

dialogue_en: Exactly. Body weight exercises will only take you so far. If you want to get really jacked, you'll need the resistance only equipment can provide.
dialogue_jp:
そのとおり　自重での筋トレには限界がある
筋肉を大きくするなら　器具の負荷が効果的だよね

dialogue_en: Here's a question for you, Cloud. What would you say is the key to a good workout?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドくん
筋トレに大事なものがなにか　わかるかい？

dialogue_en: You mean it? Well, I might just take you up on that!
dialogue_jp:
本当ですか？
ぜひ　お願いします！

dialogue_en: Well, we'll happily help you both become your best selves. Train with us as long as you like!
dialogue_jp:
ティファくんなら　いつでも大歓迎だよ
好きに鍛えていってくれたまえ

dialogue_en:
I think I would.
I haven't done a proper workout in forever.
dialogue_jp:
はい　実は最近
トレーニングできてなくて

dialogue_en: Shoulda ate there more.
dialogue_jp: もっと食べておけばよかった

dialogue_en: Half was a holdover from the old owner. The better half was mine.
dialogue_jp: 前のオーナーからの引き継ぎと　半々くらい

dialogue_en: So you were the one behind Seventh Heaven's menu?
dialogue_jp:
セブンスヘブンのメニューは
ティファが考えたのか

dialogue_en: Huh? Oh, sorry. Just some mental meal prep. The ideal post-workout dish.
dialogue_jp:
ああ　ごめん　筋トレのあとなら
どんな料理がいいかなって考えてた

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: Can't really go wrong with steak, I guess.
dialogue_jp: やっぱりシンプルに　ステーキかな

dialogue_en: I think she'd be pretty proud.
dialogue_jp: どんな子だと思ってたの？

dialogue_en: Wonder what little Tifa would say.
dialogue_jp: 子供の頃とは　別人だ

dialogue_en: Well, yeah. Wanted an excuse to work up a sweat, and now I've got one.
dialogue_jp:
そうだね　体を動かしたいって思ってたから
嬉しくって

dialogue_en: Someone's excited.
dialogue_jp: 楽しそうだな

dialogue_en: Let's get out there and kick some ass!
dialogue_jp: さあ　さっさと倒しちゃお！

dialogue_en: We can't train our bodies unless our minds are at ease, so you'll be doing all of us muscleheads a big favor.
dialogue_jp:
安心してトレーニングができる環境というのも
筋トレには大事だからね　助かるよ

dialogue_en: Splendid.
dialogue_jp: ありがとう

dialogue_en: Sure. Should be easy enough.
dialogue_jp: いいだろう　わかった

dialogue_en: Monsters have been spotted skulking around the facility, and I want them gone.
dialogue_jp:
合宿場のまわりで目撃されたモンスターを
退治してもらいたいんだ

dialogue_en: The reason I wanted you to stop by?
dialogue_jp: 頼みというのは　ほかでもない

dialogue_en: Didn't realize it at the time, but we ate pretty good when we were kids.
dialogue_jp:
子供の頃に食べていたものって
ずいぶん　贅沢だったよな

dialogue_en: What?
dialogue_jp: うん？

dialogue_en: Y'know, it's funny.
dialogue_jp: なあ　ティファ

dialogue_en: That face says it all.
dialogue_jp: クラウド　顔！

dialogue_en: They put a lot of thought into making 'em healthy. Not much into making 'em tasty.
dialogue_jp:
栄養バランスは考えられていたんだと思う
ただ　味は……

dialogue_en: Question: what kinda meals do they feed SOLDIERs?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　軍隊の食事ってどうだった？

dialogue_en: Yeah, me neither.
dialogue_jp: 俺も嫌いだ

dialogue_en: ...Not a fan.
dialogue_jp: う～ん……

dialogue_en: What about crab?
dialogue_jp: カニは　どうなんだ？

dialogue_en: Used to be─not anymore, though. Can't be choosers in the slums, either.
dialogue_jp:
でも　ほとんどなくなった
好き嫌い　スラムでも許されないからね

dialogue_en: Really?
dialogue_jp: 意外だな

dialogue_en: Well, I used to be super picky, actually.
dialogue_jp: 実は私　結構あったんだ

dialogue_en: SOLDIERs can't be choosers. We ate what we were fed.
dialogue_jp:
いや　ないな
軍では許されない

dialogue_en: Hey, Cloud. Would you say you're a picky eater?
dialogue_jp: ねえ　クラウドは好き嫌いってある？

dialogue_en: Yeah... You snooze, you lose.
dialogue_jp: うん　食べてほしかったな

dialogue_en: Grr...
dialogue_jp: ぐぬう……

dialogue_en: But that's how it went down, right?
dialogue_jp: でも　ホントのことですよね

dialogue_en: Don't badmouth us!
dialogue_jp: 聞き捨てならないぞ！

dialogue_en: Watch it, rookie!
dialogue_jp: おい　新人！

dialogue_en: Sorry to butt in, but you wouldn't happen to be the one who beat these guys in a pull-up contest, would you!?
dialogue_jp:
もしかして　先輩たちを筋肉対決で負かしたのって
あなたですよね

dialogue_en: 'Scuse me...
dialogue_jp: あの……

dialogue_en: Can't thank you enough. Now we can get back to training fiend-free.
dialogue_jp:
ありがとう
これで心置きなく　筋トレができるよ

dialogue_en: Oh, hey there, Cloud, Tifa. Heard you two took care of our little monster problem?
dialogue_jp:
クラウドくん　ティファくん
モンスターを退治してくれたんだって？

dialogue_en: That's the last of 'em. You ready to head back?
dialogue_jp: これで最後だね　ジムに戻ろっか

dialogue_en: People need to know they're safe to train properly.
dialogue_jp:
みんなに安心して
トレーニングをしてもらいたいんだ

dialogue_en: Our muscles might start to atrophy if we have to live in fear of fiend attacks.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターへの恐怖心で
筋肉が萎縮してしまうからね

dialogue_en: How goes the extermination?
dialogue_jp: モンスター退治は順調かい？

dialogue_en: Homegrown fruits and vegetables...and great chefs eager to use 'em...
dialogue_jp:
ニブルヘイムは　食材も豊富だったし
料理自慢も大勢いたしね

dialogue_en: Yeah...
dialogue_jp: 本当だね

dialogue_en: As a token of my thanks─accept this reward.
dialogue_jp: これは報酬です　受け取ってください

dialogue_en: I would've preferred a more "final" farewell, but she's gone and that's enough.
dialogue_jp:
少々生ぬるい気もしますが
まあ　良しとしましょう

dialogue_en: Oh! There you are, friends! I heard you ran that little swindler out of town.
dialogue_jp:
おお　みなさん
あの小娘を　追い出してくれたみたいですね

dialogue_en: We go and tell the mayor we "took care" of the merc─just like he wanted.
dialogue_jp:
なんでも屋はいなくなった

dialogue_en: So...what do we do now?
dialogue_jp: それで　どうすんの？

dialogue_en: Just "a little"?
dialogue_jp: ミレイユ

dialogue_en:
Oh, I've got an idea!
Y'see, I dug up a little dirt about that mayor...
dialogue_jp:
あっ！　わたし　イイ情報持ってるよ

dialogue_en:
Actually, what say we look for one
last job before we leave?
dialogue_jp:
さて　せっかくだから
ひと仕事していこうかね

dialogue_en: Coming!
dialogue_jp: うん！

dialogue_en: C'mon, partner.

dialogue_en: You too. Girl power and all that.
dialogue_jp: とーぜん　ユフィもね

dialogue_en: Stay strong.
dialogue_jp: 負けんなよ

dialogue_en: Meh, I was just so pissed, I had to say something.

dialogue_en: Let me sweeten the deal. If your abs prove superior, I'll add a bonus to your reward. How's that sound?
dialogue_jp:
そうだな　アミナくんに勝ったら
報酬を上乗せするってことでどうかな？

dialogue_en: So you know, Amina's been training to achieve your look, Tifa. You'd be helping her measure her progress.
dialogue_jp:
アミナくんは　キミを目標に鍛え続けてきたんだよ

dialogue_en: Hmm...
dialogue_jp: ジーナン

dialogue_en: Uh, right now?
dialogue_jp: えーっと

dialogue_en: I want to challenge you to a sit-up contest!
dialogue_jp: 私と腹筋勝負　してください！

dialogue_en: Which is why, I, uh...
dialogue_jp: それで　あの……

dialogue_en: Are you kidding me!? You're literally my inspiration!
dialogue_jp: ティファさんは　私のあこがれなんです！

dialogue_en: I didn't really do anything...
dialogue_jp: そんな　私はべつに

dialogue_en: Needless to say, we're very grateful.
dialogue_jp: とても感謝している　ありがとう

dialogue_en: It's just as she says. Thanks to you, our female membership has absolutely skyrocketed.
dialogue_jp:
アミナくんの言うとおり　ティファくんのおかげで
女性の会員がうんと増えたんだ

dialogue_en: And I'm not your only fan─look! All of us signed up because we wanted to be just like you!
dialogue_jp:
私だけじゃないんですよ　ほら
ほかにも　こんなにいっぱい！

dialogue_en: Oh, wow...
dialogue_jp: はあ……

dialogue_en: After I heard how you crushed it I knew I had to join the gym. You're the reason I'm here!
dialogue_jp:
私　ティファさんの噂を聞いて

dialogue_en: You're Tifa, right!?
dialogue_jp: ティファさんですよね！

dialogue_en: I'm so pumped!
dialogue_jp: ワクワクしますね！

dialogue_en: This is gonna be fun!
dialogue_jp: いっしょに楽しみましょう！

dialogue_en: Don't go easy on me, okay?
dialogue_jp: 手加減ナシで　お願いします！

dialogue_en: Just say the word and we can get crunchin'!
dialogue_jp: 私の腹筋は　いつでもいけます！

dialogue_en: These abs're ready when you are!
dialogue_jp: 私は準備万端ですよ！

dialogue_en: Aren't you gonna take her on?
dialogue_jp: アミナと勝負しないのか？

dialogue_en: I'm up next, after Amina's done with you.
dialogue_jp: アミナのあとは　オレとも勝負してくれよ

dialogue_en: What's up? Amina's waiting for you.
dialogue_jp: どうした　アミナが待ってるぞ？

dialogue_en: Hey, 'preciate you flexin' on those monsters for us.
dialogue_jp:
モンスターを倒してくれたんだってな
助かったぞ

dialogue_en: Go on. Amina can't wait to pit her abs against yours.
dialogue_jp: さあ　アミナくんがお待ちかねだよ

dialogue_en: We're more popular than ever─and it's all thanks to you.
dialogue_jp: ティファくんのおかげで　ジムが活性化したよ

dialogue_en: But hey─if you ever find some extra time and want to show me how it's done, I'll be waiting!
dialogue_jp:
私は　いつでも大丈夫なんで
勝負する気になったら　声をかけてください

dialogue_en: No worries. I'm sure you're super busy...
dialogue_jp: そうですか　お忙しいんですね

dialogue_en: Steady now.
dialogue_jp: 慌てないで

dialogue_en: Don't rush it.
dialogue_jp: 落ちついて

dialogue_en: Incredible form!
dialogue_jp: マッスル・ワンダフォー！

dialogue_en: Don't you ever get sore!?
dialogue_jp: 乳酸がたまらないのか？

dialogue_en: Hmph. Show-off.
dialogue_jp: 見せつけやがって

dialogue_en: Where'd that come from?
dialogue_jp: キレてやがる

dialogue_en: It's almost like your muscles are singing!
dialogue_jp: 腹筋が歌っているようだ！

dialogue_en: Just like that!
dialogue_jp: ただごとじゃないぞ！

dialogue_en: Yeah, keep it up!
dialogue_jp: まだいけるのか？

dialogue_en: You're killing it!
dialogue_jp: さすがだな！

dialogue_en: I'm at a loss for words!
dialogue_jp: おそれいったよ

dialogue_en: You're both so stunning!
dialogue_jp: キレイだよ　ふたりとも

dialogue_en: Truly incredible!
dialogue_jp: 見とれちゃうね

dialogue_en: That was perfect.
dialogue_jp: バッチリだよ

dialogue_en: Beautiful!
dialogue_jp: ビューティフル！

dialogue_en: Yeah! Feel the burn!
dialogue_jp: さあ　ここからだよ

dialogue_en: I believe in you!
dialogue_jp: キミたちならやれる！

dialogue_en: Come on! I know you've got more to give!
dialogue_jp: ほら　もっと体を追い込んで

dialogue_en: You two are doing awesome!
dialogue_jp: ふたりとも素晴らしいよ！

dialogue_en: Looking good! Lemme see you sweat!
dialogue_jp: いいね　美しい汗だ！

dialogue_en: Havin' a hard time?
dialogue_jp: ハッハー　苦しそうだな

dialogue_en: Now, Amina! You got her!
dialogue_jp: いまだアミナ　追い込め！

dialogue_en: Uh-oh! Givin' up already?
dialogue_jp: おっと　ギブアップか？

dialogue_en: Heh heh heh...
dialogue_jp: おやおや……

dialogue_en: Hmph! Guess you were all talk.
dialogue_jp: ふん　口ほどでもない

dialogue_en: Now's your chance, Amina!
dialogue_jp: アミナ　いけるぞ！

dialogue_en: Someone's been slacking off!
dialogue_jp: サボっていたようだな

dialogue_en: Hey, what's up?
dialogue_jp: どうした？

dialogue_en: Kick those limits to the curb!
dialogue_jp: 限界を超えていこう

dialogue_en: Try to have fun with it.
dialogue_jp: もっと楽しむんだ

dialogue_en: Attune yourself to your abs.
dialogue_jp: 腹筋の声を聞いてごらん

dialogue_en: Oh, yeah!
dialogue_jp: アミナ

dialogue_en: We gotta do this again sometime!
dialogue_jp: アミナ

dialogue_en: How 'bout we hit the showers?
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: You had me sweating, though!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: What can I say?
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: I was just getting warmed up.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Still got room to grow.
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: Just gettin' those gains!
dialogue_jp: ティファ

dialogue_en: You really are on a whole other level!
dialogue_jp: アミナ

dialogue_en: Whew! That was one helluva workout...
dialogue_jp: アミナ

dialogue_en: I can't get enough of those beautiful muscles!
dialogue_jp: マッスル・イズ・ビューティフォー！

dialogue_en: Woo! You are in the zone!
dialogue_jp: ヒュ～　マッスル・ハーモニー！

dialogue_en: Who'da thought it'd be this close?
dialogue_jp: ハイレベルな勝負だぜ

dialogue_en: Oh, man! Who's gonna win this one? It's too close to call!

dialogue_jp: 筋肉の喜ぶ声が聞こえるぜ

dialogue_en: If that's what you want, then I'll back you up.

私でよければ

dialogue_en: If you don't mind dropping by from time to time, I'm sure she'd benefit from your advice.

dialogue_en: Honestly, I─

dialogue_en: Nobody's born with a beautiful physique like yours. I can tell you poured gallons of blood, sweat, and tears into your training!

dialogue_en: Like I said, you're an inspiration─to me, to all of us!
dialogue_jp:

dialogue_en: Thanks a lot. You put up a good fight though.

dialogue_en: Wow, you've got abs of adamantite!

dialogue_en: Let's see who's the Crunching Queen!
dialogue_jp: もうひと勝負　いきましょう！

dialogue_en: Y'see, I was just warming up back there, but now I'm ready to fight for the title!

dialogue_en: Hey, if you've got the time, can we go another round?
dialogue_jp:
私　ティファさんと

dialogue_en: You're crushing it!
dialogue_jp: 勉強になります！

dialogue_en: Poetry in motion!
dialogue_jp: ノリノリですね！

dialogue_en: Great form!
dialogue_jp: 完璧です！

dialogue_en: Yeah─keep it up!

dialogue_jp: 師匠　修行の成果を見てください！

dialogue_en: Come back whenever you want to pump some iron. You're always welcome.

dialogue_en: Here you go, then: your extermination fee.

dialogue_en: "Muscle mentor"...has a nice ring to it.

dialogue_en: Omigosh─thanks, coach!
dialogue_jp: はい　師匠！

dialogue_en: I say we gotta pump while the iron's hot!
dialogue_jp: こんなときこそ　鍛えねば！

dialogue_en: Wutai talks a big game, but my muscles are bigger!
dialogue_jp: 筋肉さえあれば　ウータイなんて怖くない！

dialogue_en: I'd like to see Wutai put their muscles where their mouth is!
dialogue_jp: ウータイのシノビとも　いつか競いたいものだ

dialogue_en: If the whole world's comin' to blows, we're gonna need to bulk up first!
dialogue_jp: 戦争になるなら　さらなる筋肉が必要だ！

dialogue_en: If we all worked out together, I bet we could find a way to overcome our differences.
dialogue_jp:
いつか筋肉で

dialogue_en: So much doom and gloom these days...
dialogue_jp: 殺伐とした世の中になってきたね

dialogue_en: Ready to get crunched? Bring it on!
dialogue_jp: マッスルバトル・カモン！

dialogue_en: Alright, you and me. It's go time!
dialogue_jp: レッツ・マッスル・ランデブー！

dialogue_en: I'm all pumped up! You ready to get flexed on!?
dialogue_jp: パワーアップした俺の筋肉を見せてやる

dialogue_en: If you're in the mood for a challenge today, then I'm your guy!
dialogue_jp: 来たな　今日の俺はキレてるぞ！

dialogue_en: Time to make our muscles sing in sweet harmony.
dialogue_jp: いっしょに　筋肉のしらべを奏でようか

dialogue_en: Ready to work up a sweat?
dialogue_jp: キミも　汗をかいていくかい？

dialogue_en: Push through the pain!
dialogue_jp: 乗り越えましょう！

dialogue_en: Don't give up!
dialogue_jp: まだまだ！

dialogue_en: Keep going!
dialogue_jp: ドンマイです！

dialogue_en: You got this!
dialogue_jp: こっからです！

dialogue_en: I admit defeat. Hard to compete against an athlete like you.
dialogue_jp: 完敗だよ　キミは本物のアスリートだね

dialogue_en: Nicely done! You clearly haven't neglected your training.
dialogue_jp: さすがだよ　いちだんと磨きあげたようだね

dialogue_en: Okay, let's get this party started!
dialogue_jp: さて　パーティー・タイムだ！

dialogue_en: Get into the groove!
dialogue_jp: ビートを刻んでいくぜ！

dialogue_en: Alright, give it your best shot!
dialogue_jp: さあ　かかってこい！

dialogue_en: I'm gonna crush you!
dialogue_jp: ひねり潰してやる！

dialogue_en: Just have fun with it!
dialogue_jp: 楽しんでいこうか

dialogue_en: Don't forget your game face!
dialogue_jp: 笑顔を忘れずにね

dialogue_en: Nothing gets me out of a slump like a good workout. You wanna join me?
dialogue_jp:
師匠　ふさぎこんでる時こそ
筋トレですよね！

dialogue_en: Hey, coach! Whaddya say we work up a sweat and get those endorphins flowin'?
dialogue_jp:
師匠　いっしょに汗を流して
不安を吹き飛ばしましょう！

dialogue_en: Thank you for stepping in back there.
dialogue_jp: さっきは　ありがと

dialogue_en: Haha! Trying's about all I can do!
dialogue_jp: ああ　それは約束できないねえ

dialogue_en: Try to make sure she stays there.
dialogue_jp: もうスラムから出さないでくれ

dialogue_en: I'll be taking her back to Midgar.
dialogue_jp: 孫は連れて帰らせてもらうよ

dialogue_en:
In any case,
thanks for looking out for my little "merc."
dialogue_jp:
というわけだ
なんでも屋　世話になったね

dialogue_en: Okay... Let's go.
dialogue_jp: じゃあ　帰る

dialogue_en: The people need us.
dialogue_jp: 帰ってきておくれ

dialogue_en: Now then, shall we head home?
dialogue_jp: だからさ　キリエ

dialogue_en: So how about this? We work together as partners─equals. Sound fair?
dialogue_jp:
そうだね　これからは
対等のパートナーってことでどうだい？

dialogue_en:
I know I shouldn't push you.
Or nitpick your technique.
dialogue_jp:
もう　無理強いはしないよ
小言もなるべく控える

dialogue_en: ...Forgive me, dear.
dialogue_jp: はあ　わかったよ

dialogue_en: Oh?
dialogue_jp: えっ？

dialogue_en: I dunno. You certainly sound just like me.
dialogue_jp: ほんと　アタシの若い頃にそっくりだよ

dialogue_en: Well, didn't think y'all'd be back so soon.
dialogue_jp: おお　いいところにきた

dialogue_en: Oh, figured you'da moved on by now.
dialogue_jp: おお　まだいたか

dialogue_en: I'm one step closer to achieving your perfection!
dialogue_jp: 師匠の腹筋に　一歩近づけた気がします！

dialogue_en: I took some notes on your form, coach. Thanks for the demonstration!
dialogue_jp:
師匠　勉強になりました
ありがとうございます！

dialogue_en: Word of advice, kid: the key to maintaining a hot bod is keeping a cool head.
dialogue_jp:
体はホット　頭はクール！
これが筋トレのコツさ

dialogue_en: So close! If you want a rematch, I'm good for it.
dialogue_jp:
ナイス・トライ！
またいつでもリベンジしてくれ

dialogue_en: Heh! Nothin' sweeter than a shake laced with victory.
dialogue_jp: くくく　今夜のプロテインは美味そうだ！

dialogue_en: Ahaha! Check it─my muscles are twitching with amusement!
dialogue_jp: わはは　喜びに震える俺の筋肉を見よ！
